description.hltext_display: Balangan : Dugaan Korupsi Proyek Transmigrasi
description.content:
Banjarmasinpost.co.id - Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 | Dibaca 33 kali | Komentar (0)
Foto:web
BANJARMASINPOST.CO.ID, PARINGIN - Kerugian negara dalam kasus dugaan korupsi proyek transmigrasi di Desa Papuyuan dan Desa Matanghanau, Kecamatan Lampihong yang diusut Kejaksaan Negeri (Kejari) Paringin, menguat.
Sebelumnya, dugaan adanya kerugian negara proyek transmigrasi yang menggunakan dana APBN senilai Rp 3,8 miliar, muncul setelah kejaksaan bersama tenaga teknis dari Fakultas Teknik Unlam melakukan cek fisik terhadap volume kayu yang digunakan untuk bangunan rumah.
Indikasi adanya kerugian negara dalam pemeriksaan pertama ini muncul karena ternyata ada beberapa bahan bangunan yang volumenya tak sesuai dengan yang ada di Rencana Anggaran Belanja (RAB) kontraknya.
Kemudian dugaan itu menguat setelah pihak kejaksaan melakukan pemeriksaan fisik kedua terhadap kayu bahan bangunan rumah yang dilakukan bersama tim dari Dinas Kehutanan dan Perkebunan (Dishutbun) Kabupaten Balangan.
Dari hasil pemeriksaan yang dilakukan dengan mengambil sampel 20 buah rumah, tim yang turun untuk secara khusus memeriksa jenis kayu yang digunakan berhasil menemukan adanya bahan kayu yang tak sesuai dengan jenis kayu yang seharusnya digunakan.
"Hasil yang kita periksa bersama orang dinas kehutanan, dari sekitar 20 buah rumah ternyata hampir 80 persen kayu yang digunakan tak sesuai jenisnya," ujar Kasi Intel Kejari Paringin, Adi Rifani, kepada Bpost, Minggu (20/12).
Menurut Adi, hasil temuan secara kasat mata didapati kayu yang seharusnya menggunakan jenis Meranti Campuran (MC) ternyata malah menggunakan kayu jenis lainnya.
Temuan itu didapat setelah pihaknya memeriksa kayu yang digunakan untuk dinding, lantai serta tiang yang digunakan untuk menyanggan dindingnya.
"Jadi kita dapati lagi adanya indikasi penyimpangan disini dan kalau memang terbukti benar maka tentu saja akan ada kerugian negara karena itulah hasil pemeriksaan secara tertulis dari dinas kehutanan akan kita kirimkan lagi ke BPKP," terang Adi.
Berita acara hasil pemeriksaan lapangan berdasarkan informasi yang diterima dari dinas kehutanan, imbuh Adi, akan selesai dalam pekan ini. Setelah itu langsung dikirim ke BPKP agar berkas bisa makin lengkap untuk bisa mengungkap adanya dugaan penyelewengan uang negara dalam persoalan ini.
Diketahui dalam kasus proyek transmigrasi yang menggunakan dana APBN senilai Rp 3,8 miliar, kejaksaan sudah menetapkan M Rakam selaku Kuasa Pengguna Anggaran (KPA) dan Sujono Kosasih yang merupakan Direktur PT Megah Jaya Persada selaku kontraktor sebagai tersangka.

description.hltext_display: 黄金白银齐上阵 三招打赢2011资产保卫战
description.content:
“买啥涨啥！”2010年留给投资者最深刻、最鲜活的记忆就是物价上涨，通胀来袭。如何打赢2011年这场资产保卫战成为众多投资者临近年关不得不思考的问题。
找个“主题”布局股市
要跑赢CPI首先还得靠股市。从决定股市基本面的中国经济宏观环境来看，明年经济增速仍旧有望保持在9.5%的高水平，经济稳定增长无虞。A股目前具有投资价值，是抗通胀较好的投资渠道之一。
基金人士建议，随着国家“十二五”规划和部分产业升级等一系列政策的推出，“主题化”投资的趋势愈发凸显，主题基金将有所作为。事实上，今年以来，虽然指数表现不佳，但以高端装备制造、新一代信息技术、新能源、新材料为主的战略性新兴产业，以节能环保产业的设备等主题投资已轮番掀起结构性行情。
银行理财规划师林先生告诉记者，今年持续的通胀压力支撑金价一路上涨，黄金投资热了起来，客户转出银行存款投资黄金的现象明显增多，“长期来看黄金仍是不错的选择。”
今年以来黄金价格上涨已经超过30%。对于明年金
价走势，分析人士认为，金融危机爆发至今，各国普遍将利率保持在很低的水平。与此同时，市场对美元贬值的预期升温，全球黄金的供应存在较大缺口，黄金价格正处于上升周期之中。
在金价一路向上的同时，白银投资也异军突起。由于白银相对低廉的价格，以及有限的产量，相对于黄金来说白银投资的潜力更大。但从每日走势来看，白银的价格波动远比黄金剧烈，投资者必须保持足够的清醒和冷静，避免盲目投资。
银行理财灵活应对
近期国内多家券商发布的2011年策略报告认为，明年通胀压力依然不减，预期还有两至三次加息。对此，西南财经大学信托与理财研究
所副所长罗志华表示，投资者应该更加重视所配置资产的流动性和盈利能力。通过保持所配置资产的流动性，可根据情势和机会将持有的资产池进行自由配置和转换，以提高收益率，规避通胀和央行加息的双重影响。
而银行理财产品投资起点不高，除部分高风险结构性理财产品外，投资风险相对较小，比较适合于普通投资者。特别是短期理财产品比较容易操作，可根据需求灵活进出市场。 (丁冰)

description.hltext_display: 理财师：上好银行卡风险防范“必修课”
description.content:
利用银行卡进行欺诈活动，给市民畅享银行卡便利带来了严重影响。中国银联有关专家表示，远离银行卡欺诈有几个关键环节：一是巧辨别。首先，是识别虚假短信的样式，欺诈短信中“银行卡管理处”、“联合管理局”、“国家财政中心”等机构根本就不存在，收到这样的短信后请务必小心。其次，识别虚假短信中的银行卡交易信息内容，虚假短信中绝对不会包含发生交易的银行卡卡号等信息。再次，多个心眼识别“李鬼”。万一拨打了虚假短信中所留电话，可以反问对方是否知道自己的手机号或卡号，由于虚假短信的发送是随机的，所以一般诈骗分子是无法知道的。
其次要熟悉各家银行的客服中心电话，不要轻易相信其他电话号码发来的“风险提示”。对可疑的语音电话或短信不要回应，应直接致电相关单位或发卡银行客服热线询问。注意保护身份资料、账户信息，在任何情况下，都不要泄露银行卡密码。任何人，包括银行工作人员，均无权询问密码。千万不可按照陌生人的“指导”进行ATM或网上银行转账操作。
专家表示，持卡人收到银行卡欺诈短信后可拨打110报警。如果上当受骗，发生损失的，应立即联系发卡行，及时冻结银行卡账户，以防欺诈损失进一步扩大，同时到当地公安机关报案，协助公安机关做好案件调查取证工作。
用密码锁好银行卡“百宝箱”
持卡人在设置密码时，要选择易于记忆但难以破译的密码。例如，将“北京奥运会”的笔划“581276”设为密码。不可设置简单数字排列的密码或用生日日期、电话号码、身份证件号码、家庭住址门牌号、邮编号等有关个人信息的数字作为密码。收到银行卡密码信后，请立即将其销毁并记住密码，或将密码更换为容易记忆但难以破译的密码。
不要将密码写在或保存在任何可能让他人看到或得到的地方。不要将密码存放在手机里，更不要写在银行卡背面。千万不要将密码与银行卡放在一起。
在使用密码时，留意自助银行门禁以及ATM上是否有多余的装置或摄像头，ATM密码键盘是否有改装痕迹。输入密码时，应用另一只手或身体挡住操作手势，防止其他人或针孔摄像机偷窥。如果您发觉密码被偷窥，请立即修改密码或联系银行办理密码挂失。
刷卡时不要让银行卡离开视线范围
专家提示持卡人，在使用POS机刷卡消费时，不要让银行卡离开视线范围，留意收银员的刷卡次数。收银员交回签购单及卡片后，您应认真核对签购单上的卡号、交易日期以及交易金额等信息是否正确，卡片是否为本人的卡片。如果因为金额错误或其他原因取消交易，务必请商户刷出一笔退货的金额，而不是拿回或销毁原先签购单。
在签购单上签名时，签名式样应与卡片背面的签名一致，以免银行拒绝您的交易或出现纠纷时无法保护您的权益。请注意确认签购单是否有二份重叠，请注意在任何情况下，都不要在空白而且没有消费金额的签购单上签名。刷卡消费时若发生异常情况，要妥善保管交易单据，如发生卡重复扣款等现象，可凭交易单据及对账单及时与发卡银行联系。

description.hltext_display: 巧用“保险超市”优化组合可节省保费
description.content:
保险中介代理多家公司的保险产品 可根据需求制定保障计划
保险柜台
面对琳琅满目的保险产品，对于希望省时省力的消费者而言，不妨考虑通过保险中介来咨询投保，后者代理多家公司的保险产品，可以根据消费者需求制定合适的保障计划。
目前，几乎各家保险公司都会在市场上推出不同种类的最具竞争力的产品，包括意外险、疾病医疗险、重疾险、年金分红险、万能险等。如果一家一家挑选，难免要遭遇各家公司保险代理人的轮番轰炸。
面对琳琅满目的保险产品，如何才能比较快捷地选到最适合自己的产品呢？业内人士表示，对于希望省时省力的消费而言，不妨考虑通过保险中介来咨询投保，后者代理多家公司的保险产品，可以根据消费者需求制定合适的保障计划。
据介绍，在欧美发达国家的保险市场，通过保险代理公司投保已经成为一种主流趋势，消费者可以根据需求一站式选购多家保险公司的各类保险产品，而不需要再分别面对各家公司的保险代理人。华康保险代理公司高级经理江奕忠表示，专业保险中介公司更像是一个保险超市，能够提供多家公司的各类保险产品，包括寿险、产险和企业年金等。与此同时，保险中介代理人可以站在相对中立、客观的立场为消费者提供财务分析，避免某些保险公司代理人“王婆卖瓜自卖自夸”的尴尬。
江奕忠表示，和单独某一家保险公司相比，“保险超市”可以实现不同公司产品的跨界组合。通过对各家保险公司拳头产品的优化重组，取长补短，同样的一套较全面的同额度的保障方案，保险超市可以为客户节省10%-30%的保费。
投保案例
某30岁男性商务人士，计划每年投入保费12000元，共投入20年。希望拥有一套有50万寿险保障计划，同时要求含有重大疾病保障30万元以上，小病医疗保障每年约5万元。此外，还要求公共交通保障在100万元以上，70岁左右保险账户资金需保持有25万元左右作为养老之用。
对于这样一个常见投保案例，可以通过不同渠道为其设计保险计划（详见附表一、二，产品信息来源：华康保险）。
整体而言，两份保障计划都基本实现了上述案例中的投保要求，不过由于表一中的产品组合集中了各家公司的产品优势，在保障内容上更加全面均衡，价格上也相对便宜。不过值得注意的是，目前与保险中介展开销售合作的保险公司主要集中在外资保险公司和中小规模的中资保险公司，诸如中国人寿、中国平安这类大型保险公司主要仍依靠自身的代理人队伍销售，因此保险中介代理这些大型保险公司的产品并不多。

description.hltext_display: الملك السعودي يغادر المستشفى بنيويورك
description.content:
خضع الملك عبد الله لعمليتين جراحيتين في مستشفى في نيويورك
اعلن الديوان الملكي السعودي عن ان الملك عبدالله بن عبدالعزيز قد غادر مستشفى برسبيتريان في نيويورك بعد شهر من تلقى العلاج نتيجة اصابته بانزلاق غضروفي.
واوضح بيان صادر عن الديوان الملكي ان العاهل السعودي غادر المستشفى حيث خضع لعمليتين جراحيتين وانه بصحة جيدة وقد "توجه الى مقر اقامته بنيويورك لقضاء فترة من النقاهة واستكمال علاجه الطبيعي".
ولم يحدد البيان تاريخا لعودة العاهل السعودي البالغ من العمر 86 عاما الى المملكة.
وبث التلفزيون السعودي صورا لمغادرة الملك المستشفى وبجانبه وزير الصحة السعودي، وبدا الملك عبدالله في التسجيل مبتسما بينما كان يمشي بصعوبة داخل رواق المستشفى ويحيي الطاقم الطبي الذي عالجه، وحشدا من الحضور.
وكان الملك عبد الله وصل في 22 تشرين الثاني/نوفمبر الى نيويورك لتلقي العلاج اثر اصابته بانزلاق غضروفي وتجمع دموي حول العمود الفقري يضغط على العصب الشوكي، وقد خضع بعد يومين من وصوله الى عملية جراحية.
وقد اعلن عن نجاح العملية الاولى بيد انه خضع الى جراحة ثانية في الرابع من ديسمبر/كانون الاول الجاري لمعالجة عدد من الفقرات لديه وهي عملية كانت مقررة اصلا حسب الديوان الملكي.
وقد اعلن عن نجاح العملية الثانية، ولكن لم تظهر اية اخبار اخرى عن صحة الملك السعودي حتى البيان الرسمي عن خروجه من المستشفى الاربعاء.
ولاية العهد
وتولى ولي العهد ووزير الدفاع الامير سلطان بن عبد العزيز ادارة شؤون المملكة في غياب الملك عبد الله.
وعاد الامير سلطان البالغ عمره حوالي 85 عاما من المغرب في 21 تشرين الثاني/نوفمبر لاستلام شؤون الحكم اثناء غياب العاهل السعودي، قبل يوم واحد من مغادرة الملك الى نيويورك.
وكان الامير سلطان يمضي فترة من الراحة في المغرب منذ نهاية آب/اغسطس بعد تلقيه علاجا في 2008 و2009 في الولايات المتحدة كما تقول مصادر دبلوماسية، وامضى اكثر من سنة في فترة نقاهة في الخارج.
كما يشارك ايضا في ادارة شؤون المملكة شقيق ولي العهد الامير نايف بن عبد العزيز (76 عاما) الذي يعتبر بعده في خلافة العرش ويشغل منصب النائب الثاني لرئيس الوزراء علما انه يتولى منذ 35 عاما حقيبة الداخلية.
وتنحصر خلافة الملك بين رموز العائلة المالكة ومعظمهم في السبعين او الثمانين من العمر بما في ذلك ولي العهد الامير سلطان بن عبد العزيز.

description.hltext_display: 油价上涨莫害怕 高手妙招教您节油省钱
description.content:
保养篇
想要在用车过程中省油，对爱车硬件方面的准备必不可少。按时给爱车做保养，可以节省不少油哦！
1.注意检查轮胎系统
气压不足会增加轮胎与地面的摩擦，增加油耗，所以要经常检查轮胎气压。另外，如果轮胎磨损严重，就会出现打滑现象，这样就会增加耗油量。平时注意检查轮胎系统可以省油哦！
2.注意经常检查刹车系统
有些车会出现轻微的拖刹，大多数车主都不会在意，殊不知，在不知不觉间，这就已经加重了汽车的负荷，会使油耗增加，所以要定期检查。即使是小毛病也不可放过。
3.减轻负载
统计显示，每增加1000克的负载会增加1%油耗，所以，在这个油价高涨的特殊积极，后备箱内闲置不用的杂物就请它们统统下车吧！
4.换机油
为了省油，要在如何减少阻力上下工夫。勤保养可以保证车辆机械传动的润滑，减少车辆克服内在阻力的油耗损失。据汽车保养行业的相关专家介绍，为保持汽车的最佳性能，建议最好每行驶5000公里更换一次机油，并检查过滤器。
驾驶篇
不可厚非，油是我们在日常生活中一点一滴用没的，那么，“解铃还须系铃人”油是从哪里没的，还应该从哪里省出来！
1.轻加油，轻刹车，早刹车
节油试验显示，油门踩到底比中速行驶费油二至三倍。所以，应当在保证汽车正常行驶的前提下，适当减小踩油门的幅度。
2.暖机后再加速
引擎低温运转要比温度升高后运行更费油，所以刚启动时不要马上加速，而应该慢行几分钟，让引擎热起来之后再加速。
3.换挡时机和挡位选择
要杜绝低挡高速，驾驶手动变速器的车时，在车速稳定下来以后应及时换成高挡；而驾驶自动变速器的车时，应尽量避免使用“运动”模式。这样也能省不少油哦！
4.堵车时考虑关掉发动机
现在路面越来越堵，等车时，大多数司机的做法是，拉起手刹挂好空挡，其实这也不科学，要是堵车时间超过1分钟，应考虑关掉发动机，因为发动机在怠速状态下，还是会耗油的。此外，还要注意保持车身整洁，定期打蜡，这能够减少空气阻力所带来的油耗浪费。

description.hltext_display: 预期收益与实际差53% 民生行"非凡理财"水分大
description.content:
今年下半年，对人们生活影响最大的可能就是对通胀的心理预期，在每个人都对货币缩水有切肤之痛的今天，自然更注重财富的保值增值。临近岁末，经济导报记者对部分银行一年来销售的理财产品进行了调查，发现个别银行理财产品给出诱人的超高预期收益，结果却出现难以想象的大幅亏损，甚至跑不赢定期存款。
预期高收益成“大忽悠”
相关统计显示，截至11月30日，今年以来共有3406款银行理财产品到期。其中，实际收益与产品介绍中的“预期收益”不符的共有141款产品。导报记者发现，这些产品中为数不少的一部分非但“达不到”投资者的心理预期，且实际收益和预期之间相差最大的达到53.27%，有严重夸大收益之嫌。
中国民生银行今年1月16日到期的“非凡理财FOF-基金精选人民币理财产品(1年)”预期年化收益率高达50%，但实际收益率为-3.27%。尽管该产品的亏损幅度在所有到期产品中看起来并不大，但两个数据之间相差53.27%的“水分”使其成为百余款“不达标”产品的代表。
导报记者还统计了这些产品中“水分”较大的前20款产品，发现其宣称的预期收益率从4%-25%不等，十分吸引眼球，而实际到期后所实现的收益率最低的只有-4.11%，最高也只有4.61%。粗略统计发现，这些产品的实际收益平均要比预期收益低5%。
但在现实销售中，“预期最高”、“上不封顶”的字样频频被印在宣传彩页最显著的位置，成为理财产品销售的重点推广部分。民生银行“非凡理财”FOF-基金精选产品的说明书上，收益率说明：10%-50%(且上不封顶，非承诺收益)。产品说明书上还特意单列“预计最高年收益率50%”。
多款产品跑不赢定存
导报记者发现，今年到期的3406款银行理财产品虽然大部分达到了预期收益，但和CPI的增速相比，有七成以上未能跑赢CPI，有的则连银行定期存款都跑不赢。
今年10月，CPI同比上涨4.4%，11月为5.1%，创28个月新高。从到期银行理财产品的年化收益率看，能够跑赢单月CPI的寥寥无几。据统计，今年到期的3406只银行理财产品中，仅有44只到期年化收益率超过5%；超过4.4%的，也不到70只。
导报记者调查发现，今年到期的129只投资期限为6个月的银行理财产品，只有58只到期年化收益率为2.2%以上，占比仅为45%，其他超过55%的半年期理财产品，到期年化收益率均比不上银行半年定存的收益。今年到期的8只两年期的理财产品多数表现也较差，除3只达到预期收益外，其余5只均大幅度低于预期收益，表现最好的一只年化收益率不到2.4%，有的还出现亏损。
某股份制银行理财规划师向导报记者透露，银行理财产品投向不明确的问题一直存在，其宣传和说明，很少有客户能够看懂，有的银行在产品的包装宣传上五花八门，难免有夸大宣传的意味，难怪有客户质疑个别银行理财产品不是站在客户角度考虑，而是为了收取手续费和从市场圈钱。上述高达50%的预期年化收益率怎么可能获得呢？今年基金表现一般，投资于基金的理财产品自然也不可能获得高收益，夸大宣传的银行理财产品更多像是在赌博。

description.hltext_display: 理财师：银行收费项目太多教� 做省钱达人
description.content:
小额账户管理费、密码挂失费、换折费、查询费、存折补办费、跨行取款费、打印明细账单费、ATM机跨行及异地取款费……面对银行各种收费，该怎样学做“逃费达人”？
做好现金规划。在ATM机上跨行取款一般要收手续费，因此，需要提前计划，备好未来几天大致所需的现金量，以避免交跨行取款手续费。当然，现金量持有要适中，过量不仅会带来利息损失，也可能因保管不当带来风险。
选准办卡行。目前各家银行针对跨行取款的收费政策不一，有的单笔费用高达4元，有的只需2元；有的则是每月前几笔免费，还有的则是全免。对此，除了选择少数免收跨行取款费的银行外，持有在单位附近、居住地附近有网点的银行卡，或ATM机较多的银行卡，则是避免跨行取款的好办法。实在要跨行取款，得留心各家银行ATM机单笔取款的上限区别，在上限高的银行跨行取款能节省一些手续费。
整合账户免管理费。目前绝大多数银行对活期小额账户按季度收取3元左右的管理费，如果一季度的日均账户余额不足300元或500元，银行会按期从账户里扣小额账户管理费。有些家庭开了不少银行卡，但常用的不过两三张。消费者不妨销掉那些不超过500元的活期储蓄账户，只保留常用账户，这样不但能规避不必要的收费，还能将家庭资产掌握得更清楚。
升级“贵宾”省费用。很多银行对贵宾客户免除多项费用，如银行卡年费、跨行取款费、账单打印费、汇款手续费等。当然，对于成为贵宾客户的门槛，各家银行要求不一，有的要求金融资产达20万元，有的是30万元。因此，最好把资金放到一家银行，享受贵宾待遇，办业务也不用排队。
多用网银可享优惠。随着网上银行、电话银行等日渐为消费者接受，很多银行为进一步拓展这一新兴市场，经常开展优惠活动。如一些股份制银行常开展网银认购、申购、定投指定基金，手续费打折活动。由此，尽量通过网银和电话银行投资金融产品省时又省钱。据《上海金融报》

description.hltext_display: 理财锦囊：个人家庭财务年底大体检 给账户瘦身
description.content:
理财锦囊
年底，又到了给自己和家庭的理财账户、消费清单做“体检”的时候了。盘点一下一年的收成，进一步理清理财思路，对制定明年的财务计划肯定大有裨益。
清理小金库给账户“瘦身”
羊城晚报讯 记者刘薇报道：又是一年岁末时。市民黄先生近日在家清理家庭“小金库”时发现，有好几个账户都只剩几百元，打算干脆去银行取出来销户。谁曾想，一个2004年存入的户头，账面上剩余的300多元竟然被扣去了100多元的服务费，令黄先生大吃一惊。实际上，随着银行收费项目的日益增多，也许不经意间，存在银行的钱不但不“挣钱”，还可能缩水，因此及时清理“周身存折”、“睡眠卡”变得十分重要。
黄先生的这张存折细究起来，由于账户所余金额不足400元，5年来被扣收了12元/年的小额账户管理费、10元/年的银行卡年费，积少成多，银行服务费便上了100元。如果再多几个账户都是这种情况，那也是一笔不小的开支。
目前，国内几乎绝大部分银行都实行了小额账户收费制度。银行对账户余额不足一定金额的储蓄存折和卡要收取管理费，直到扣完为止，有的甚至还要倒扣，直到储户续用或者销户时补交。尽管监管部门近期下发通知要求银行适当减免一些账户收费，但在银行没有接到正式文件之前，这些收费仍将继续存在。所以，要想防止这些无谓的损失，经常清点自己的账户，避免小额账户是一个不错的办法。
银行理财师提醒市民，除了将手中的存折和银行卡进行定期清理外，还应尽量将功能集中到一个账户上，如缴水电煤气费用的存折，就可与工资代发存折归并;对于长期闲置的账户，应及时进行销户。一些缴费项也应尽量与工资卡捆绑，并办理自动扣款，这样既省事又不会产生滞纳金等额外费用。
而家庭账户配置一般只需保留收支账户、消费账户及投资账户三种即可。其中收支账户以活期账户或借记卡为主，用来办理最基本的汇兑、结算及安排家庭日常生活开支等，工资卡是最好的收支账户对象;消费账户则以有透支功能的信用卡为主，可用于商场购物、餐饮等POS刷卡消费活动;投资账户以具有投资理财功能的账户为主，可用于购买国债、基金、黄金、本外币理财产品等。
此外，理财师还建议，要定期对国债、定期存款等进行清理检查，以防“过期”损失利息。

description.hltext_display: Fyll julhelgen med solidaritet istället
description.content:
Insändare i dag 09:04 | Uppdaterad i dag 09:06
Det finns andra och bättre­ sätt att ge julhelgen innehåll än en stresspräglad jakt på julklappar i de varuhus och affärer som under flera veckor har slagit på trummorna för materiella inköp och det lekamliga frosseriets lockelser i livsmedelsdiskarna.
Reklamens makt är stor. Särskilt barnen är utsatta, och föräldrarna känner trycket av kommersialismens inneboende krav.
Och naturligtvis skall de små också ha sitt. Men så här de sista skälvande dagarna innan julafton påminna om vikten av att ransonera antalet julklappar på alla fronter och istället räcka våra bröder och systrar, vilka finns i en rad länder på jorden och till ett antal som rör astronomiska tal, en hjälpande hand.
Flera kristna och ideella organisationer administrerar sådan hjälp. ”Genom din gåva är du med och tänder hoppets ljus för en tryggare värld”, betonar Svenska kyrkans hjälporganisation Hela världen. Svenska missionskyrkan fastslår att ”vi tillsammans kan uträtta mirakel, om än i liten skala”. Och Frälsningsarméns sociala arbete bland nödlidande i världen är lika välkänt som det är uppskattat och effektivt.
Detta bara några exempel bland flera som administrerar gåvor, vilka är de bästa av alla julklappar: att hjälpa en medmänniska, som hungrar och saknar tak över huvudet.
Enkelt och elementärt, javisst. En akt av äkthetens solidaritet, medkänslans närvaro, för att skapa också ett vänligt och mjukt välfärdssamfund.
Låt oss icke glömma att Sverige är en del av världen med ansvaret för den!
Bengt Olof Dike
Mörrum
Textstorlek

description.hltext_display: 理财锦囊：个人家庭财务年底大“体检”
description.content:
理财锦囊
年底，又到了给自己和家庭的理财账户、消费清单做“体检”的时候了。盘点一下一年的收成，进一步理清理财思路，对制定明年的财务计划肯定大有裨益。
清理小金库给账户“瘦身”
羊城晚报讯记者刘薇报道：又是一年岁末时。市民黄先生近日在家清理家庭“小金库”时发现，有好几个账户都只剩几百元，打算干脆去银行取出来销户。谁曾想，一个2004年存入的户头，账面上剩余的300多元竟然被扣去了100多元的服务费，令黄先生大吃一惊。实际上，随着银行收费项目的日益增多，也许不经意间，存在银行的钱不但不“挣钱”，还可能缩水，因此及时清理“周身存折”、“睡眠卡”变得十分重要。
黄先生的这张存折细究起来，由于账户所余金额不足400元，5年来被扣收了12元/年的小额账户管理费、10元/年的银行卡年费，积少成多，银行服务费便上了100元。如果再多几个账户都是这种情况，那也是一笔不小的开支。
目前，国内几乎绝大部分银行都实行了小额账户收费制度。银行对账户余额不足一定金额的储蓄存折和卡要收取管理费，直到扣完为止，有的甚至还要倒扣，直到储户续用或者销户时补交。尽管监管部门近期下发通知要求银行适当减免一些账户收费，但在银行没有接到正式文件之前，这些收费仍将继续存在。所以，要想防止这些无谓的损失，经常清点自己的账户，避免小额账户是一个不错的办法。
银行理财师提醒市民，除了将手中的存折和银行卡进行定期清理外，还应尽量将功能集中到一个账户上，如缴水电煤气费用的存折，就可与工资代发存折归并;对于长期闲置的账户，应及时进行销户。一些缴费项也应尽量与工资卡捆绑，并办理自动扣款，这样既省事又不会产生滞纳金等额外费用。
而家庭账户配置一般只需保留收支账户、消费账户及投资账户三种即可。其中收支账户以活期账户或借记卡为主，用来办理最基本的汇兑、结算及安排家庭日常生活开支等，工资卡是最好的收支账户对象;消费账户则以有透支功能的信用卡为主，可用于商场购物、餐饮等POS刷卡消费活动;投资账户以具有投资理财功能的账户为主，可用于购买国债、基金、黄金、本外币理财产品等。
此外，理财师还建议，要定期对国债、定期存款等进行清理检查，以防“过期”损失利息。

description.hltext_display: 金价一年上涨40% 黄金投资成为今年最大赢家
description.content:
今年以来，CPI从元月的1.5%一路跑至11月的5.1%，在“抵御通胀”的大背景下，不少市民开始了存款大搬家，今年的股市从3200点起一路涨涨跌跌，最近在3000点下方盘旋；理财产品的收益率虽然整体略有上浮，但是输赢不过零点几个百分点；要说跑得又稳又快的，还是黄金价格。
记者恰好一年的时间段里采访了同一位黄金公司高管，在这一年里金价稳稳地升了40%。这使得虽然国际金价屡创新高，却不但没吓跑实物黄金的投资者，反而刺激了市民的投资热情。个别银行甚至一度出现实物黄金买断货现象。而由于在历史高位出现的金价震荡，也被投资者视为低价吸入的好买点。
黄金分析师指出，尽管金价短期内运行格局偏空，但长期利好以及此后走高的局面仍未改观，中长线投资者可继续观望，如金价在1365美元出现反弹，价格趋势可能继续向上运行。
不过值得注意的是，投资黄金T+D也具有杠杆作用，风险虽然低于黄金期货但也不小。基本功能是给生产经营者提供套期保值、回避价格风险的手段，投资者需对黄金现货市场有较敏锐的嗅觉。总的来说，保证金交易品种对投资者的要求较高，风险较大，想参与的投资者必须有较好的心理素质。
虽然今年黄金市场大热，我们对投资理财的建议仍然是寻找自己熟悉的市场并且注意分散配置。如果你是个坚定的证券市场投资者，不妨看看券商对于明年的主流态度——
国家发改委有关负责人12月14日在发改委工作会议上表示，预计2010年我国CPI升幅将超过3%，2011年经济增长目标为8%左右，CPI控制目标则在4%左右，明年经济走势将更加明朗。 11月份CPI上涨5.1%，通胀形势依然严峻，如果明年CPI控制目标上调至4%的话，说明政府对通胀的容忍程度上升，一定程度上缓解市场对政策持续收紧的担忧。而在国际评级机构下调其他国家评级的同时，标普16日宣布上调中国主权债信用评级，也有助于A股走稳。技术上看，A股在连续缩量调整后，本周逐步回稳的概率较大。
展望未来，市场受到12月通胀回落和管理层对通胀容忍度提高的影响，对于投资者来说是不错的窗口期，尤其是短线投资者，可做一些波段性投资。当然通胀高企下加息等从紧预期依然存在，总体来看市场维持震荡。记者 崔烨

description.hltext_display: Smoking is also bad for your mental health
description.author: Madeleine Brindley
description.content:
IT’S A common idea that smoking helps to relieve stress and depression.
But research suggests the opposite may be true and that smoking could be detrimental to your mental health.
As people are preparing to make a new set of new year resolutions, Ash Wales today said the new US research adds further evidence to the health benefits of stopping smoking.
Tanya Buchanan, chief executive of Ash Wales, said: "This new research suggests that giving up smoking actually relieves symptoms of depression and pours cold water on the claim that smoking eases anxiety and depression.
"We already know that quitting smoking results in significant health benefits, but this study suggests there are also mental health benefits as well.
"There has never been a better time to quit smoking. Smoking kills around 5,650 people in Wales every year and it is the single most preventable cause of premature death.
"Smoking is an addiction and I know how hard it can be for some people to give up, but there is help and support available from Stop Smoking Wales so you don’t have to go it alone.”
Research by scientists at Brown University in the USA, suggests a clear link between quitting smoking and an enhanced mood.
The study, published in the journal Nicotine and Tobacco Research, measured smokers’ moods during their first six months of attempting to quit.
It found that those who were successful in quitting were the happiest, while those who gave up their quit attempt were the unhappiest of all the groups.
The study involved 236 heavy-drinking male and female smokers who wanted to give up smoking and looked for symptoms of depression at different stages over a 28-week period.
The researchers concluded: "During the first six months following a planned quit attempt, being abstinent in a particular week appears to be associated with lower levels of concurrent depressive symptoms.
"These results are not concordant with the view that intentional smoking abstinence exacerbates depressive symptoms.
"Efforts to promote smoking cessation should highlight that individuals are likely to feel more rather than less psychologically healthy when they successfully quit smoking.”
Previous research has linked smoking to depression – a Spanish study found that smokers are 41% more likely to suffer from depression.
The scientists, from the University of Navarra, found the direct link between tobacco and depression when monitoring 8,556 people over six years.
During the course of the study , 190 smokers who did not initially have depression were diagnosed with the common mental health problem by a doctor.
As well as being linked to depression, smoking is associated with a raft of physical health problems, which are estimated to cost the NHS in Wales £386m a year.
Wales’ chief medical officer Dr Tony Jewell said: "There are encouraging signs that attitudes towards smoking are changing and thanks to the smoking ban less people are subjected to second-hand smoke, but one in four people in Wales continue to be smokers.
"Quitting smoking can almost immediately improve your health. Within 20 minutes of your last cigarette, your blood pressure and pulse return to normal. After 24 hours, carbon monoxide is out of your body and your lungs start to clear themselves.
"After three days, you will have more energy and you will find breathing will become easier. And after one year of giving up, your risk of suffering a heart attack is reduced by half,” he added.

event_or_fact.property: Efforts to promote smoking cessation should highlight that individuals are likely to feel more rather than less psychologically healthy when they successfully quit smoking.? Previous research has linked smoking to depression ? a Spanish study found that s
This new research suggests that giving up smoking actually relieves symptoms of depression and pours cold water on the claim that smoking eases anxiety and depression.

description.hltext_display: DSM to buy US biotech company Martek for $1.09B� 21 Dec 2010
description.content:
AMSTERDAM - Royal DSM NV, the world's biggest maker of vitamins, said Tuesday it will bid $1.09 billion (€830 million) in cash for U.S. biotech firm Martek Biosciences Corp., in a management-endorsed buyout that would improve its presence on the American infant formula market.
The Dutch chemicals company's $31.50 per share offer for Martek represents a 35 percent premium to Martek's closing price on Dec. 20. In U.S. premarket trading, Martek shares surged $8.04, or 34.4 percent, to $31.40.
DSM, based in Heerlen, the Netherlands, makes nutritional supplements, fibers used in bulletproof vests, and ingredients used in vaccines, as well as industrial chemicals.
DSM's CEO Feike Sijbesma said the purchase "will add a new growth platform to our nutrition business," while Martek would benefit from DSM's larger distribution network.
Martek, based in Colombia, Maryland, sells nutritional oils, ingredients for infant formula and dietary supplements. Its customers include Danone, Nestle, Kellogg's and General Mills, among others.
DSM said its offer will begin in mid-January and is conditional on receiving a majority of shares. It expects the deal to close sometime in the second quarter.
DSM said the deal, which must also be approved by regulators, would add at least €0.15 to annual per share earnings in the first year.
Shares in DSM rose 4.5 percent to €42.845 in Amsterdam.
In November, DSM reported a third quarter net profit of €79 million, or €0.76 per share, on sales of €2.15 billion. As of Tuesday, the company has a stockpile of more than €2 billion in cash due to profits and recent sales of several low-margin businesses.
Martek earlier this month reported a fiscal fourth-quarter loss of $6.2 million on higher costs and a hefty restructuring charge linked to the sale of assets at its Winchester, Ky., manufacturing facility. Revenue rose 36 percent to $119.1 million, on higher sales of nutritional ingredients and branded consumer health products. The results topped analysts' average estimates.

event_or_fact.property: will add a new growth platform to our nutrition business

description.hltext_display: Bygdefolk sier ja til ulv
description.content:
To av tre som bor i rovdyrutsatte områder mener dagens bestandsmål for ulv er akseptabelt eller bør økes.
Tips en venn pÃ¥ e-post:
Din kommentar
Del pÃ¥ nettet:
Blant dem som ikke bor i slike områder, mener 85 prosent det samme, viser en undersøkelse, som er utført av TNS Gallup har utført i samarbeid med Norsk institutt for naturforskning (NINA). Den er den største som noen gang er gjort om nordmenns holdning til rovdyr, skriver Dagbladet.
Forskerne forteller at undersøkelsen bekrefter noe de lenge har trodd og at det er ulvemotstanderne som roper høyest.
– De fleste som er veldig mot ulv, mener det mye sterkere enn de som mener det motsatte, sier seniorforsker Ketil Skogen til avisa.
I undersøkelsen er folk i 35 rovdyrutsatte kommuner spurt, og svarene er sammenlignet med hva folk i resten av landet mener.
Undersøkelsen forteller også at 53 prosent av alle spurte at de vil akseptere ulv i nærheten av eget bosted. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: Tapin : Bahas Enam Raperda Baru
description.content:
Banjarmasinpost.co.id - Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 | Dibaca 38 kali | Komentar (0)
Foto:web
BANJARMASINPOST.CO.ID, RANTAU - Sebagian jenis pajak yang sebelumnya masuk ke pemerintah pusat dan propinsi, bakal dialihkan menjadi hak pajak daerah kabupaten. Ini menyusul akan dibahasnya sejumlah usulan rancangan peraturan daerah yang ditetapkan menjadi peraturan daerah.
Sebagaimana aturan terbaru UURI Nomor 28 Tahun 2009 Tentang Pajak Daerah dan Retribusi Daerah yang merupakan langkah strategis untuk memantapkan kebijakan fiskal dalam upaya membangun hubungan keuangan antara pemerintah pusat dan daerah yang lebih ideal.
Terkait dengan perkembangan itu, pihak eksekutif menyampaikan usulan delapan rancangan peraturan daerah (raperda). Dua di antaranya Raperda Tentang Pajak Bea Perolehan Hak Atas Tanah Bangunan (BPHTB) dan Reperda Tentang Pajak Air Tanah.
"Dalam raperda ini, pajak BPHTB yang selama ini merupakan pajak pusat dialihkan menjadi hak pajak daerah. Sedangkan Pajak Air Tanah yang selama ini masuk pajak propinsi kini dialihkan masuk pajak kabupaten," kata Bupati Tapin, H Idis Nurdin Halidi di forum rapat paripurna DPRD Tapin, Senin (20/12).
Enam raperda lainnya yang juga diusulkan bersamaan antara lain Raperda Tentang Retribusi Pemakaian Kekayaan Dareah, Raperda Tentang Pembentukan Desa Mekarsari Kecamatan Binuang, dan Raperda Tentang Perubahan Status Desa Bitahan Menjadi Kelurahan Bitahan Kecamatan Lokpaikat.
Terkait Raperda Tentang Retribusi Pemakaian Kekayaan Daerah, Pemkab Tapin telah memiliki Perda Tentang Retribusi Pemakaian Keyakayaan Daerah Perda Nomor 10 Tahun 2009.
"Namun berdasar UU Nomor 28 Tahun 2009, seluruh perda retribusi harus kembali menyesuaikan dengan undang undang tersebut sehingga perlu ada perubhan penyesuaian," jelasnya.
Penyesuaian ini di antaranya terdapat penambahan obyek retribusi yakni pemakaian laboratorium pada Badan Lingkungan Hidup (BLH) Tapin yang sudah aktif sejak pertengahan 2010 dan pemakaian lahan Taman Maunjun Fishing Park Rantau yang dikelola oleh Dinas Peternakan dan Perikanan.

description.hltext_display: FCC Adopts New Rules To Protect Web Traffic
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- A divided Federal Communications Commission has approved new rules meant to prohibit broadband companies from interfering with Internet traffic flowing to their customers.
The 3-2 vote Tuesday marks a major victory for FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski, who has spent more than a year trying to craft a compromise.
The FCC's three Democrats voted to pass the rules, while the two Republicans opposed them, arguing that they amount to unnecessary regulation. The new rules are likely to face intense scrutiny on Capitol Hill once Republicans take over the House. Meanwhile, public interest groups decried the regulations as too weak, particularly for wireless systems.
Known as "net neutrality," the rules prohibit phone and cable companies from favoring or discriminating against Internet content and services, such as those from rivals.

description.hltext_display: الملك السعودي يغادر المستشفى بنيويورك
description.content:
اعلن الديوان الملكي السعودي عن ان الملك عبدالله بن عبدالعزيز قد غادر مستشفى برسبيتريان في نيويورك بعد شهر من تلقى العلاج نتيجة اصابته بانزلاق غضروفي.
واوضح بيان صادر عن الديوان الملكي ان العاهل السعودي غادر المستشفى حيث خضع لعمليتين جراحيتين وانه بصحة جيدة وقد "توجه الى مقر اقامته بنيويورك لقضاء فترة من النقاهة واستكمال علاجه الطبيعي".
ولم يحدد البيان تاريخا لعودة العاهل السعودي البالغ من العمر 86 عاما الى المملكة.
وبث التلفزيون السعودي صورا لمغادرة الملك المستشفى وبجانبه وزير الصحة السعودي، وبدا الملك عبدالله في التسجيل مبتسما بينما كان يمشي بصعوبة داخل رواق المستشفى ويحيي الطاقم الطبي الذي عالجه، وحشدا من الحضور.
وكان الملك عبد الله وصل في 22 تشرين الثاني/نوفمبر الى نيويورك لتلقي العلاج اثر اصابته بانزلاق غضروفي وتجمع دموي حول العمود الفقري يضغط على العصب الشوكي، وقد خضع بعد يومين من وصوله الى عملية جراحية.
وقد اعلن عن نجاح العملية الاولى بيد انه خضع الى جراحة ثانية في الرابع من ديسمبر/كانون الاول الجاري لمعالجة عدد من الفقرات لديه وهي عملية كانت مقررة اصلا حسب الديوان الملكي. وقد اعلن عن نجاح العملية الثانية، ولكن لم تظهر اية اخبار اخرى عن صحة الملك السعودي حتى البيان الرسمي عن خروجه من المستشفى الاربعاء.
وتولى ولي العهد ووزير الدفاع الامير سلطان بن عبد العزيز ادارة شؤون المملكة في غياب الملك عبد الله.
وعاد الامير سلطان البالغ عمره حوالي 85 عاما من المغرب في 21 تشرين الثاني/نوفمبر لاستلام شؤون الحكم اثناء غياب العاهل السعودي، قبل يوم واحد من مغادرة الملك الى نيويورك.
وكان الامير سلطان يمضي فترة من الراحة في المغرب منذ نهاية آب/اغسطس بعد تلقيه علاجا في 2008 و2009 في الولايات المتحدة كما تقول مصادر دبلوماسية، وامضى اكثر من سنة في فترة نقاهة في الخارج.
كما يشارك ايضا في ادارة شؤون المملكة شقيق ولي العهد الامير نايف بن عبد العزيز (76 عاما) الذي يعتبر بعده في خلافة العرش ويشغل منصب النائب الثاني لرئيس الوزراء علما انه يتولى منذ 35 عاما حقيبة الداخلية.
وتنحصر خلافة الملك بين رموز العائلة المالكة ومعظمهم في السبعين او الثمانين من العمر بما في ذلك ولي العهد الامير سلطان بن عبد العزيز.

description.hltext_display: Civil Rights Groups Seek TX Schools Review
description.content:
HOUSTON -- Civil rights organizations are seeking a federal review of public school education in Texas and accuse state school administrators of violating federal civil rights laws after curriculum changes approved earlier this year by the Texas Board of Education.
The request to the U.S. Department of Education made by the Texas NAACP and Texas League of United Latin American Citizens on Monday contends the curriculum changes passed in May "were made with the intention to discriminate" and would have a "stigmatizing impact" on African-American and Latino students.
The request asks that implementation of the curriculum changes and new standardized tests be stopped.
Texas Education Agency spokeswoman Suzanne Marchman said the complaint was being reviewed. Gail Lowe, chair of the education board, said she didn't know the "specific nature of any allegations."

event_or_fact.property: she didn't know the "specific nature of any allegations.

description.hltext_display: Banjarmasin : BKD Siap Hadapi Tuntutan
description.content:
Banjarmasinpost.co.id - Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 | Dibaca 91 kali | Komentar (0)
Foto:BPost
Ilustrasi
BANJARMASINPOST.CO.ID, BANJARMASIN - Badan Kepegawaian Daerah, Pendidikan dan Pelatihan (BKD Diklat) Banjarmasin, Rabu (22/12) dilaporkan oleh H Bahruddin dan putranya Kaspul Anwar ke Polresta Banjarmasin. Laporan tersebut terkait kesalahan memasukkan data Kaspul Anwar pada pengumuman hasil seleksi CPNS Kota Banjarmasin 2010 kemarin.
"Nama anak saya sudah terpampang di koran, ternyata terjadi kesalahan. Jelas saya kecewa, kenapa bisa terjadi kesalahan ini. Saya hanya petani dan buta huruf," ujarnya yang mengaku bahwa putranya ini alumni Universitas Muhammadiyah Malang.
Tuntutan, katanya, akan tetap dilanjutkan. Dia meminta agar pihak BKD meminta maaf. Menanggapi ini, Kepala Bidang Pengembangan Pegawai, Endah Restureny dan Kepala Bidang Kesejahteraan Pegawai, Nortajidi yang mewakili Kepala BKD Diklat, HM Nispuani yang sedang dinas ke Jakarta, mengatakan bahwa pihaknya siap menghadapi tuntutan.
"Kami siap menghadapinya. Kalau nanti ada tuntutan ke polisi, kita lihat saja bagaimana perkembangannya," tegas Endah.
Nortajidi juga menambahkan bahwa ini memang murni kesalahan dari pihaknya sehingga jika pun dituntut mereka memiliki data yang sah bahwa ini memang tidak sengaja.

description.hltext_display: Be aware of differences when purchasing gift and prepaid cards
description.content:
Gift cards and other prepaid cards have become a popular gift–giving option. But they can cost more than the amount printed on the front—and they can mean costs for the gift recipient, too. The Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC) has just produced a tip sheet, Prepaid Cards: 10 Things to Consider Before Buying to help consumers learn more about prepaid cards.
There are two main types of prepaid cards. Both require you to pay up front to “load” money on to a card for later use and both are sometimes called “gift cards”. Prepaid cards from retailers can only be used at a single store or group of stores, such as a chain or a shopping mall. Other prepaid cards, usually branded with a payment card network operator’s logo, such as Visa, MasterCard or American Express, can be used with most merchants that display that network’s logo.
“The only way to find out the fees and conditions that apply to the card you’re considering is to read the information in the prepaid card agreement carefully before you buy it,” emphasized the Commissioner. “A $50 prepaid card with an activation fee of $4.95 means that you are paying close to 10 percent of the card’s value just to use it.” There may also be a fee for checking your balance, customizing, replacing or loading money onto your card. Purchase fees, a monthly maintenance fee or dormancy fees could also apply. If there is an expiry date, you may lose the money still left on the card when it expires.
There are other options. Compare the costs and benefits of using gift cards versus other forms of payment. For gift–giving, cash or a cheque might also be a good choice. If you’re buying for yourself, a debit or credit card may have lower fees or be more convenient.
To help you make this comparison, FCAC’s Bank Account Selector Tool outlines the fees that might apply to debit card transactions. For tips on how to reduce costs with your credit card, see FCAC’s Choosing the Right Credit Card for You. FCAC’s Credit Card Selector Tool has details on approximately 250 credit cards available in Canada, including more than 70 that charge no annual fee.

description.hltext_display: Vil begrense utbytte p strm
description.content:
Flåthen ønsker å begrense både hvor mye eierne kan ta ut i utbytte og hvor mye strømprodusentene kan tappe vannmagasinene, melder NRK.
– Norge er et vinterland. Vi er helt avhengige av å få levert til folket og til industrien, slik at vi ikke fryser i hjel, sier han.
Selv om produksjonen av vannkraft er lavere enn i fjor, tjener kraftselskapene fortsatt mye penger fordi prisen på kraft har økt og strømforbruket stiger.
Hver tredje krone norske strømkunder betaler havner i kassa til kraftprodusentene, og mange eksperter advarer folk mot at nyåret kan by på tidenes høyeste strømregninger. Prisene kan bli opp mot 50 prosent høyere enn de allerede høye prisene som folk opplevde forrige vinter.
– Strømselskapene betaler ut kjempeutbytter til eierne, men den ekspansive utbyttepolitikken kan bidra til at selskapene styrer produksjonen på en måte som ikke er til forbrukernes beste, sier LO-lederen, og mener at en strammere regulering av vannmagasinene gjennom hele året må til. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: Banjarmasin : Muslimah HTI Berorasi Sambut Hari Ibu
description.content:
Banjarmasinpost.co.id - Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 | Dibaca 23 kali | Komentar (0)
BANJARMASINPOST.CO.ID, BANJARMASIN - Ratusan muslimah DPD 1 HTI Kalsel mengadakan aksi orasi menyambut peringatan Hari Ibu yang jatuh hari ini, Rabu (22/12). Mereka mengusung banyak tulisan serta dua spanduk yang berisikan seruan mereka agar pemerintah kita lebih memperhatikan kaum hawa.
Aksi ini mereka lakukan di sekitar siring Jalan Jendral Sudirman. Salah satu peserta aksi, Patmawati Nabila, mengatakan bahwa aksi ini dilandasi keprihatinan mereka terhadap nasib perempuan Indonesia, baik yang di dalam negeri maupun di luar negeri.
"Sistem kapitalislah yang menyebabkan hal ini. Pemerintah kita saat ini masih menganut sistem itu. Solusinya hanya satu, yaitu menggunakan sistem yang berlandaskan khilafah islamiyah, maka seluruh perempuan akan lebih sejahtera," tandasnya. Tambahnya, dengan sistem ini maka hak-hak perempuan tidak akan tercabut.

description.hltext_display: US says Iran will try to evade sanctions
description.content:
WASHINGTON, Dec 22 (KUNA) -- The United States said Iran will try to evade the latest sanctions unveiled by the Treasury department.
"These are efforts today that are a reaction to steps that Iran has taken to try to circumvent the sanctions that we think is having an effect on Iran," said State department spokesman Philip Crowley late Tuesday.
"This is part of an ongoing game of cat and mouse between Iran and the international community," explained Crowley to reporters.
"We have significant sanctions on Iran. They don't remain static. They try to do everything they can to evade these sanctions. And as they take actions, we also take corresponding actions," he added.
The US has unveiled new sanctions against Iran, in a move to keep pressure on Iran ahead of a new round of negotiations with Tehran next month.
Tuesday's announcement by the Treasury department, targeted at Iran's main shipping line and its Revolutionary Guard Corps, also marks the way US and international sanctions now hit Iran's overall economy. (end) hy.ris KUNA 220916 Dec 10NNNN

description.hltext_display: Slr alarm om skattemoral
description.content:
For første gang har Økokrim sammen med blant andre økoteamene i politidistriktene foretatt en risikovurdering, hvor de rangerer ulike former for kriminalitet, skriver VG Nett.
Skattekriminalitet, trygdebedrageri og korrupsjon endte på toppen av lista.
– Dette er områder vi ut fra en risikobetraktning mener bør prioriteres de neste årene. Skattekriminalitet er en stor risiko for samfunnet, fordi omfanget er så enormt. Skattekrim tapper samfunnet for anslagsvis over 100 milliarder kroner. Det forteller litt om perspektivene og grunnen til at dette er et område som må prioriteres, sier Økokrim-sjef Trond Eirik Schea til VG Nett.
– Det samme gjelder trygdebedrageri. Det dreier seg om små beløp i enkeltsakene, men samlet snakker vi om milliardbeløp. Hver femte nordmann er på trygd. Funn i Sverige viser at halvparten av feilutbetalingene til trygd skyldes bevisst feilinformasjon fra søkeren. I rapporten griper politiet spesielt fatt i enkelte innvandrermiljøer.
«Mange synes å være godt kjent med sine rettigheter, men ikke fullt så godt kjent med sine plikter. I spesielle miljøer kan det synes som om misbruk av det norske trygdesystemet er akseptabelt, og det er indikasjoner på at oppskrifter på hvordan velferdsordninger kan utnyttes, sirkulerer».
– Vi ser en trend som vi synes vi bør fortelle om, sier Schea. (ANB-NTB)

description.hltext_display: Banjarmasin : Belum Izin Ke Pemko
description.content:
BANJARMASINPOST.CO.ID, BANJARMASIN - Terjualnya Hotel Istana Barito ke tangan pemilik yang baru, yaitu New Hotel Barito beberapa waktu lalu, maka harus ada perizinan operasionalnya ke Pemko Banjarmasin.
Namun, ketika dikonfirmasi, kepala Dinas Kebudayaan, Pariwisata, Pemuda dan Olahraga Banjarmasin, Hesly Junianto mengatakan hingga saat ini, pemilik yang baru belum ada izin atau melapor ke pihaknya.
"Belum ada lapor atau izin ke kami. Bahkan, pemiliknya yang baru saja saya belum tahu siapa," tegasnya ketika dihubungi, Rabu (22/12) siang.

description.hltext_display: Be a responsible host this holiday season
description.content:
‘Tis the season for holiday parties, good will, good cheer, family and friends, and alcohol is often a part of many social events during the holiday season.
It’s important to remember that alcohol is a depressant drug that impairs judgment, vision and reaction time. Numerous people are killed or injured every year in B.C. due to alcohol-related vehicle accidents.
We all have a role to play in decreasing dangerous alcohol-related situations and one way we can contribute to this is by planning ahead before we host a party where alcohol is served.
Being a good host involves planning an event that is fun, entertaining and safe for everyone. Here are a few tips for making sure your holiday party is a success:
Provide lots of food. Drinking alcohol on an empty stomach increases intoxication. By providing a wide variety of appetizers and snacks for guests to nibble on you can help slow down not only the amount of drinking but also the effects of the alcohol. Be careful not to have too many salty snacks on hand; high salt foods increase thirst and may actually encourage more drinking.
Offer non-alcoholic beverages. Consider providing a festive non-alcoholic punch or mockails (alcohol-free cocktails) for your guests to enjoy. Many of your guests will appreciate these tasty alcohol-free beverages.
Have a designated bartender. Party guests tend to drink more when there is an open bar. If you don’t have a designated bartender, encourage your guests to properly measure their drinks and keep track of how many drinks they are having.
Encourage your guests to have a designated driver. Check in with your guests about their plans to get home safely. Make sure you have phone numbers for taxis or designated driver services on hand.
Stop serving alcoholic drinks an hour before the party is over. Provide water, coffee and tea as the evening winds down; however, remember that coffee will not sober up a guest who is impaired, only time can do that.
Be prepared for overnight guests. Get the guest room ready and have extra blankets and pillows on hand.
Avoid drinking too much yourself. Not only is this good role modeling it will also make it much easier to respond to potential problems if your judgment is not compromised.
A little bit of advance planning can help make sure that everyone at your party has a terrific time and that they arrive home safely.
For more information on alcohol or other drugs or if you are concerned about your own, or someone else’s alcohol or drug use please speak with your family doctor or contact your local Mental Health and Substance Use office.
Have a safe and happy holiday season!
Vanessa Dowell is a prevention and health promotion coordinator with Mental Health and Substance Use, Interior Health.

description.hltext_display: CBS announces midseason changes, adds 3 rookies
description.content:
Prime-time leader CBS is tweaking its schedule to bring midseason shows aboard.
Joining the CBS lineup is spinoff series "Criminal Minds: Suspect Behavior," which will debut Feb. 16. Other newcomers are the comedy "Mad Love," debuting Feb. 21, and the spy drama "Chaos" starting April 1.
As part of the shuffle, the Tom Selleck police drama "Blue Bloods" will move to 10 p.m. ET Wednesday for four weeks beginning Jan. 19, then return to its 10 p.m. ET Friday home in February.
"Rules of Engagement," now airing Monday, will pair with sitcom sibling "The Big Bang Theory" on Thursday at 8:30 p.m. ET starting Feb. 24. It's replacing "(Bleep) My Dad Says" with William Shatner, which will wrap for the season.
"The Defenders," starring Jim Belushi and Jerry O'Connell, will end its season run with a shift to 8 p.m. ET Friday starting Feb. 4. CBS didn't announce whether it or the Shatner comedy will be renewed for next year.
---

description.hltext_display: Warne wants Hauritz recall
description.content:
Spin king Shane Warne is convinced Australia will take a specialist spinner into the Boxing Day Test but believes selectors have chosen the wrong man for the job in Michael Beer.
Ironically, it was Warne who first championed Beer's cause ahead of his shock inclusion in the 12-man squad for the Perth Test.
The Victorian born, Western Australian based left-arm orthodox bowler did not earn his first Baggy Green at the WACA, as Australia opted for an all-out pace attack on the way to a 267-run victory.
Beer, who has taken 16 first-class wickets at an average of 43 in seven matches, appears likely to play in Melbourne after he was retained in an unchanged squad ahead of the MCG blockbuster.
But with Ashes battled delicately poised at 1-1, Warne has called for in-form New South Welshman Nathan Hauritz to be rushed back into the side for the Melbourne and Sydney Tests.
"I think Beer was a horses for courses selection (in Perth)," Warne wrote in a newspaper blog on Wednesday.
"What has impressed me about Hauritz, he's gone back and taken wickets and made runs."
"As I said before the Test series, I think Hauritz deserves first chance and if he didn't work out, try the next in line."
"So I think it still stands that Hauritz deserves a chance for Melbourne and Sydney."
Hauritz, who was controversially dumped at the expense of Xavier Doherty before the first Test in Brisbane, has taken 19 wickets at 26.78 in six domestic first-class appearances this season.
He is also coming off consecutive centuries with the bat having smashed 146 against South Australia and 110 not out against Queensland over the past fortnight.While he doesn't agree with their choice of spinner, Warne urged selectors not to go in without a specialist tweaker.
"Historically, (the) Melbourne Test match has always needed a spinner, as you don't always pick a team for the first innings," he explained."It's hard to change a winning team but I think a spinner will play."
"The only reason a spinner won't play is if Australia want to go with five seamers, including Watson, and bowl lots of chin music at our beloved, friendly Poms."
"Remember we have Watson to bowl quick as well when conditions suit, so if we play four quicks and Watson we have five seamers."
The proud Victorian also played down suggestions the MCG curator has been instructed to spice up the wicket in a bid to ensure a repeat of the Perth result."It's a drop-in wicket so there's not much you can do to the wicket," he said. "It will be flat and hard work for the bowlers after the new ball has lost its hardness after that 30-35 over mark." "It's warm in Melbourne and staying like this for the next week so there might be a bit more grass on it at the start, but I don't think it's a conspiracy theory."
Meanwhile, Warne also backed leg-spinning all-rounder Steve Smith to perform with the ball if given an opportunity at the MCG.
"Steve Smith is an exciting, exuberant talent and great to have around the group," he said.
"His bowling is a work in progress and a bit inconsistent but hopefully he will get a chance in Melbourne and produce the goods when needed."

description.hltext_display: Louisville tops Southern Miss in Beef O'Brady's Bowl
description.content:
Dec. 22--ST. PETERSBURG -- It was a beautiful sight, Jeremy Wright streaking down the sideline, taking a kickoff back 95 yards for a touchdown that answered a touchdown and brought Louisville even with Southern Miss early in the fourth quarter.
Charlie Strong won't deny that.
But the Louisville coach admitting having another thought:
"Now we have to go play defense."
Louisville's defense had just allowed an 11-play scoring drive.
But Strong turned to his unit and told them this:
"Go win the football game."
And that's what happened.
Southern Miss had the ball three more times, two if you don't count the final possession, which began at its own 2-yard line and consisted off the final play of the night.
The Golden Eagles, which twice led by two touchdowns, had nothing left, and the Louisville Cardinals danced out of Tropicana Field after their 31-28 victory in Tuesday's Beef O'Brady's Bowl.
"This football team doesn't quit," Strong said.
The win enabled the Cardinals to finish the season 7-6, their first winning season since 2006.
It doesn't seem like much, but for a team that finished 1-6 in Big East Conference play in 2008 and 2009, it was a huge step.
Strong, the first year head coach who is the former defensive coordinator at Florida, acknowledged preseason expectations weren't high.
"People picked us to not win a conference game," he said.
Even Strong wasn't sure if his squad could win as many as four games.
Louisville's 23-16 season-opening loss to Kentucky didn't change any minds.
"I didn't know if we would win a game," Strong said.
But he leaned on a senior class that was 25 strong, and told his players that to win a game you must first expect to win a game; that adversity is part of the fun.
"The 25 seniors decided they were going to take the program and lay a foundation," Strong said.
Sitting to Strong's right in the interview room was Brandon Heath, a senior linebacker who played every snap on defense and had a game-high 10 tackles.
"I wish I could have these seniors for another season," Strong said.
Southern Miss entered the game 8-4 with wins in two of their past three bowl games. The Golden Eagles raced to leads of 14-0 and 21-7.
Before the game Strong told his players to "just give me 60 minutes."
He told his players when they fell behind that it wasn't what Southern Miss did, but what Louisville wasn't doing.
Southern Miss scored its first three touchdowns on a 32-yard pass, a 62-yard run, and a pass to quarterback Austin Davis from wide receiver Quentin Pierce on a double-reverse.
Quarterback Justin Burke brought the Cardinals back with a pair of second quarter touchdown passes, and Bilal Powell, the 10th leading rusher in the country with a 120-.9 average per game, scored on a 6-yard run just before the half to tie the score at 21-21.
"This football team, all season long, has been able to fight through adversity," Strong said. "They just don't quit."
Southern Miss took a 28-21 lead on the first play of the fourth quarter when Davis found Zeke Walters on an 8-yard scoring pass.
It was the 53rd touchdown pass of Davis' career, which pushed him past Brett Favre and Lee Roberts for most career touchdown passes in Southern Miss history.
Then came the kickoff.
Wright was told to simply follow his blocks.
He did.
The play went for 95 yards.
"It felt amazing," Wright said.
"That was huge," Southern Miss coach Larry Fedora said.
"Busted the game wide open," Strong said.
Chris Philpott's 36-yard field goal with 6:30 to play put Louisville ahead for the first time all night and proved to be the winning points in what Strong saw as a monumental victory.
"We're headed in the right direction," Strong said.
NOTEWORTHY
Johnson set bowl records for rushing yards in a game, 107, and rushing yards on one play, 62. The previous records were held by former USF quarterback Matt Grothe, who rushed for 83 yards with a long of 32, during the initial bowl played at the Trop in 2008 .... Powell finished with 87 yards rushing, 37 of which came in the fourth quarter ... The game drew 20,017 to the Trop.
-----
To see more of the Tampa Tribune or to subscribe to the newspaper, go to http://www.tampatrib.com.

description.hltext_display: Video: Freezing Weather: More Snow On The Way
description.content:
There is another bitterly cold day ahead with more heavy snow falling across central UK.
The snow will extend from north Wales, through Merseyside and Birmingham, and out to Cambridgeshire and East Anglia.
Up to 15cm could fall in some areas with the snow dying out from the West during the day, but not fading in the East until the night.
Further north, freezing fog will linger and temperatures will stay at -10C and below all day.
Devon and Cornwall are most at risk of icy roads, given the early sleet showers and surface temperatures at below freezing.
The South East will be cloudy and slightly milder at up to 3C.
Tomorrow should be drier for all, but it will feel harsh and bitter against strong northeasterly winds.
(c) Sky News 2010
More from UK News

description.hltext_display: Foodies fight with film school for space in LA
description.content:
LOS ANGELES - For a few weeks this month, Los Angeles' arugula-munching set confronted a threat that seemed as potent as any malicious insect, pathogen or pesticide-tainted produce.
Where would they get their lovingly grown, locally sourced fruits, vegetables and artisanal edibles if a parking dispute with an adjacent film school forced the Hollywood Farmers Market to move or close?
The Los Angeles Film School, which has held classes in its nine-story Sunset Boulevard building since 1999, had refused to sign off on a permit for the Sunday farmers market because it blocks an entryway into a lot where the school's growing number of students park.
At the root of the conflict were some of the city's sacred mainstays: deep agricultural ties, the entertainment business and a lack of parking in a town dominated by cars.
Even as a temporary accord last week put the threat on hold, the foodie furor offered a peek at how dependent some have become on the Hollywood market, among the largest in the region, and the smaller markets it supports in low-income communities.
While consumer demand has encouraged farmers markets to sprout like Portobello mushrooms across the U.S., the attachment to just-picked produce and those who grow it appears particularly intense in Los Angeles, seated in a county that less than a century ago was the nation's leading agricultural producer.
"When you're talking about growers and shoppers being able to complete the exchange directly, it has a lot of resonance," cookbook author and food writer Amelia Saltsman said.
The Los Angeles Film School recently added computer animation and video game production to its curricula of film and recording arts, more than doubling the size of its student body from 750 to 1,700, spokesman Antoine Ibrahim said.
The growing population has increased demand for parking spots on Sundays, when throngs of students flood the school's labs and studios, Ibrahim said. The school also plans to begin holding classes on Sundays to relieve increasing weekday class sizes, he said.
Ibrahim insisted that the school never meant for the market to be shut down. It just wanted the vendors blocking the lot to be shifted to another part of the market.
"We've always worked with them to compromise and coexist," Ibrahim said. "We don't want them to move."
But the nonprofit Sustainable Economic Enterprises of Los Angeles, which organizes the market, said the configuration being pushed by the school meant it would lose half of its 100 farmers because there wouldn't be enough space for their stalls.
Shoppers say that would diminish their experience and make them less likely to schlep from far-flung neighborhoods to the produce bazaar that draws some 10,000 customers each weekend.
"It's really sad if they were to have to close or reduce the size," said Vanessa Lee, 27, who journeys from her east Los Angeles home at least once a month to buy apples, peaches or persimmons - depending on the season - from the market. "I couldn't imagine losing any of the vendors. They're all great."
Shrinking the market would also hurt SEE-LA's ability to subsidize markets that provide fruits and vegetables to as many 2,200 people each week in poor areas such as Watts and south Los Angeles, manager Alexandra Agajanian said.
"The success of the Hollywood Farmers Market has made it possible for us to do that," SEE-LA chief executive Pompea Smith said. "It really is a well-loved institution."
SEE-LA learned in early November that it was losing its permit because it lacked the school's endorsement, although extensions have kept the market open since then.
As word spread that the market's days were numbered, the dispute drew concern even among those who couldn't see the Hollywood sign.
TV and radio news outlets aired stories. The Los Angeles Times editorialized that "the market must be saved." City Councilman Eric Garcetti, whose district includes the market, received e-mails, calls and office visits from concerned shoppers and constituents.
Word came Thursday evening that a meeting between the market, the school and Garcetti's office had yielded an agreement that would keep the market open until April 12 while its organizers and the film school seek a permanent solution to the parking problem.
The school will look at building another way into the lot. SEE-LA, meanwhile, will hire a planner to see if there's a way to move the stalls to create access into the lot and still fit in all the farmers.
"I think this is a fair approach," Smith said. "As long as it doesn't decrease the connectivity among the blocks of the market and doesn't decrease the number of farmers and doesn't decrease the safety of the market customers, I think it will be fine."

description.hltext_display: Ruth’s party jets seniors off on imaginary travel
description.content:
Every Wednesday, at precisely 1 p.m., retiree Ruth Benson from 100 Mile House takes elderly residents at Mill Site Lodge on an imaginary trip to some exotic place in the world.
It could be to a luau in Hawaii, Mardi Gras in New Orleans or to the North Pole to visit Santa.
Whatever the destination, it’s done through costumes, songs, dance, photographs and props that Benson has gathered and compiled during the past seven years she has been doing this.
She has 52 theme packages stored in individual plastic bins, making sure every week of the year covered. Money for everything she buys comes out of her own pocket and her performances are all done on a volunteer basis.
It all started when her mother-in-law was a resident of Fischer Place senior care facility.
“I realized people there would appreciate entertainment and felt like I wanted to do it.”
Benson had plenty of experience entertaining, having
been one half of the former “She and I” disc jockey service she and husband, Ron Benson, ran several years ago. They always dressed in theme to suit the occasion as well.
Building on that, Ruth gathered supplies for costumes and props at yard sales, thrift stores, regular retail stores and she made a lot herself, too.
She bought a computer, ghetto blaster and speakers for downloading and playing music during her performances, and last Christmas, she asked for a scanner, which she uses to scan photos for the slideshows that accompany each show.
Ruth says she has her regulars, and at the start of every
performance, which she calls “Ruth’s Party,” she pretends they are on a plane, jetting off to their next destination.
Benson has 14 grandchildren, and when possible, she’ll bring them along to join in with the performance.
Her elaborate costumes, dancing and singing all help to spark imaginations and often, she’ll pass out small props or something wearable to her audience to draw them in deeper.
“They’re sitting there, waiting to go somewhere and I give them the feeling that they get to travel. I take them all over the world.”
Usually, people join in with the singing.
“We interact like we’re family. I’m kind of like their kid, and we play together. This brings out everything that is healthy and good in people, like joy, excitement and imagination. I feel so blessed to have the opportunity to have so much fun.”

description.hltext_display: Explosão em obra da transposição deixa 3 mortos
description.author: Agência Estado
description.content: Uma explosão no início da noite de ontem no lote 12 do canteiro de obras da transposição do Rio São Francisco, no município de Sertânia, a 316 quilômetros do Recife, provocou a morte de três trabalhadores. Outros 10 ficaram feridos, três deles em estado grave. De acordo com o delegado de plantão da área, Édson Augusto Lins de Andrade, até as 23 horas os corpos ainda não haviam sido removidos do local, aguardando a chegada de peritos do Instituto de Criminalística. "Somente depois da perícia, os corpos serão removidos para o Instituto de Medicina Legal (IML) de Caruaru", afirmou ele.Inquérito policial será instaurado para investigar de que forma ocorreu a explosão, o tipo de explosivo usado e se houve algum tipo de negligência. Lins de Andrade preferiu não especular sobre o que teria motivado o acidente. Cauteloso, disse que qualquer informação seria "precipitada antes do laudo pericial".A área foi isolada por bombeiros e policiais civis. Os feridos foram socorridos para o Hospital de Sertânia. Em estado grave, três deles foram removidos para o hospital de Arcoverde, na região. O canteiro de obras integra o Eixo leste da transposição, - uma das principais obras do governo federal - que terá 220 quilômetros de canais que irão captar água do rio em Itaparica (BA) para abastecer o agreste de Pernambuco e Paraíba. O Eixo Norte terá 400 quilômetros e vai captar água em Cabrobó (PE) para abastecer o sertão de Pernambuco, Paraíba, Ceará e Rio Grande do Norte. A previsão é de que na sua totalidade, quando concluída, a obra irá beneficiar 12 milhões de pessoas nos quatro Estados.

description.hltext_display: Yale Gets $50M Gift For Management School
description.content:
NEW HAVEN, Conn. -- A member of Yale University's Class of 1964 has given a $50 million gift to the Ivy League school toward the construction of a new building at the School of Management.
The gift from Edward P. Evans, the former chairman and CEO of the Macmillan publishing house, will fund a portion of the estimated $189 million construction costs. The building will be named after Evans.
University officials say it's the largest gift ever to the School of Management.
Yale President Richard Levin says the large losses in the university's endowment during the recession has prompted the school to secure funding before new projects start.
Officials say the new building is expected to open in 2013 and allow the graduate school to add 200 more students.
___
Information from: New Haven Register, http://www.nhregister.com

description.hltext_display: Conference that studies how labor migrants' remittances could boost Kyrgyzstan's economic growth held in Bishkek
Businessman driving plans for £15m golf course
description.author: Sion Barry
description.content:
ONE of Wales’ most successful businessmen is to put forward plans for a new £15m golf course just outside Cardiff.
Sir Stan Thomas, former chairman of airports group TBI, hopes to build the championship-class course on 250 acres of land he owns at Michaelston-y-Fedw.
Detailed plans include an 18-hole course, three par-three courses and a clubhouse the size of that at Newport’s Celtic Manor, which hosted the Ryder Cup earlier this year. The course and clubhouse have been designed by Cardiff-based architects Holder Mathias.
Part of the proposed course, running alongside the M4, comes under the control of Cardiff council. But the majority comes under Newport council, which will consider the application.
It is thought Merthyr-born Sir Stan is also looking to strike a deal with members of Cardiff Golf Club in Cyncoed.
This would see him acquire around half of the club’s land with a view to alternative use – potentially a high-quality housing development.
However, it is understood that no formal approach has been made.
If a formal approach is made the club’s committee could then decide to put any plans to the wider membership of around 900, although under the constitution of the club it could decide to make an executive decision without referral to the wider membership.
Any formal bid is expected to offer a significant financial package – believed to be millions of pounds – for the land and then effectively giving the club a new home at Michaelston-y-Fedw. And the club, which was established in the 1920s, would also be given the option of keeping 10 holes of its existing course and the clubhouse.
If Cardiff Golf Club rejected any formal offer from Sir Stan he could potentially approach other golf membership clubs in the region with a view to a land deal and providing a new home at Michaelston-y-Fedw.
Sir Stan, who is returning to live in South Wales next year from his current home in Jersey, declined to comment yesterday.

description.hltext_display: Activision targets EA in $400 million lawsuit
description.content:
LOS ANGELES --
Activision Blizzard Inc., the video game maker behind the smash-hit shooter "Call of Duty: Black Ops," on Tuesday added a new target in its lawsuit against two former executives: rival Electronic Arts Inc. Activision also put a price tag on its claim for the first time, seeking $400 million.
The amended complaint filed in the Los Angeles Superior Court is the latest salvo in a legal shootout that began when Jason West and Vince Zampella sued Activision for $36 million in March, claiming Activision fired them to avoid paying royalties for their work on the "Call of Duty" franchise.
Activision, owned by France's Vivendi SA, claims EA lured the men away, starting as early as July 2009, despite their having two years left on their contract, in part by using talent agency Creative Artists Agency as an intermediary. It alleges EA dispatched a private jet to Southern California to shuttle West and Zampella to a secret meeting at the home of EA's chief executive John Riccitiello near San Francisco in August 2009.
The two later formed Respawn Entertainment, hiring about 40 employees away from Activision. Respawn said in April it will create games exclusively for release by EA.
In the complaint, Activision alleges that EA intentionally interfered with contracts, engaged in unfair competition and aided and abetted breaches of fiduciary duty by the executives.
EA, which is based in Redwood City, did not immediately respond to a request for comment.
West and Zampella did not directly work on the "Black Ops" game, which Activision said Tuesday had exceeded $1 billion in global sales. The men's unit at Activision, Infinity Ward, works on roughly every other game in the "Call of Duty" franchise with Activision subsidiary Treyarch.
Shares of Activision, which is based in Santa Monica, rose 10 cents to $12.33 in after-hours trading on Tuesday, after closing up 2 cents at $12.23. Electronic Arts shares were unchanged in extended trading after closing up 8 cents at $15.93.

description.hltext_display: Lkw-Maut: Auf Bundesstraßen ab Juli 2011
description.content:
Der Bund will die Lkw-Maut ab Sommer 2011 auf vierspurige Bundesstraßen ausdehnen. SPD kritisiert den Verzicht auf eine öffentliche Ausschreibung.
Ursprünglich war geplant, die Erweiterung der Lkw-Maut bereits ab 1. Januar umzusetzen. Neuer Stichtag soll nun der 1. Juli 2011 sein. Der verkehrspolitische Sprecher der SPD-Bundestagsfraktion, Uwe Beckmeyer, hat nun in einer Erklärung kritisiert, dass Bundesverkehrsminister Peter Ramsauer (CSU) bei der Ausdehnung der Lkw-Maut auf vierspurige Bundesstrassen auf eine europaweite Ausschreibung des Konzessionsvertrags verzichten will. „Das ist rechtlich höchst zweifelhaft und die Begründung der Bundesregierung dafür ist ohne Substanz“, so Beckmeyer.
Das Argument, dass eine Direktvergabe möglich sei, da durch die Ausdehnung der Lkw-Maut lediglich Ausweichverkehre verhindert werden sollen, werde durch die Bundesregierung selbst widerlegt. Beckmeyer: „Laut des eigenen Berichtes der Bundesregierung zur Begutachtung der Mautausweichverkehre liegen diese nur auf wenigen Bundesstrassen vor. Die vorgesehene Ausdehnung der Lkw-Maut auf ein Streckennetz von knapp 2000 km Bundesstrassen geht weit darueber hinaus. Somit ist die Begründung rechtlich fragil.“ (tbu)

description.hltext_display: Board of Education Modifies Harrassment Policy
description.content:
11:57 PM
The board says its updating its policy on harassment.
Email | Bio | Other Stories by Mike Krafcik
MORGANTOWN -- The Monongalia County Board of Education is taking a closer look at school bullying.
It voted tonight to modify its policy on harassment and violence and staff protection.
It says it's wants to update the policy-- to address modern concerns about Internet issues and cyber bullying.
The board says the updated policy will allow educators better to recognize, intervene, and report cyber bullying.
"We realize this is an important issue, we try to address it in relationship to what we can and can't do. So, we wanna make sure we have our policies in line in terms of what we can or can't do in our schools," said Frank Devono, Monongalia County Schools superintendent.
The Centers for Disease Control says 21 percent of public schools have reported bullying in the past 12 months.

description.hltext_display: Pine Crest boys reclaim title at Kruel Classic
description.content:
Although two-time Gatorade National Player of the Year Brandon Knight was missing from what has become the customary Pine Crest boys' celebratory tournament championship picture Tuesday, the camera flashed.
Led by tournament MVP Traveon Henry, who had 23 points and eight assists, the new-look Panthers took a big step in establishing its post-Knight identity with a 103-75 victory over John I. Leonard in the Kreul Classic Coral Springs Challenge championship game at Coral Springs City Gymnasium.
"Winning the Kreul was big because we are trying to establish our own mark," said Henry, who was Knight's backcourt running mate for three seasons. "We felt like we had to win this. This is the exclamation point. Everybody knows Pine Crest basketball is back."
Romas Marcinkevicious had 22 points and Kalvin Cline added 20 points for the Panthers (9-1).
Senior guard Keith Parkinson added 12 points, but it was his defense against Lancers guard William Sparkman in the second half that secured the first tournament title since Knight, who led the Panthers to a pair of state titles, left for Kentucky.
Sparkman torched the Panthers for six three-pointers and 23 points in the first half before Parkinson took on the challenge and held the wiry sharp-shooter to 10 points after in the second half.
"We had to slow him [Sparkman] down a little bit," Parkinson said. "We denied the ball from him. They told us he was a shooter, but we didn't know he could shoot that good. We know we don't have Brandon scoring all those points so we have to get a lot of our points off fast break and defense."HERITAGE FALLS SHORT
American Heritage put the ball in the hands of 6-5 freshman standout Kobe Eubanks with 14.6 seconds left and trailing Holy Trinity (N.Y.) 50-49 in the Kreul Classic Publix Challenge championship game.
Eubanks got the isolation play he has thrived on all season but was called for a traveling violation, ending the the Patriots' wild fourth-quarter rally with a 52-49 loss.
"Our team has a lot of heart," said Patriots guard Ryan Andino, who scored a game-high 24 points, including five three-pointers. "Coach told us to fight back and we fought back. We just didn't have enough at the end. We had our chances. We are on definitely going to build on this."
Eubanks finished with nine points and fellow all-tournament selection Mikon Hewitt added six points and six assists.
Heritage (4-4) trailed 46-37 with 2:46 left, but found a spark from Ryan Andino. The sophomore guard had a steal and assist to Eubanks for a three-point play and then brought the Patriots bench to its feet with a pair of three-pointers, the second which cut the lead to 50-48 with 42 seconds left.
"I was feeling it, I felt confident," Andino said. "It was just like a knockdown shot to me."
Andino then split a pair of free throws after Titans guard Nick Ferreiro got called for a technical foul, setting the stage for Eubanks to play hero.
Jason Oder hit a pair of free throws to push the margin to 52-49 with 13.3 seconds left and Hewitt missed a three-point attempt as time expired.

description.hltext_display: Sorghum Checkoff Board Announces New Officers
description.content:
LUBBOCK, Texas – The United Sorghum Checkoff Program announces the election of four new officers to the Sorghum Checkoff board of directors. The officers were elected during the Sorghum Checkoff’s annual meeting in Lubbock, Texas, on Dec. 15, 2010.
The Sorghum Checkoff welcomes Bill Kubecka of Palacious, Texas, as the new board chairman, Stewart Weaver of Edmondson, Ark., as vice chairman, Greg Shelor of Minneola, Kan., as secretary, and Earl Roemer of Healy, Kan., as treasurer.
“I am honored to serve as the next chairman of the Sorghum Checkoff board of directors and proud of the progress the checkoff has made in the past two years,” said newly elected Chairman Bill Kubecka. “I would like to thank the outgoing officers for their time and congratulate them on the board’s accomplishments thus far. I look forward to continuing work on behalf of producers to improve the sorghum industry.”
The Sorghum Checkoff board of directors met in Lubbock, Texas, Dec. 13-15 to conduct business and approve projects for the coming months. During the board meeting, four board members were reappointed to the board by USDA for another term representing their fellow producers. Jeff Casten of Quenemo, Kan., Dale Artho of Wildorado, Texas, Troy Skarke of Claude, Texas, and Earl Roemer of Healy, Kan., were all reappointed to the Sorghum Checkoff board by Secretary of Agriculture Tom Vilsack and were congratulated by Craig Shackelford, who represented USDA-AMS at the meeting. The Sorghum Checkoff board members are nominated by certified state organizations and appointed by the Secretary of Agriculture.

description.hltext_display: Something to believe is important part of healing process
description.content:
It is not news to anyone that we have many opportunities to believe in many things today, whether it is a particular dogma, a religion or even Santa and the Easter bunny.
I will say that your very beliefs will either make you sick, or they will heal you.
Who among us has not gone through stressful times or suffered some sort of set back in their life? That is just part of being alive and human.
It is our beliefs that get us through these times, while it is our beliefs that hurl us even deeper into despair.
The thought that “nobody loves me” or “nobody cares” can do irreparable damage to our well being, whereas the thought “I will get through this” or “I have many friends and loved ones” will heal like never imagined.
We have the most powerful healing modality available to us—our mind.
Every person is a product of their beliefs that structured their early years. The great thing is you are not stuck with any of it, you can change it.
When I talk about beliefs I don’t mean religion. I speak of beliefs in deities, spiritual beings or Santa.
I speak of the belief that you are well and deserving of healing; that there is no entity that will strike you down with lightening because you do not deserve to be well.
True healing begins within and continues on from there.
True sickness begins with the belief that we have this circumstance and the outcome is predetermined.
As we should always realize, this is not the case.
Some people ask what if I don’t believe in anything in particular or if I do not ask inner questions about my beliefs, how does that affect me?� All I can say is belief becomes substance, so possibly you are vulnerable to a variety of outcomes.
In this day and age, we are surrounded by a myriad of technologies and treatment options available to us for the multitude of sicknesses that could potentially take over our lives. Yet it seems we are falling backwards into an abyss of disease and confusion more than ever.
What then is the solution? The solution lies within our mind. We are capable of much more.
People place too many limits on what they can do.
Learning to believe in ourselves and our abilities is a hard job that never ends.
However, once we get into the habit, the healing takes over.
Homeopathic medicine in its true form maps the beliefs of each individual to see where the disharmony may have started within the individual’s life.
The well prescribed homeopathic remedy does not change your beliefs.
It lets you rid yourself of the blocks that hold you from opening up to new beliefs that are essential to your healing and trashing the ones that do not serve you anymore, much like defragging your hard drive on your computer and emptying the recycle container.
So, as we ascend into the Christmas season, the gift you can offer to yourself may in fact be the quietness of the winter solstice night and positive thoughts of self-healing in the coming year.
John Sherman is a professional homeopath in Kelowna.
250-764-2487
cedarlake@telus.net

description.hltext_display: Conférence de Cancun: Retour de la délégation malgache
description.content:
Bernard Ignace Ramarokoto, secrétaire général du ministère de l’Environnement et des Forêts a réuni les médias hier à son bureau à Ampandrianomby, après avoir dirigé une délégation malgache à une importante mission environnementale à l’extérieur, notamment à la 16ème Conférence des Parties (COP) à la CCNUCCC et à la 6ème COP au Protocole de Kyoto qui s’est tenue à Cancun, Mexique, du 29 novembre au 10 décembre derniers.
En effet, étant partie contractante à la CCNUCC en 1998 et au PK en 2003, notre pays participe activement à la recherche de solutions et de moyens de lutte contre le changement climatique. L’objectif malgache en question, est de faire en sorte que le changement climatique ne devienne pas une entrave au développement. La campagne de reboisement qui a débuté officiellement lundi dernier à Antsirabe constitue en cela un effort non négligeable : dorénavant et selon les directives du ministre, le reboisement se fera à grande échelle, en utilisant des moyens adéquats.

article.source: La Gazette de la Grand Ile

description.hltext_display: Zoopla.co.uk: Property Values in Britain Rise by £130 Billion in...
description.content:
2010 is likely to be recorded as a very mixed year in the property market, one that beat many expectations in terms of house price stability but failed to excite anyone in terms of the volume of transactions as a result of the lack of available finance. The latest figures from leading property information website Zoopla.co.uk, show that the value of the average home in Britain grew by £4,978 over 2010 (£13.64 per day), up 2.36% from £210,846 last December to £215,824 today.
The overall gain for British property owners in 2010 was £130 billion, with the value of housing stock in Britain rising to £5.55 trillion, up from £5.42 trillion one year ago, still some £550 billion below its peak at the end of 2007.
Whilst the first half of this year showed strong growth in house prices, with the average home in Britain reaching a high of £219,106 in August, the market has since cooled with values falling back to £215,824 and giving up almost half the gains made since the beginning of the year.
Different parts of Britain have also shown a wide disparity over the year, with the average home in England gaining £6,483 (2.96%) over the year whilst property values have fallen in both Wales and Scotland by £5,438 (3.42%) and £2,898 (1.79%) respectively.
Homeowners in Rutland, Oxfordshire and Cambridgeshire have most to celebrate this year having all seen average property prices increase by over 7% in 2010. At the other end of the scale, it has not been a good year for homeowners in South Lanarkshire, Lincolnshire or West Yorkshire where average house prices have fallen by over 2.5% during 2010.
Nicholas Leeming, Commercial Director of Zoopla.co.uk, said: “We saw a fast run up in house prices during the first part of the year propelled by a shortage of supply. And the increases seen in England have been very skewed towards London and the South. Whilst the market has cooled a bit over the last half of the year, an extra £5,000 on the value of the average British home is good news and defies many predictions made at the start of the year.”
For further information, please contact:
Lawrence Hall at lawrence(dot)hall(at)zoopla(dot)co(dot)uk or on 020 7620 4618
About Zoopla.co.uk
Zoopla.co.uk is the UK’s most comprehensive property website, focused on empowering consumers with the resources they need to make better-informed property decisions. We help our users make sense of the residential property market by combining property listings with market value data, local information and community tools. Zoopla.co.uk was founded on the principles of transparency and efficiency and everything we do aims to make the market more effective for both property consumers and professionals alike.
By combining free, instant value estimates for every UK home with sold prices, local market information and hundreds of thousands of properties available for sale and to rent, Zoopla.co.uk has become the ultimate destination for property consumers to search for property and do their market research. We are the UK's fastest growing property website and are proud to have been named 'Best Property Portal 2009' (Daily Mail UK Property Awards).
