description.hltext_display: Campaigners’ final plea to save cinema
description.author: Peter Collins
description.content:
A BATTLE to stop an historic cinema being replaced by a care flats complex is entering its final stages.
Tension is mounting as film lovers and cinema preservationists fight to stop the demolition of the 100-year-old Theatre Royal cinema in Barry.
The drama is likely to come to a climax early next year when plans to demolish the cinema and build a 40-flat "extra care” complex on the site go before Vale of Glamorgan councillors.
A public meeting on the plans was yesterday held at Barry Memorial Hall, opposite the Theatre Royal building, by developers Hafod Care Association.
In a lively, if sparsely attended, meeting it soon became clear that those who want to see the Theatre Royal re-opened were never going to be convinced by Hafod’s scheme.
Paul Sutton, of the Save Our Cinema action group, said: "We are certainly not averse to extra care facilities in Barry.
"But we do feel that there are more suitable locations in the town.
"Considering the lack of entertainment facilities in the town, it would be a shame to demolish the Theatre Royal.”
Hafod has promised that the care complex will be a landmark building with a cafe, hair salon, launderette and other facilities for the community.
Dafydd Cantwell, land acquisition officer for Hendre Ltd, development agent fro Hafod, said it has not consulted the Theatres Trust, which has put the Theatre Royal on its "at risk” register, or the Cinema Theatres Association about the development because the building had not been used as a cinema for three years.
He said: "Other sites were looked at but they did not have the density. They were too small.”
Architect Ed Green said: "It will be a landmark building. It is in a fantastic location for people with mobility problems.”
Jon Williams, of the Cinema Theatre Association, said: "It is a tragedy that this building is being taken away from Barry. We have already lost loads of cinemas in Cardiff.”

description.hltext_display: 19 óra után kaptam egy vihart, feladtam
description.author: Dulai Péter
description.content:
Dulai Péter | 2010. december 22., szerda 09:00 Mányoki Attila hosszútávúszó idén 100 km-t akart teljesíteni tengeren, egyhuzamban, de az időjárás nem engedte. A lényeg fejben dől el, de ha a kísérői nem elég jók, lehetetlen jól úszni. Január 5-én Athénba utazik versenyre. "Nekem az első úszás mindig picit nehezen megy. A Velencei-tavon a második volt a legkönnyebb és egyben legrövidebb is. A harmadik a lehető legnehezebb, erre nagyon sokáig fogok emlékezni. A tizenhét fokos víz, a közel 50 km/órás szél és a vele járó hullámok miatt a legnehezebb úszásom volt. Az utolsó állomás a Tisza-tó volt, ott már a fáradtság dominált, sokat kivett belőlem az az egy hónap. Az úszások között folyamatosan edzettem és abban a négy hétben közel 300 km-t úsztam." Nem a 2008-as Balatonkenese-Keszthely táv volt az eddigi leghosszabb úszása, de az volt a legnehezebb. "Folyóban úsztam távolságra kicsit többet, de azt nem lehet a Balatonnal összehasonlítani, mert a folyóban kilenc-tíz órát töltöttem, a Balaton 25 óra 32 perc volt. Eddig ez volt a legnehezebb úszásom."
"A legfontosabb, hogy az ember tudja, mire képes. A bennem levő erőt a legjobban kell tudnom kihasználni, de az egész fejben dől el. A mentális része mellett még mindig erősen befolyásoló tényező az időjárás, illetve hogy a kísérőhajón levő személyzet hogyan teljesít. Ez csapatmunka, én hiába vagyok elég erős a kitűzött feladathoz, ha a kíséretem nem teljesít jól. A vízből Nem látok semmit, ezért a hajóban és a személyzetben maximálisan meg kell bíznom. Én arra úszom, amerre ők irányítanak. Szerencsére az elmúlt években az itthoni úszásaim alkalmával ugyanaz a hajó és személyzet kísér. Rengeteg plusz úszástól tudnak megkímélni."
A táplálkozás versenyenként változik, függ attól, hogy hideg vagy meleg a víz, tengerben vagy édesvízben úszik, hosszú vagy rövid a verseny. "Ki kell tapasztalni, hogy a szervezetemnek mi a megfelelő. A legnagyobb mennyiségben energiaitalt fogyasztok."
"Idén az volt a fő célom, hogy megállás nélkül ússzak 100 km-t tengeren. Sajnos Görögországban 19 óra úszás után éjszaka bekaptam egy nagyon komoly vihart, és ki kellett jönnöm a vízből. Fantasztikusan ment az úszás, csalódott voltam. Nehéz elfogadni, hogy rajtam kívülálló dolog miatt kelljen véget vetni az egész kísérletnek. Jelenleg ez motivál, hogy jövőre újra belevágjak, mert éreztem, hogy valóban képes vagyok megcsinálni. Annyi jó volt viszont ebben a 19 órás úszásban, hogy tudom, elég az a fajta és mennyiségű edzés a cél eléréséhez."
Címkék: mányoki attila,

description.hltext_display: El Rey saudí abandona el hospital de Nueva York
description.content:
Añadir a favoritos

Introduce tu crítica sobre esta noticia
El Rey Abdulá de Arabia Saudí ha abandonado el hospital de Nueva York en que fue intervenido de la columna vertebral y su salud es "buena", según informó este miércoles la agencia de noticias del Reino, SPA.
"El Rey Abdulá salió del Hospital Presbiteriano el martes por la tarde y Dios le ha concedido buena salud", indicó la Saudi Press Agency. "Se ha trasladado a su lugar de residencia en Nueva York para recuperarse y continuar con la terapia médica", añadió, sin precisar cuándo regresará a Arabia Saudí.
El monarca fue sometido a principios de este mes a una operación quirúrgica para estabilizar una vértebra en su médula espinal. El Rey, cuya edad oscila entre los 86 y los 87 años, había sido operado anteriormente en noviembre, también en Nueva York, a causa de un coágulo de sangre que había complicado sus problemas discales.
El príncipe heredero Sultán, cuya salud también está delicada, se ha visto obligado a regresar a Palacio para gobernar el país mientras se recupera el monarca. El Rey Abdulá, sexto monarca de la dinastía que gobierna Arabia Saudí, accedió al trono en 2005.

description.hltext_display: Caerphilly River of Light Parade to go ahead
description.author: Wendy Horton
description.content:
CAERPHILLY’S River of Light Parade will go ahead tomorrow night.
Despite the bad weather, the parade will start at 6pm followed by a firework display but the event will be on a smaller scale than usual.
Organisers say the weather has left some roads treacherous to walk on.
This afternoon planners are expected to reschedule the starting point of the parade and which route it is expected to take.
People are being advised to telephone Caerphilly Information Centre on 029 2088 0011 to find out more about the rescheduled route.

description.hltext_display: 地产股昨发力引股市大涨
description.content:
2010-12-22 08:26 来源：大洋网-广州日报 作者：张忠安 进入 股吧 专家在线 行业牛股
昨日地产股在业绩的支撑下全线崛起，包括万科A、保利地产等龙头股在内的10只地产股涨停。而就在此前两天，国土资源部刚刚下发通知，要求坚决抑制少数城市地价过快上涨趋势。
屋漏偏逢连夜雨。一边是股价大跌市值缩水，一边是研究机构大幅调低估值
[前进中的阵痛][吴敬琏再度发话 批评中国股市处“强盗贵族时代”]
[中国股市20年风雨不断成长][韩朝紧张局势让A股受惊吓]
[半岛局势紧张 A股短期将受影响][外围扰动 A股长下影后震荡延续]
A股为何心里“打鼓” | “地震”后估值不高大盘重归平静
政策重组助军工业腾飞 | 机构亿元抢筹牛股 两类股有大戏
三大周期叠加震荡把握四维机会 |掘金路线图三大类股票池
近期开发商频传“喜讯”，记者从相关渠道了解到，恒大地产目前的销售已经突破500亿元，成为第三个迈入500亿俱乐部的大型房企。此外，在业绩稳步增长下，昨日地产股全线崛起，万科A、保利地产〔股吧 行情〕、招商地产〔股吧 行情〕等10只个股涨停，板块全天大涨4.74％。业内分析师认为，受政策打压许久的房地产板块似乎已跌无可跌，趋势性估值修复行情可期。
目前国内大型上市房企再度扩容。记者昨日从相关渠道了解到，2010年12月18日，恒大集团今年年度销售额成功突破500亿元人民币大关，成为该公司上市后的一大跨越。这使得今年上市房企的500亿军团再添新军，而此前该军团仅万科和保利两家。
在今年国家房地产调控如此严厉的情况下，恒大、万科等开发商的销售业绩却屡创新高，其中，万科连续多个月单月销售超过百亿元，也成为中国首个年销售额超过千亿元的地产航母。对此，业内分析人士表示，从万科和恒大公布的销售情况看，主要贡献来源于受调控影响较小的二三线城市。今年万科又新进入了昆明、贵阳、唐山、吉林、廊坊、扬州、烟台、乌鲁木齐、清远等二三线市场。
而恒大地产上月在港交所发布的销售报告也显示，自2004年恒大全面进军二线城市后，已经成为中国覆盖省会城市最多的开发商。目前公司在售项目达到56个，其中非省会城市三线市场已开盘项目达4个，三线城市贡献率逐渐提高。“一线城市调控，必然有大量资金被挤出，这些资金也会助推二三线城市房地产的发展。”业内表示。
地产股估值修复行情可期
昨日，沉寂多时的地产股突然发力，全线上扬，多只个股放量涨停，地产指数全天上涨6.73%。万科A等10只个股强势涨停。
业内有分析人士表示，昨日地产股走好主要是最近的销售数据向好，加上该板块估值偏低，在“加息等利空未出便是利好”的刺激下，全面上涨。在消息面上，北京市房地产交易管理网数据显示，截至12月18日，2010年北京二手房住宅成交总套数达19.25万套，虽然比2009年成交量下降28.8%，但由于成交均价同比上涨逾40%，二手住宅交易总额已达3573亿元，比2009年全年交易额增加71亿元，创下历史新高。
多家证券机构分析也认为，受政策打压许久的房地产板块似乎已经跌无可跌。渤海证券分析师陈慧表示，房地产行业较低的估值水平已较充分反映了政策的压力，房地产整体业绩仍将保持较高增长。

description.hltext_display: Viking Line vahvisti laivatilauksen Turun telakalta
description.content: Viking Linen laivatilaus STX Finlandin Turun telakalta on varmistunut. Vikingin mukaan sopimus astui voimaan tänään, kun osapuolet sopivat sen ehdoista. Aiesopimus tehtiin lokakuussa. Yksi niistä oli Viking Linelle myönnettävä 28 miljoonan euron ympäristötuki, josta liikenne- ja viestintäministeriö päätti eilen. Uusi risteilijä maksaa noin 240 miljoonaa euroa. Sen rakentaminen tuo Turun telakalle noin 2 600 henkilötyövuotta. Viking Linen ja STX Finlandin sopimus sisältää myös option toisesta laivasta.

description.hltext_display: Bloom Avenue Chooses Ignify eCommerce and Microsoft Dynamics AX ERP...
description.content:
Ignify, a global provider of e-commerce and ERP and CRM solutions, announced that Bloom Avenue has chosen Ignify eCommerce and Microsoft Dynamics AX to power a new online storefront that allows visitors to order and ship flowers, plants and gift baskets for any occasion around the country. Highlighted features include quick image views, pre-ordering for valentines and other holidays, specified delivery dates and order tracking capabilities.
“We chose Ignify because of its outstanding track record for improving the usability experience for shoppers which is critical for repeat visits,” said Kevin Hall, President of Bloom Avenue. “By coupling Ignify eCommerce with the Microsoft Dynamics ERP solution, we have made it easy for customers to choose the perfect flowers based on price, occasion or style, add personalized flare and have delivered to anywhere in the country on a date of their choosing.”
Ignify eCommerce is an end-to-end online storefront and business commerce platform and has been widely deployed in the largest companies and institutions around the globe. The platform transparently integrates with most ERP, CRM and back office systems critical to marketing and other departments who can leverage its power to gauge sales trends by monitoring real-time inventory reports, promotions and customer purchasing patterns. The platform addresses online fraud and major security concerns by meeting all requirements specified in the Payment Application Data Security Standard (PA DSS) set by the PCI Security Standards Council.
“Improving the shoppers experience to browse merchandise and checkout will always remain the number one priority for online retailers, stated Sandeep Walia, CEO of Ignify. “Bloom Avenue’s site literally makes ordering flowers as easy as a few mouse clicks. In addition, internal departments can utilize Ignify eCommerce to monitor web analytics and run targeted promotions that improve conversions and revenue through the web store.”
Ignify eCommerce has been deployed in over 200 medium to large retail and distribution businesses including apparel, automotive, consumer electronics, footwear, office equipment, sports teams, footwear.
About Bloom Avenue
We are a passionate and dedicated team of flower, customer care, ecommerce and social media experts dedicated to serving you, our customers. We believe with body, mind and soul that flowers have the power to bring joy into your lives. In good times and bad, we want to earn your trust, and be there for you not once, not twice, but for a lifetime.
While our company is physically located at the corner of Tenth and 37th in New York City, the online nature of our business makes it possible for us to be virtually everywhere. Working with the very best floral, customer care, technology and social media partners allows us to serve you wherever you are in the world with delivery anywhere in the United States. More information available at http://www.bloomavenue.com or on twitter at http://twitter.com/bloomavenue or on facebook at http://www.facebook.com/bloomavenue
About Ignify
Ignify is a privately-held ISO 9001 certified company focused on the mid-market and enterprise business space for ERP, CRM and eCommerce implementations. The company provides design, consulting and implementation services for ERP, CRM initiatives for mid-market and enterprise businesses. Ignify is a Top-tier Microsoft Gold Certified partner ranked in both the Microsoft Dynamics Inner Circle and the Microsoft Dynamics Presidents Club in 2009. Ignify offers a comprehensive set of Business to Business (B2B) and Business to Consumer (B2C) eCommerce solutions for increasing online sales while lowering overall operation costs. Ignify has offices in Los Angeles, Silicon Valley, Nashville, Chicago, Toronto, Manila, Pune and Bangalore. For more information, visit http://www.ignify.com or call 888-446-4395 Twitter: @ignifydax, @ignifyecommerce, Blog: http://blog.ignify.com

description.hltext_display: Chinchilla residents told 'prepare for flood'
description.content:
The weather bureau is warning more rain is about to swamp already-drenched parts of Queensland. (ABC News - file photo: Scott Lamond)
The town of Chinchilla, on the Darling Downs in southern Queensland, is on flood alert with rising water and predicted rain likely to flood homes.
Charley's Creek is expected to hit six metres around midnight (AEST) and it could meet with forecast rain.
Western Downs Regional Council spokesman Bill McCutcheon says the public should begin preparing for potential flooding.
Several Brisbane suburbs were affected by tidal flooding this morning.
Parts of Windsor, Albion and Newstead were inundated due to recent heavy rain, storm run-off and releases from Wivenhoe Dam, west of Brisbane.
Some sandbagging was carried out before the water levels began to fall.
There are now 25 Queensland shires eligible for disaster relief after major flooding, and the statewide damage bill is more than $600 million.
More heavy rain is due in most parts of the state this week.
SES ready
Premier Anna Bligh says State Emergency Service (SES) crews are on standby, and senior emergency department staff have been rostered on, to cope with any flooding across Queensland over the next few days.
Ms Bligh has been briefed by the Bureau of Meteorology (BOM), which has forecast up to 500 millimetres of rain from Bowen to Gladstone over the next four days.
In the south-east region, up to 200 millimetres is expected.
Ms Bligh says emergency preparations are in place.
"We are very confident that should this weather give rise to flooding that there are enough resources out there," she said.
"We do ask that local households play their own part in this.
"If you are leaving home in the next couple of days to travel for Christmas, please have a look outside and lock up, put away trampolines, put away outdoor furniture."
Disaster funds
Ms Bligh says the floods have already had an impact on disaster relief funds.
"Will it put pressure on the budget? Of course it will," she said.
"But if people are in need, if there is flooding, then we will rise to that challenge and meet it.
"We are a state that I think enjoys a well-founded reputation for an excellent emergency response and I expect that if we do see any widespread flooding our emergency workers will be out there doing the terrific job they always do."
'Heed warnings'
Emergency Services Minister Neil Roberts says he is frustrated that people keep risking their lives in floodwaters.
Mr Roberts says too many people have died or been injured already this year and residents should heed warnings to stay away from floodwater.
"So far this flood season we've had five tragic deaths involving people swept off roads, people swimming and they've got into trouble and danger," he said.
"It is far too risky.
"Every year we see these tragedies occur, every year we repeat the messages but every year people are taking unnecessary risks."

description.hltext_display: 2011 Miss Rodeo Nebraska Coronation in Mitchell
description.content:
2011 Miss Rodeo Nebraska Becky Grimm
It's down to just a couple weeks, until Miss Rodeo Nebraska Lady in Waiting Becky Grimm of Harrison has her coronation celebration. Grimm will be crowned the 2011 Miss Rodeo Nebraska on Saturday, January 8th in Mitchell. Since winning the title in June Grimm started representing Nebraska.
The Social Hour will begin at 5:00 p.m., followed by a Dinner and Auction. The Dance will begin at 9 a.m. with music provided by Most Music DJ Service, John and Tara Dunn.
Tickets are $20 for adults; $10 for children under 10 years old. The ticket price includes a Western Style Buffet, Live and Silent Auctions and the Dance.
Tickets locations in our area are: Scottsbluff - Eric Vath Clothier; Gering - Valley Bank & Trust; Harrison - Jory Bob's, Security First Bank, Carrie Edmund (308-668-2599); Hemingford - Farmer's COOP; Mitchell - Bunk House (308-623-9955) and Mitchell Event Center.For more information contact Duane Grimm at 308-668-2176. A block of rooms have been reserved at the Hampton Inn in Scottsb luff, NE (308-635-5200). Reservations are needed by December 24th.
Grimm is senior at Chadron State College and is a member of the Rodeo Team. She is majoring in Business Administration and Pre-Nursing .

description.hltext_display: A legtöbb madárszerű dinoszaurusz növényevő volt
description.content:
MTI 2010. december 22., szerda 08:38 Az eddig ragadozónak hitt madárszerű dinoszauruszok többsége a valóságban növényevő volt, csupán az olyan megrögzött vadászok képeztek kivételt, mint amilyen a Tyrannosaurus rex volt - állítják chicagói paleontológusok, akik kutatásaikat az amerikai Nemzeti Tudományos Akadémia folyóiratában, a PNAS (Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences) legújabb számában ismertették. Lindsay Zanno és Peter Makovicky, a chicagói Field Múzeum kutatója a két lábon járó hüllőmedencéjű dinoszauruszokat (theropodákat) tanulmányozta a statisztikai elemzés módszerével. A legtöbb theropoda teljes egészében alkalmazkodott a ragadozó életmódhoz, ám evolúciójuk során valahogy elpuhultak - magyarázta Lindsay Zanno.
A kutatók majd két tucatnyi olyan anatómiai sajátosságot fedeztek fel, amelyek a coelirosaurusok növényevő életmódjára utal. Ilyen sajátosság a fogak elvesztése, a hosszú nyak, vagy a csőr kifejlődése. A csőr kifejlődése evolúciós újításnak bizonyult a dinoszauruszok esetében. Egy új anatómiai struktúráról van szó, amely lehetővé tette a theropodák számára, hogy másképp dolgozzák fel az élelmet, és ezáltal változékonyabb étrend vált lehetővé - hangsúlyozta Lindsay Zanno,.
A chicagói paleontológusok kimutatták, hogy a theropodák 6 nagy ágához tartozó 44 faj növényevő volt. A legtöbb tollas dinoszauruszok és a modern madarak őse csupán a kréta időszakban, 145-65 millió évvel ezelőtt hagyott fel a húsevéssel. A nagyszámú növényevő fényében a T. rex, a velociraptorok és néhány más ragadozó coelurosaurus húsos étrendje Lindsay Zanno szerint inkább kivételnek, mintsem szabálynak tekinthető. E csoport tagjai, így a Tyrannosaurus rex régimódi, begyepesedett dinoszaurusznak tekinthető - jegyezte meg a paleontológus, hozzátéve, hogy a ragadozók relatíve mindig kevesebben vannak, mint a növényevők. A kutatók szerint a nagytestű ragadozók, ahogy közeli rokonaik is omnivora, azaz mindenevő ősöktől származhattak.
Címkék: dinosz

description.hltext_display: Special treatment for Panthers special teams
description.content:
Dec. 22--The last time Marcus Hudson ran through the tunnel with his name in lights was at Bank of America Stadium, but he was a senior at N.C. State playing in the 2005 Meineke Bowl.
Since it had been five years, he figured he'd do something special. Hudson's dance, which he described as "just a little two-step," was one of the highlights for the Panthers special teams players who were introduced before the home finale last weekend.
"Two-five, he killed it," said linebacker Eric Norwood, who watched in amazement as he waited his turn. "He was getting after it."
Hudson's gyrations were deserved, as he's been one of the keys to a turnaround in the kicking game this year. He takes special teams seriously, the right attitude for a guy who never has started a game in five years in the NFL.
But that time also made him appreciate the chance to show off a bit.
"That just doesn't happen," he said of the pregame honor. "Being in the league five years, and I've been waiting on that my whole life. That was a great feeling, a great chance to have our names out there. I just soaked all of it up.
"They might have thought I didn't know how to act. Hey, like I said, that was something I've been waiting on my whole life, and it was a great feeling."
The team generally introduces either the offense or the defense before games, and many guys who ran through the tunnel hadn't done so since college.
"I think a lot of times those guys are unsung heroes and a lot of those guys never get that opportunity," coach John Fox said. "It was actually kind of amusing watching some of them come through the smoke. But other than a chuckle, I think it was just a nice gesture to recognize them."
Players were told of the idea Saturday afternoon. Tight end Gary Barnidge, who has been one of the team's top two special teams tacklers the past two years, laughed when asked what he thought when he heard the news.
"Well, that's different," he said. "Most of us, we hadn't had anything like that, at least not since college."
A total of 13 players were introduced: Kickers John Kasay and Rhys Lloyd, punter Jason Baker and long snapper J.J. Jansen, along with returners Mike Goodson and Captain Munnerlyn, and core special teamers Barnidge, Hudson, Jordan Pugh, Robert McClain, Jordan Senn, Norwood and Greg Hardy.
Fox decided to honor the oft-overlooked group in part because of their improvement this season.
Last year, Panthers special teams ranked last in the league in the comprehensive statistics compiled by the Dallas Morning News. This year, they've made significant strides in areas they struggled mightily in during the 2009 season. They've gone from 31st in the league in 2009 to 18th in kickoff return average, 30th to 20th in kickoff returns allowed.
Perhaps their most impressive jumps were from 19th to seventh in opponents average drive start on kickoffs, and 29th in punt return average to 14th, testaments to the improvements in coverage.
While they didn't spend much money, they did go out and find guys such as Hudson, Wallace Wright and Aaron Francisco to go along with Senn, who was claimed off waivers late in the 2008 season.
Wright and Francisco were injured and didn't help, but the others have made major impacts. Hudson leads the team in special teams tackles, and Senn recovered both onside kicks during Sunday's win against Arizona.
Along with new special teams coach Jeff Rodgers and a draft class full of physical guys who can run such as Hardy and Norwood, the Panthers have what approaches a personality in the kicking game. Rodgers has brought a new personality to the room, barking at his players, often with an assist from a bullhorn.
But yelling alone won't change things; the new faces the Panthers added gave them some legitimacy in what was one of their weakest areas last year.
"Coach Rodgers has been fantastic," Jansen said. "We do a lot of drill work, stay on our fundamentals, put in a lot of time on the small points of special teams. All the guys have a good understanding of what other teams are trying to do, but on (special) teams, you're going to see things you've never seen before, just like offense and defense.
"Having enough guys who understand the responsibilities, understand the right techniques, that can help you through the challenging looks and the things teams are trying to do. We've done a better job of that this year, so it was nice that guys were recognized."
-----
To see more of The Herald, or to subscribe to the newspaper, go to http://www.heraldonline.com.

description.hltext_display: New Shopwatch for Battle Hill
description.content:
A new Shopwatch scheme is underway in Battle Hill, North Tyneside, just in time for the busy Christmas shopping period.
The initiative covers several stores including Tesco, Lidl, PC World, Wickes DIY, Greggs, Mills and Love Beauty at the new Coastway Shopping Centre. Posters promoting the scheme are now on display in members' stores.
Shopwatch members and police share information about active shop thieves so that store security and shop staff can also be on the lookout for any suspicious behaviour and quickly inform the police if they need help. The scheme can also exclude convicted shop thieves from all member's stores, to protect them and the public from criminals setting foot in their shops.
Shopwatch is supported by neighbourhood officers who regularly patrol the area and offer help with crime prevention training for shop staff.

description.hltext_display: Cable goes nuclear … but avoids meltdown
description.author: ANALYSIS Michael Settle
description.content:
Vince Cable had told two undercover reporters he had “a nuclear option”.
Unfortunately for him he pushed the button and self-destructed ? almost ? leaving a shaken Coalition to deal with the fall-out.
Hours after the tape recordings of the Daily Telegraph sting were released there was a relaxed mood across Whitehall.
Yes, the Business Secretary had been injudicious in his language and it was embarrassing. But as one Government source noted: ?Vince took it in a very Vince-like way? ? with cool equanimity.
Indeed, another senior source noted how the Secretary of State could have said far more damaging things. Fateful words. Mr Cable?s remarks about the Tories wanting to go too quickly on too many things in a Maoist revolution, on the LibDems waging a constant battle with their Conservative chums, and on the Tories wanting to soft pedal on the bankers were hardly revelatory. The assertion David Cameron wanted to cut the winter fuel allowance was more damaging but nipped in the bud.
Yet there was more.
Just minutes after the Prime Minister and Deputy Prime Minister ended their festive media inquisition, the revelation broke.
Mr Cable had privately said he had ?declared war? on Rupert Murdoch and his media empire, adding: ?We are going to win.? This would not have mattered much but that the Business Secretary has a semi-judicial role on determining takeovers and the biggest one at the moment is Mr Murdoch?s plan to take over BSkyB. The Secretary of State had compromised his position.
To make matters worse, it seems clear Mr Cable had forgotten to tell the PM or Deputy Prime Minister about something that had not been released.
Yet it was only after the Number 10 press conference that Mr Cameron and Mr Clegg, now knowing about the Murdoch revelation, went into a closed room to discuss what to do.
It seems clear the Deputy Prime Minister argued to keep Mr Cable inside the tent.
As a social democrat with his ?heart beating on the left?, he helped solidify the Coalition by insisting it was for the good of the country for the LibDems to team up with the Conservatives.
As a big beast, respected for his early warnings on the banking crisis, the former Glasgow economics lecturer is essential to maintain the Liberal Democrat identity within the Coalition. This was no doubt what Mr Clegg told the PM.
Normally, Mr Cable would have gone, but Coalition government rewrites the rules of political gravity and the LibDem leader used up one of his lives to keep the sage of TW1 onboard.
Yet the Business Secretary ? all of whose responsibility for competition and policy issues relating to the media and telecoms sectors has gone to Jeremy Hunt, the Culture Secretary ? is not only humiliated but diminished. The Prime Minister said Mr Cable?s Murdoch comments were ?totally unacceptable and inappropriate?; in Whitehall terms, this was a hair-dryer moment.
Today, the Murdoch press is expected to go for the jugular as indeed is the Daily Telegraph, which kept back the quotes about the News Corporation boss. The suspicion is it did so for commercial reasons. And Labour will keep up the pressure.
As for the Business Secretary and his two left feet, he can look forward to watching himself on Strictly Come Dancing?s Christmas Special. It was almost a case of him foxtrotting into the sunset but Mr Cable limps on to dance another day.

description.hltext_display: Hangfalakként működtek a maja épületek
description.content:
MTI 2010. december 22., szerda 08:29 A maja városok épületei hangfalakként, erősítőkként működtek, amelyek viszonylag nagy távolságra juttatták el a zenét vagy a beszédeket - állítják mexikói kutatók. A kutatócsoport Francisca Zalaquett-tel, a Mexikói Nemzeti Autonóm egyetem régészével az élen a Mexikó déli részén lévő Palenque maja romvárosban végeztek kutatásokat. Meglátásaik szerint a templomok és a közterek akusztikai berendezésként működtek, s képesek voltak a hangot akár száz méterre továbbítani - olvasható a PhysOrg tudományos hírportálon.
A kutatások során a korabeli hangszerek (Kr.u. 600) hangszerek frekvenciáját vizsgálták, és azt, hogy ezek hangja hogyan verődött vissza az épületekről. A helyszíni mérések és a laboratóriumi kísérletek alapján a tudósok úgy vélik, hogy az épületek vakolata képes volt megváltoztatni a hangzást, elnyelve, tompítva, vagy visszaverve, felerősítve a hangokat.
Találtak olyan helyiségeket, amelyeket zenészek, szónokok, vagy papok használhattak, mivel e szobák akusztikája felerősítette a hangot. Ily módon a dallam, vagy a szónokok üzenete távolabbra elért, több ember hallhatta. Francisca Zalaquett és kollégái beazonosították a tereken azokat a területeket is, ahonnan a nézők jobban láthatták-hallhatták az előadókat. A maják sok hangszert alkalmaztak, például sípot és okarinát, de felhasználtak zenélésre természetes anyagokat is, például a teknősbéka páncélját, agancsokat, vagy kagylókkal és kavicsokkal megtöltött tököt. A hangszereken vélhetően a szertartásokon játszottak az istenek tiszteletére, vagy a harci sikereket ünnepelve. Mint a kutatók rámutatnak, vizsgálataik azt sugallják, hogy Palenque építői komoly akusztikai ismeretekkel rendelkeztek.
Palenque maja romváros Mexikóban; amely a VII. században vált vallási központtá és Kin Pakal király uralkodása (615-683) idején élte virágkorát. 835-ben a város elnéptelenedett és fokozatosan benőtte az őserdő. Az egykor 15 négyzetkilométer területű Palenque romjainak nagy része még ma is feltáratlan. A város és a környező nemzeti park 1987 óta az UNESCO kulturális világörökségének része.
Címkék:

description.hltext_display: С начала 2011 года в Таразе будут устанавливать карточные электросчетчики
description.content:
ЖАМБЫЛСКАЯ ОБЛАСТЬ. 21 декабря. КАЗИНФОРМ /Галина Скрипник/ - , сообщил заместитель директора ТОО «Жамбыл жарык сауда-2030» Ерлан Набиев.
По его словам, установка карточных электрических счетчиков будет вестись параллельно с внедрением уже действующей в Таразе системы АСКУЭ, основанной на дистанционной передаче данных показаний электросчетчика.
«Мы планируем за свой счет начать установку карточных, или предоплатных, электрических счетчиков, - пояснил Е. Набиев. - Принцип их работы простой: абонент в любом расчетно-кассовом отделе круглосуточно через терминал загружает на карточку удобную для него сумму, счетчик считывает эту сумму с карточки и контролирует потребление энергии, при необходимости предупреждает потребителя об остатке оплаченного лимита, при нуле оплаченных киловатт - отключает электроэнергию».
Заместитель директора ТОО «Жамбыл жарык сауда-2030» добавил, что при повторном введении карточки в счетчик будет выдано авансом еще 10 киловатт, чтобы «забывчивый» потребитель мог вновь произвести оплату.
При этой системе полностью исключается контакт с контролером.
«На карточную систему мы возлагаем большие надежды, подобный проект - первый в СНГ. В Азербайджане заменили около 1,5 миллиона счетчиков на карточные, но они - без передачи данных, мы пошли дальше - предусмотрели дистанционную передачу данных», - сказал Е. Набиев.

description.hltext_display: Meche Carreño escribe cine ecologista
description.content:
Organización Editorial Mexicana
Ricardo Hernández/El Sol de México
Ciudad de México.- "Ahora estoy escribiendo el libro para niños Los Lamentos de mi Tierra, con el que también espero hacer conciencia entre los adultos acerca del daño que estamos haciendo al medio ambiente, especialmente por la deforestación que sufre el planeta", explicó la legendaria actriz veracruzana Meche Carreño, quien se hiciera famosa gracias a sus intervenciones en las cintas La Choca, Los Perros de Dios y su baile erótico en Zona Roja, entre muchas otras producciones fílmicas.
Entrevistada durante la presentación del calendario Mujeres del Bicentenario (de la también actriz Karla Barahona), la experimentada mujer señaló a EL SOL DE MÉXICO que espera llevar al cine esta historia que está desarrollando y al mismo tiempo dirigirla, pues le gusta involucrarse directamente en cada uno de sus proyectos artísticos.
"Un tema ecológico es el eje de este libro, que para el cine pienso combinar la animación con personajes de carne y hueso, con la intención de mostrar a la gente cómo todo tiene una causa y efecto desde cuando un niño mata a un pajarito hasta la tala de árboles, así como la construcción de enormes edificios, provocando un alto impacto urbano, donde los oportunistas abusan de su poder", explicó la nacida en la ciudad de Minatitlán.
Doña Meche agregó que los mismos seres humanos nos estamos matando con nuestras acciones negativas, al maltratar a la flora, complicándonos la existencia en vez de facilitarla para bien de todos.
La también protagonista de cintas como Los Papeleros y La Sangre Enemiga dijo estar contenta del rumbo que está tomando el cine de nuestro país, alabando el trabajo de Alejandro González Iñárritu, con quien le gustaría trabajar algún día.
"El cine es una representación de nuestras vivencias, dependiendo de ahí el éxito o el fracaso de una película, como ocurrió con La Choca, donde mi personaje de la Flor sigue existiendo en algún punto remoto de nuestro México, por lo que el filme se sigue proyectando de forma constante en televisión", expresó la jarocha, quien en Europa estelarizó la cinta Andante.
Con tres años de haber regresado a nuestro país luego de vivir en el extranjero, la actriz adelantó que tiene otro proyecto denominado Margarita Tierra (una historia de Óscar Flores Tapia que fuera gobernador de Coahuila), mismo que se encuentra adaptando para cine, al que pondrá por nombre La Casa de mi Abuela.

description.hltext_display: Tulospalkkiot piti maksaa laittomasta lakosta
description.content: Työnantaja ei olisi saanut jättää tulospalkkioita maksamatta laittomaan työtaisteluun osallistuneille, katsoo korkein oikeus. Se määräsi Stora Enson Inkeroisten tehtaan maksamaan tulospalkkiot noin kolmellekymmenelle vuonna 2006 lakkoilleelle työntekijälle. Yhtiö oli kirjannut tulospalkkiojärjestelmään ehdon, jonka mukaan laittoman työtaistelun aiheuttamat menetykset vähennettiin siihen osallistuneiden tulospalkkioista. Korkeimman oikeuden mukaan yhtiö pyrki näin laittomasti rajoittamaan työntekijöiden yhdistymisvapautta.

description.hltext_display: A Rex-tra special New Year party
description.author: Helen Turner
description.content:
CULT band Dr And The Medics will headline alongside T.Rextasy at this year’s city centre Calennig celebrations.
The New Year’s Eve concert in Cardiff’s Civic Centre will see the two bands performing nostalgic hits.
T.Rextasy are the world’s only official tribute to Marc Bolan and T Rex.
While celebrating the beginning of 2011, the night will give fans an opportunity to enjoy and rediscover the much-loved music and entertainment from their youth.
Whether it be the psychedelic days of the ’60s, the glam rock of the ’70s or the Gothic revival of the ’80s, both bands look likely to draw in crowds on December 31.
Famous for their 1986 hit single Spirit in the Sky, the psychedelia-inspired Dr and The Medics will take to the Civic Centre music stage at 9.30pm, before T.Rextasy perform Marc Bolan’s rock and pop anthems around the midnight fireworks.
Set in the atmospheric surrounds of Cardiff Castle, the Family Fire Show; A Brief History of Fire, will get under way from 6pm, bringing a blend of music, fire sculpture and fireworks to tell a tale of comets, angry gods and mythical creatures.
There is also the chance to skate on the Admiral Open Air Ice Rink on the midnight session, or ride on the John Lewis Wheel to see the midnight firework finale. The Admiral free New Year’s Eve Bus Service will run up until around 2.30am with special timetables.
Councillor Nigel Howells, Cardiff council’s executive member for sport, leisure and culture, said: "There’s always a great atmosphere in the city centre to celebrate the dawn of the New Year, and with two top bands, a Fire Show and fairground, Cardiff’s Calennig celebrations must be among the best in the country.”
Tickets, which cost £10 for a family ticket of up to four people, can be bought on the night or on 02920 230130. Traditional family attractions and rides will take place at the Family Funfair in the Civic Centre, from noon until 1am on New Year’s Eve and 2pm to 8pm on New Year’s Day.
For more details, visit www.cardiffswinterwonderland.com

description.hltext_display: 2010 год мы завершаем без серьезных аварий и веерных отключений - замдиректора «Жамбыл жарык сауда-2030»
description.content:
ЖАМБЫЛСКАЯ ОБЛАСТЬ. 21 декабря. КАЗИНФОРМ /Галина Скрипник/ - «Уходящий год мы завершаем без серьезных аварий и веерных отключений», - сказал в беседе заместитель директора ТОО «Жамбыл жарык сауда-2030» Ерлан Набиев, подчеркнув, что это достигнуто при имеющемся дефиците электроэнергии, характерном для Жамбылской области, и жестком квотировании.
В минувшем году построена новая подстанция в таразском микрорайоне «Астана», что разгрузило старую подстанцию и улучшило качество электроснабжения прилегающих территорий. Проведена масштабная реконструкция трансформаторных подстанций и распределительного пункта-1, капитальный ремонт воздушной линии на сахарном заводе, установка новых опор, перетяжка линий и другие ремонтные работы на электролиниях областного центра.
«В нынешнем году по Таразу нам удалось произвести замену 22,7 километра кабельных линий крупного сечения и замену участков кабельных линий протяженностью 10 километров - это очень большой объем работ, проведенный за счет экономии и собственных средств компании», - отметил Е.Набиев.
С февраля 2010 года в Таразе внедряется автоматизированная система контроля учета электроэнергии - АСКУЭ, за счет компании уже установлено около 20 тысяч новейших электронных счетчиков.
«Мы предпринимаем шаги по внесению изменений в законодательную базу, - сказал замдиректора. - АРЕМ готовит обращение в Парламент по обязательному внедрению АСКУЭ, как для энергокомпаний, так и для их партнеров и потребителей. Потребитель должен понимать, что мы пытаемся сделать лучше не только для себя, но и для него: хотим уйти от ошибок при снятии показаний, от недобросовестного персонала, от неплательщиков и расхитителей электроэнергии», - подчеркнул он.
Говоря об уже имеющихся результатах внедрения новой системы АСКУЭ, Е. Набиев отметил, что по сравнению с 2009 годом предприятию удалось значительно, в разы, снизить сверхнормативные потери.
«Ликвидация сверхнормативных потерь - это путь к рентабельности, - подчеркнул Е. Набиев. - Мы идем не в разрез с государственной политикой, а где-то и на шаг вперед, так как мы начали двигаться к АСКУЭ раньше, всех в стране. Это именно то, к чему призывает нас Глава государства в своем Послании - энергосбережение, повышение производительности труда и достижение рентабельности производства».

description.hltext_display: STUPID SOFT & SLOPPY ; Rogne delivers damning verdict on Hoops
description.content:
THOMAS ROGNE last night branded Celtic a soft touch after they blew the chance to secure the Christmas No.1 slot.
Neil Lennon's men had the perfect opportunity to turn up the heat on Rangers and would have gone top of the SPL on goal difference had they beaten Kilmarnock.
But it took a late leveller from Rogne to rescue a point after another calamitous defensive display gift-wrapped Killie the opening goal at Parkhead.
Celtic have now won just one of their last five league matches and Rogne said: "It was an opportunity missed and that has to be two points dropped. We are very disappointed with the result.
"We have to stop making these mistakes. That's three games in a row we have drawn when we should have won.
"There are always going to be mistakes in games but you need to make sure they don't count in the wrong way.
"We are too soft, we concede stupid goals and we don't finish it off when we should.
"My goal doesn't matter other than it secured a point for us."
A loud chorus of boos reverberated around Celtic Park at the final whistle and Rogne insists he understands the frustrations of the supporters, who have had to endure three successive home draws against Dundee United, Inverness and now Kilmarnock.
The Norwegian defender said: "It's hard to explain what went wrong but this is a game we definitely should have won.
"We go in at half-time and we are happy with the performance. We've had plenty of chances and they have had nothing. But then they score from a counter-attack at our corner and that should never happen.
"We keep pressing but it just wasn't our day."
Matter
Daniel Majstorovic and Cha Du-ri were both culpable at Conor Sammon's stunning solo goal, but Rogne feels others should also shoulder the blame.
To be fair he has a point given Niall McGinn and Daryl Murphy both passed gilt-edged opportunities to net before his own late intervention.
Rogne said: "Today was just as much about not being able to score a goal as giving away an easy goal.
"But the performance was better than the last two games so we have to look on the bright side.
"At the end it doesn't really matter because we didn't win."
Anthony Stokes and Murphy both toiled after Gary Hooper was stretchered off with a suspected broken leg and ankle ligament damage which could put paid to his campaign.
Celtic's top scorer faces months on the sidelines and Rogne has called for the remaining strikers at the club to step up to the plate.
He added: "We will see how he is but we have other players who can step in. Hoops is a very good player but so are the players on the bench."
Celtic must find drastic improvement during the second half of the season to challenge Rangers and Killie hitman Sammon reckons they also need a huge confidence boost.
The Irishman, who netted his 15the goal of the season, said: "I thought Celtic were there for the taking.
"The fans got on their backs a bit and we had plenty of counter attacks to nick a second.
"Celtic are a very good side but we managed to get in behind them. I was very disappointed we couldn't hold on. To come so close was a real blow.
"We haven't played well but just scrapped and tried to stay in the game."
Rogne's header five minutes from time denied Kilmarnock a first win in the East End of Glasgow since 1955.
Sammon said: "After we scored we felt it could be our night. It's more than 50 years since we last won here so it's disappointing to come off the park without getting the victory.
"When I scored there was still a lot of football left to be played so I wasn't thinking about making history just then. I knew Celtic would come at us hard and they did but we held on well and looked like seeing it out.
"After Celtic scored I did think I had won it right at the end. A few of the guys have said to me I was probably too honest. The keeper has come out although I don't know if he has touched me.
"When I went round him and shot I wasn't sure if it was going in but I was still thinking I could score the winner."
Killie boss Mixu Paatelainen was also gutted his team could hold on for a historic victory. He said: "This was probably the worst we have passed the ball and played this season.
"All credit to Celtic as they put us under pressure but we should have done better in possession.
"We scored a great goal with a counter-attack and then defended solidly after that so to lose a goal from a set-piece was very disappointing.
"I thought we should have won it in the end, not because of the way we played but because we had a lead and should have defended better.
"I expected a lot more from us. In the first half we were horrendous, not to my liking.
"Sometimes it goes like that although it shows how dangerous we are even when we don't play like we should.
"I have no thoughts about finishing third or anything like that. I just want to survive this league.
"At the start of the season we were favourites for relegation but we have progressed as the campaign has gone on."
(c) 2010 Daily Record; Glasgow (UK). Provided by ProQuest LLC. All rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: Mégis egybeterelik a megahivatalokat
description.author: Napi Gazdaság
description.content:
/* (c)AdOcean 2003-2010, cemp_hu.Index.Gazdasag.460x31 szponz */ ado.placement(}); Napi Gazdaság 2010. december 22., szerda 07:54 Január elsejétől elvben már működnek is majd a közigazgatási reform által létrehozott megyei kormányhivatalok. Egyelőre mégis kevés tudható arról, hogyan tud majd az állampolgár a megígért egyablakos ügyintézés keretében eljárni a 14 hivatal, szakhatóság összeolvasztásával megalakuló hivatalokban - írja a Napi Gazdaság. Bár a tervek között szerepel a megyékben 1000-1200 dolgozóval létrejövő óriáshivatalok egységes, egy épületben való elhelyezése, erre január elsejével nincs mód, ám az ügyfélszolgálatok minden megyében egy helyen működnek majd, Budapesten pedig négy ügyfélszolgálat kialakítása várható - közölte a Közigazgatási és Igazságügyi Minisztérium (KIM) a Napi Gazdaság érdeklődésére.
A minisztérium területi közigazgatásért és választásokért felelős államtitkársága szerint az integrációban érintett hivatalok, dolgozók felkészültsége megfelelő, a feladatellátás pedig az átmeneti időben is folyamatos lesz.
A megyei kormányhivatalok informatikai rendszere a beépülő szervek informatikai rendszereiből épül fel, ezek összehangolását jövő évre tervezi a KIM. A regionális illetékességgel működő területi államigazgatási szervek megyeivé történő átalakítását is végre kell hajtani. Új dolgozókat nem vesznek fel, a meglévő regionális létszámok szétosztásával oldják meg a visszaalakítást. A megyei kormányhivatalok bázisát képező megyei közigazgatási hivatalok működésére eredetileg 8 milliárd forintot tervezett a kormány. A megahivatalokról szóló törvény elfogadását követően azonban a költségvetésben is meg kellett teremteni az ehhez szükséges forrást - erre egy módosító indítvány csoportosított át 116 milliárd forintot.
A tervek szerint a szakmai feladatok irányítása az egyes beolvadó hivatalok fővárosi központjából zajlik majd, és jogszabályban rendezik a kormánytisztviselők esetében a jogutódlás szabályait. Mivel erre csak januárban kerülhet sor, ezért az egyes dolgozók is csak akkor kaphatnak felvilágosítást arról, hogy fővárosi vagy megyei állományba kerülnek-e majd. Erről pedig a még kinevezésre váró kormánymegbízottak dönthetnek majd.
Az Index értesülése szerint Orbán Viktor informálisan már ki is nevezte a kormánymegbízottakat, köztük több megyei közgyűlési elnököt és a pápai polgármestert is.
Címkék: közigazga

description.hltext_display: FDP will keine öffentlichen Chef-Debatten
description.author: dpa
description.content:
Partei-Politiker fordern Ende der Diskussionen über Westerwelle - vor 19 Minuten
Berlin - Nach dem neuerlichen Umfrage-Absturz der FDP versuchen führende Liberale, die Debatte über Parteichef Guido Westerwelle zu beruhigen. Entwicklungsminister Dirk Niebel mahnte, die FDP könne nur bestehen, wenn sie zusammenhalte.
Kurz vor Weihnachten gibt es fuer die Liberalen keine frohe Botschaft: Nach den anhaltenden innerparteilichen Personalquerelen sackt die FDP auf nur noch drei Prozent ab.
Foto: dapd
Kurz vor Weihnachten gibt es fuer die Liberalen keine frohe Botschaft: Nach den anhaltenden innerparteilichen Personalquerelen sackt die FDP auf nur noch drei Prozent ab.
Foto: dapd
Links zum Thema Kapitän Guido trotzt dem Sturm
In der Region umgehört: Soll Westerwelle abtreten?
Westerwelle will um FDP-Vorsitz kämpfen
Weitere Meldungen aus der Politik
Gisela Piltz, stellvertretende Parteivorsitzende in Nordrhein-Westfalen, betonte, öffentliche Personaldebatten lösten keine Probleme. Der Vorsitzende der Jungen Liberalen, Lasse Becker, forderte Westerwelle aber auch zur Selbstkritik auf. Becker appellierte an den Parteichef, beim Dreikönigstreffen in Stuttgart „selbstkritisch den einen oder anderen Fehler zu benennen“. Zudem solle Westerwelle „die Menschen emotionaler als in der Vergangenheit ansprechen“, sagte der FDP-Nachwuchspolitiker den „Stuttgarter Nachrichten“.
Von den Wahlergebnissen im Frühjahr 2011 hänge viel ab. „Und beim Bundesparteitag wird analysiert: Wer hat welchen Fehler gemacht, und wie baue ich ein zukunftsfähiges Team.“ Becker forderte zugleich eine inhaltliche Neuausrichtung der FDP: „Jedenfalls wird man nicht dadurch glaubwürdig, dass man zum 200. Mal eine Steuersenkung ankündigt. Wir brauchen einen Schwerpunkt beim Thema Haushaltskonsolidierung.“
Die FDP müsse zudem klare Positionen bei der Ablehnung der Vorratsdatenspeicherung und dem Umbau der Sozialsysteme beziehen. „Und wir müssen uns beim Thema nachhaltige, ökologische Marktwirtschaft ein neues Feld erschließen.“ Niebel machte deutlich, dass er jüngeren FDP-Politikern den Parteivorsitz noch nicht zutraut. Die FDP habe zwar eine hervorragende Führungsreserve, sagte er dem „Hamburger Abendblatt“. „Ich denke allerdings, dass wir denen noch etwas Zeit geben sollten, um ihre Fähigkeiten zu veredeln.“
Vom Dreikönigstreffen erwarte er „ein Aufbruchsignal, das weit über Stuttgart hinaus in der Republik sichtbar sein wird“, so Niebel. „Ich bin felsenfest davon überzeugt, dass Guido Westerwelle eine mitreißende Rede halten wird.“ Auch Piltz forderte ein Ende der Personaldebatte. Die Geschichte der FDP zeige eindrucksvoll, dass Personaldebatten in kritischen Situationen noch nie geholfen hätten, sagte die nordrhein- westfälische Partei-Vize „Handelsblatt Online“. „Die FDP hat im Team gewonnen, und die FDP muss auch im Team Krisen meistern.“ In der jüngsten Forsa-Umfrage ist die FDP auf drei Prozent abgesackt.

description.content: مؤشر البورصة يرتفع 6ر23 نقطة عند الساعة 11 صباحا جمعية حماية البيئة الكويتية ترصد نوعا من العقاب الصغير لاول مرة في الكويت برميل النفط الكويتي يرتفع 59 سنتا ليستقر عند 98ر87 دولار في تداولات امس زوارق حرب اسرائيلية تقصف قوارب صيد فلسطينية في بحر غزة واشنطن ستبقي على الجاسوس الاسرائيلي بولارد المسجون لديها بتهمة التجسس منذ 25 عام الولايات المتحدة .. ايران ستحاول التهرب من العقوبات الجديدة مؤشر البورصة يتراجع 8ر4 نقطة مع بداية تداولات اليوم اسطنبول تنجح بحمل لقب عاصمة للثقافة الأوروبية لعام 2010 المهنا..تحويل تذاكر المواطنين العالقين في بريطانيا على شركات طيران اخرى مجلس الأمن الدولي يرحب بتشكيل الحكومة العراقية الجديدة

description.hltext_display: Bayer Acquires Ukrainian Wheat Companies
description.content:
For the second time in two weeks, Bayer Crop Science has another big announcement. Today Bayer announced the acquisition of the wheat breeding program from two Ukrainian breeding companies, SORT and EUROSORT. With this agreement Bayer will gain access to wheat lines with the characteristics of winter hardiness and drought tolerance. The financial details of the agreement were not disclosed.
This announcement comes less than a week after Bayer announced a agreement with the University of Nebraska to establish Bayer's first wheat breeding program in North America. This will allow Bayer use of UNL's wheat germplasm, the genetic material used to develop new wheat varieties.

description.hltext_display: Liikenteessä kuoli useita tuiskuisen marraskuun aikana
description.content: Tieliikenteessä kuoli lähes tuplasti enemmän ihmisiä marraskuussa kuin vuosi sitten. Kuolleita oli yhdeksän enemmän ja loukkaantuneita 96 enemmän kuin viime vuonna, kertoo Tilastokeskus. - Viime vuonna marraskuu oli aika lailla musta. Nyt lumikelit ja liukkaat säät tulivat aiemmin, sanoo aktuaari Raini Östlund Tilastokeskuksesta. Tieliikenteessä sattui marraskuussa 474 henkilövahinkoon johtanutta onnettomuutta. Niissä loukkaantui yli 600 ihmistä ja kuoli 19. Kuolleista 15 oli autoilijoita. Lisäksi kuoli kolme jalankulkijaa ja yksi polkupyöräilijä. Valtaosa kuolleista oli miehiä. Marraskuun kuolleisuusluvut muodostavat vain pienen piikin tilastoissa. Tieliikenteessä kuolleiden määrä on jatkuvasti laskenut viimeisen kahdenkymmenen vuoden ajan, kertoo Tilastokeskus.

description.hltext_display: "El Brujo" Javier Bátiz visitó en exclusiva la Redacción de EL SOL DE MÉXICO para dar a conocer su deseo de actuar en el Vive Latino.
description.content:
Ciudad de México.- Primera de dos partes
"El Brujo" Javier Bátiz visitó en exclusiva la Redacción de EL SOL DE MÉXICO para dar a conocer su deseo de actuar en el Vive Latino, además de que se encuentra buscando disquera y oportunidades para actuar en conciertos masivos en la capital mexicana, aprovechando también para promover la comedia fílmica Suave Patria, donde acaba de actuar al lado de Omar Chaparro, Adrián Uribe y Karla Souza.
De visita en el Distrito Federal (donde vivió algún tiempo en la colonia Moctezuma, en la que una calle lleva su nombre) para pasar la Navidad y el Año Nuevo al lado de su hermana, la cantante Baby Bátiz, el famoso guitarrista tijuanense, que indujo a Carlos Santana a tocar dicho instrumento, comentó que también vino a negociar con una empresa de instrumentos musicales para comercializar una guitarra que bautizó como Tijuanera, que junto con un amplificador podrían llevar el nombre de "Combo Tijuanero".
"Nunca ha habido una guitarra con mi nombre porque no lo había buscado, pero ahora espero poder concretar esa idea que surgió en mi mente hace tiempo. La guitarra que diseñé me ha acompañado en los últimos años como se nota en ella, pues tiene ya muchos rasguños y caídas, pero sigue sonando bastante bien.
"Otro motivo de mi vista a la capital mexicana es la de ver si encuentro compañía disquera porque desafortunadamente Discos Denver, donde estuve durante 17 años, no pudo seguir adelante, pero estoy muy agradecido con su director Octavio Aguilera, ya que ahí grabé 28 discos, aproximadamente.
"Ahora espero negociar con alguna disquera trasnacional para difundir la música que traigo ahora para darla a conocer a un nivel más amplio. Asimismo, aprovecharé para acudir a varios programas de televisión y radio, conducidos por René Franco, Ricardo Rocha y Omar Chaparro, entre otros", expresó el bajacaliforniano, quien para despedir el 2010 actuará el 31 de diciembre en el Bife del Padrino en el municipio de Naucalpan y el 7 de enero en la marisquería El Maleconero (al lado de 5Fingers), de San Cristóbal Ecatepec, Estado de México. Además, el 8 de enero lo hará en el 246 de las calles de Querétaro, casi esquina con Insurgentes, en la colonia Roma.
El legendario músico y compositor de 66 años, que cuenta con influencias de gente como Robert Jhonson, Muddy Waters, B.B. King, Elmore James y Chuck Berry, se encuentra celebrando 53 años de trayectoria artística, mismos que desea festejar en la próxima edición del Vive Latino, a celebrarse durante el mes de abril durante tres días.
"Quiero ir al Vive Latino, por lo que estoy buscando los contactos para lograrlo. Creo que sería bueno que el Bátiz estuviera ahí al lado de otros artistas latinoamericanos, ya que además ese festival se ha vuelto un excelente escaparate internacional", expresó con su ríspida voz el singular personaje que sigue luciendo su larga cabellera ensortijada (que ya luce algunas canas), su barba y sus clásicos lentes oscuros, con los que ha recorrido prácticamente todos los estados del país y muchas ciudades de Estados Unidos, donde su música sigue sonando. (CONTINUARÁ MAÑANA)

description.hltext_display: Футбольный клуб «Тараз» возглавил Ваит Талгаев
description.content:
ЖАМБЫЛСКАЯ ОБЛАСТЬ. 21 декабря. КАЗИНФОРМ /Галина Скрипник/ - В футбольном клубе «Тараз» - новое назначение, сообщили в пресс-службе ФК «Тараз».
Вместо ушедшего в российский клуб «Урал» воспитанника жамбылского футбола Дмитрия Огая в ФК «Тараз» пришел известный казахстанский тренер, тоже жамбылец, Ваит Талгаев, добившийся некогда значительных успехов на посту главного тренера российского «Терека».
В этом году В.Талгаев тренировал талдыкорганский «Жетысу».

description.hltext_display: В селе Гродиково произошел взрыв в частном жилом доме
description.content:
ЖАМБЫЛСКАЯ ОБЛАСТЬ. 22 декабря. КАЗИНФОРМ /Галина Скрипник/ - В селе Гродиково Жамбылского района во вторник в 12.30 произошел взрыв в частном жилом доме, сообщили в пресс-службе ДЧС Жамбылской области.
Взрыв случился в жилой комнате частного дома и не повлек возникновения пожара - обрушилось перекрытие дома, повреждена часть стен.
Кроме того, получил ожоги ІІ-ІІІ степени 25 процентов тела и перелом правой голени житель этого дома, он доставлен в ожоговый центр городской больницы №2 Тараза.
Предполагаемой причиной взрыва явилась неосторожность пострадавшего при самовольном изготовлении пиротехнических изделий в своем доме.
Органами полиции проводится расследование по данному факту.

description.hltext_display: HOUSEPAD Flat Fee MLS Listing Success Rate Slightly Beats REALTOR...
description.content:
HOUSEPAD listings scored a success rate 3.4 percentage points higher...
A study this month concludes that HOUSEPAD flat fee MLS listings posted a percentage sold rate slightly higher than the REALTOR average. Flat fee MLS listings involve sellers paying an upfront broker fee of $99 - $399 for a MLS listing instead of a listing broker commission at settlement. They are also known as MLS entry only listings, because the sellers largely self-manage the sale.
Searching sold and expired data 12 months back, the number of HOUSEPAD listings sold versus expired were calculated. The market continues to be a challenging one for sellers. In the largest MLS area of the country, MRIS, REALTORS across the board saw only 50.9% of year to date active listings sold. In the same MLS, Housepad listings scored a success rate 3.4 percentage points higher at 54.3% when the seller allowed 6 months and offered either 2.5% or 3% commission to the buyers agent.
The success rate varied by MLS market area, and was studied in HOUSEPAD's 30 highest volume multiple listing services. The following dataset represents the HOUSEPAD nationwide success rate relative to the commission rate that was offered to the buyer's agent.
3.0% - 50.7% (recommended)
2.5% - 57.5% (recommended)
2.0% - 46.6%
1.5% - 42.9%
1.0% - 26.2%
One surprising peculiarity here is that sellers who offered 2.5% to buyer's agents were marginally more successful than sellers who offered 3.0%. This may suggest that buyer's agents are increasingly willing to accept 2.5%, and if so these sellers have an extra 1/2% to make the deal.
Data Notes:
HOUSEPAD sellers are free to unilaterally select their list price and co-broke commission rate, which is often not the case for full service listings. HOUSEPAD data was collected by HOUSEPAD. All data was analyzed by HOUSEPAD. This data does not include the Denver or Long Island market areas, where 2.8% and 2.0%, respectively, are the HOUSEPAD recommended commissions. This data does not include HOUSEPAD listings cancelled prior to 6 months, assuming most full service listings cannot be freely cancelled at anytime. This data assumes the average market listing contract is for 6 months with a co-broke offering of 2.5 - 3%. This data does not account for listing lengths or co-broke rates outside of that assumption. This data includes listings in both HOUSEPAD's Pay Upfront and Pay at Settlement program, where in the latter the success rate is lower.
About HOUSEPAD LLP: Since 2003, Ryan & Ken Gehris of HOUSEPAD have listed over 17,000 properties on multi-list (MLS) and Realtor.com. The company is licensed in 24 states, 80+ MLS’s, and specializes in listing property on behalf of for-sale-by-owners or real estate investors on a limited service, flat fee basis. The brokerage services for sellers are set up as a real estate equivalent to online stock trading.
We are available as a media resource for stories involving state real estate distinctives, national real estate issues, MLS, residential real estate brokerage, for-sale-by-owner, and flat fee MLS listings. You are permitted to reference and copy all or part of this material in your story. Please send us an email if you have any questions or use this material in a story.

description.hltext_display: "El Brujo" quiere tocar en el Vive Latino
description.content:
Javier Bátiz durante su visita a nuestra casa editorial quiso tomar el Sol en sus manos. Foto: José Luis Rubio / El Sol de México
Organización Editorial Mexicana
Ricardo Hernández / El Sol de México
Ciudad de México.- Primera de dos partes
"El Brujo" Javier Bátiz visitó en exclusiva la Redacción de EL SOL DE MÉXICO para dar a conocer su deseo de actuar en el Vive Latino, además de que se encuentra buscando disquera y oportunidades para actuar en conciertos masivos en la capital mexicana, aprovechando también para promover la comedia fílmica Suave Patria, donde acaba de actuar al lado de Omar Chaparro, Adrián Uribe y Karla Souza.
De visita en el Distrito Federal (donde vivió algún tiempo en la colonia Moctezuma, en la que una calle lleva su nombre) para pasar la Navidad y el Año Nuevo al lado de su hermana, la cantante Baby Bátiz, el famoso guitarrista tijuanense, que indujo a Carlos Santana a tocar dicho instrumento, comentó que también vino a negociar con una empresa de instrumentos musicales para comercializar una guitarra que bautizó como Tijuanera, que junto con un amplificador podrían llevar el nombre de "Combo Tijuanero".
"Nunca ha habido una guitarra con mi nombre porque no lo había buscado, pero ahora espero poder concretar esa idea que surgió en mi mente hace tiempo. La guitarra que diseñé me ha acompañado en los últimos años como se nota en ella, pues tiene ya muchos rasguños y caídas, pero sigue sonando bastante bien.
"Otro motivo de mi vista a la capital mexicana es la de ver si encuentro compañía disquera porque desafortunadamente Discos Denver, donde estuve durante 17 años, no pudo seguir adelante, pero estoy muy agradecido con su director Octavio Aguilera, ya que ahí grabé 28 discos, aproximadamente.
"Ahora espero negociar con alguna disquera trasnacional para difundir la música que traigo ahora para darla a conocer a un nivel más amplio. Asimismo, aprovecharé para acudir a varios programas de televisión y radio, conducidos por René Franco, Ricardo Rocha y Omar Chaparro, entre otros", expresó el bajacaliforniano, quien para despedir el 2010 actuará el 31 de diciembre en el Bife del Padrino en el municipio de Naucalpan y el 7 de enero en la marisquería El Maleconero (al lado de 5Fingers), de San Cristóbal Ecatepec, Estado de México. Además, el 8 de enero lo hará en el 246 de las calles de Querétaro, casi esquina con Insurgentes, en la colonia Roma.
El legendario músico y compositor de 66 años, que cuenta con influencias de gente como Robert Jhonson, Muddy Waters, B.B. King, Elmore James y Chuck Berry, se encuentra celebrando 53 años de trayectoria artística, mismos que desea festejar en la próxima edición del Vive Latino, a celebrarse durante el mes de abril durante tres días.
"Quiero ir al Vive Latino, por lo que estoy buscando los contactos para lograrlo. Creo que sería bueno que el Bátiz estuviera ahí al lado de otros artistas latinoamericanos, ya que además ese festival se ha vuelto un excelente escaparate internacional", expresó con su ríspida voz el singular personaje que sigue luciendo su larga cabellera ensortijada (que ya luce algunas canas), su barba y sus clásicos lentes oscuros, con los que ha recorrido prácticamente todos los estados del país y muchas ciudades de Estados Unidos, donde su música sigue sonando. (CONTINUARÁ MAÑANA)

description.hltext_display: Mixed results for CAHS, Central High hoops teams abroad
description.content:
Dec. 21--The Central High School girls basketball team continued to surge in Atlanta on Monday while the boys and girls basketball squads from Charlotte Amalie High took their first-day lumps in Puerto Rico.
The Lady Caribs won their third game in four days at the DeKalb County Holiday Basketball Tournament and will advance to the championship game of the American Girls Division round robin.
Melanesia Hendrickson led the way with 11 points and Lanese Bough added eight as the Lady Caribs topped Druid Hills High, 50-30, to end division play undefeated.
"This is quite an accomplishment because there are a lot of teams here and to advance to the championship is a big deal," Central coach Donald Bough said. "It's a big victory for the territory because when any of our teams can do this at an away tournament, it's a sign that we're doing the right thing at home."
The Lady Caribs will meet the Carver High-Cedar Grove winner in the final today at 3 p.m.
After starting the tourney 0-2, the Central High boys team rebounded with a 63-60 win over Lakeside High in the consolation round. The Caribs had dropped their first two games of the tournament by a combined eight points and had to battle back Monday to earn their first win of the season.
"We actually lost the lead in the final minutes, but we stormed back," Bough said.
Junior Razeem Huggin had 19 and was the leading scorer in all three contests for the Caribs.
Meanwhile, the Puerto Rico Hoops Championship 2010 tipped off in Guaynabo and the CAHS boys squad dropped a nail-biter to Adela, 55-49.
CAHS coach Myron Corbett said, after leading scorer Merwin Potter fouled out of the game with two minutes left, the Chickenhawks did not take a shot during their final four possessions.
"Down the stretch, it was nothing but mental mistakes," Corbett said. "We were in a position to win, but we couldn't get any baskets. We couldn't even get any shots."
The outcome was no different for the Lady Chickenhawks, who fell to San Pablo (Hatillo), 53-33. Senior Te'Andra Richardson paved the way for CAHS with 13 points and six rebounds, but it wasn't enough.
"Our girls just played scared," Corbett said. "We were not aggressive and it was like we were running a track meet out there. We were supposed to play a 1-2-1-1 trap, but I don't think we got set in it once."
Corbett explained that most of the Puerto Rican teams they will face -- both boys and girls over the next two days in this round-robin tourney -- will have significant experience on CAHS.
"For us, this was the first game of the season," he said. "Some of these teams have already played 20 games this season and you could see the difference out there."
The girls team is off today while the CAHS boys play again at 6 p.m.
- Contact sports writer Aaron Gray at 774-8772 ext. 352 or e-mail agray@dailynews.vi.
-----

description.hltext_display: Property firm donates gifts to the homeless
description.author: Wayne Nowaczyk
description.content:
CARDIFF firm Mead Property Management has donated practical gifts for clients of homeless charity The Wallich.
Staff bought and wrapped scarves, woolly gloves and sleeping bags.
Derith Rhisiart, fundraiser with The Wallich said: "It has enabled us to buy presents, decorations and festive food, so everyone we work with can enjoy a seasonal celebration.”

description.hltext_display: China Commodities Expo-Saudi Arabia 2010 Held in Riyadh
description.content: China Commodities Expo-Saudi Arabia 2010, sponsored by the Ministry of Commerce of the People's Republic of China, was held in Riyadh on December 19. It is an important event on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Saudi Arabia. The event is of great significance not only for the enhancement of trade and economic exchanges and cooperation but also for promotion of bilateral trade and economic cooperation with Sino-Saudi and other countries in West Asia with China. Chong Quan, Deputy China International Trade Representative and Vice Minister of Commerce, Yang Honglin, Chinese Ambassador to Saudi Arabia, Abdullah Zainal Alireza, Saudi Arabian Commerce and Industry Minister，and Jeraisy, President of Sino-Saudi Business Council attended the opening ceremony and cut the ribbon. The Expo, covering more than 7,000 square meters, was held in Riyadh International Exhibition Center. 173 exhibitors, including several well-known enterprises such as Shantui Construction Machinery Co., Ltd., Haier Group, Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. and ZTE Corporation, are from 17 Chinese provinces, municipalities and autonomous regions. Engineering machinery, construction machinery, electrical equipment, lighting equipment, electrical materials, auto parts, hardware, building materials, electronics, home appliances, household goods and Muslim articles etc. are all on display. The Expo is a fairly large exhibition by Chinese enterprises in Saudi Arabia in recent years.

article.source: Ministry of Commerce - Republic of China

description.hltext_display: Defence inquiry finds export breach
description.content:
A sample of Australian Defence Force camouflage fabric was shipped to China without proper approval.
A defence investigation has found approval for export of the fabric sample would have been granted had it been sought.
However, the case has now been referred to the Australian Customs and Border Protection Service for possible further action under Australian export laws.
The defence investigation report was released on Wednesday with key details deleted, including the name of the company responsible.
At issue was whether Australian-developed camouflage fabric specially treated to minimise visibility to night-vision equipment was controlled under Australian defence export regulations.
The inquiry conducted by Colonel Terry McCullagh concluded it was and that a two-metre sample of this fabric had been exported to China without permission in 2008.
But he concluded this was no major breach of security.
That's because this technology is widely available. China produces its own comparable fabric for military uniforms and even manufactures combat uniforms for the British army.
In the case of the Australian disruptive pattern camouflage uniform (DPCU) fabric, the key technical details were first published in 1995 with further details released in 2004.
"There is negligible risk that any export of NIR (near infra-red) treated fabric from Australia would contribute to proliferation of military technology," Colonel McCullagh said in the report.
This problem came about as defence moved to tender for supply of combat uniforms over five years in a deal worth some $128 million.
Because of size and complexity and the risk of delay, the Defence Materiel Organisation (DMO) released an interim request for tender for supply of 120,000 combat uniforms over two years at a cost of $13.6 million.
That went to the two last used suppliers of combat uniforms. In December 2009, DMO entered a contract with one firm which included an option for supply of fabric from China in the second year.
It was subsequently alleged the winning company had contravened defence export controls by exporting samples of fabric and the specifications to a Chinese textiles company.
The Australian company subsequently admitted sending the Chinese firm fabric specifications plus a two-metre fabric sample.
It said it did that without knowledge that export controls might be contravened.

event_or_fact.property: There is negligible risk that any export of NIR (near infra-red) treated fabric from Australia would contribute to proliferation of military technology

description.hltext_display: Futbolun Şakası Yok
description.content: Geçen sezonun kupa sahibi Trabzonspor, Bank Asya 1. Lig takımlarından Gaziantep B.B ile kupada ilk müsabakasını oynadı.Gaziantep B.B. özelliği, aynı grupta bulunan Beşiktaş’ı ilk müsabakalarında mağlup etmeleriydi.Yabancılarını tatile gönderen bordo-mavili ekip için bu maç, aslında sıradan bir müsabakaydı.Defansta Egemen-Giray göbekte, sağ bekte Mustafa,sol bekte Ferhat yer aldı.Orta sahada Selçuk-Barış-Sezer görev alırken,sağ kanadı Serkan,sol kanadı Burak kullanırken, her zamanki gibi forvette alternatifsiz Umut Bulut yer aldı.Gaziantep B.B oynadığı oyunla Beşiktaş’ı tesadüf yenmediklerini ortaya koydular.Takım oyunu oynayan Bank Asya ekibi, aldıkları topu gelişi güzel değil, ayağa oynayarak kullandılar.Pas yaptılar,kombine ataklarla Trabzonspor ceza alanına vardılar.Bordo-mavili ekip orta sahasında yeni isimlere yer verdi.Fakat Barış-Sezer ikilisi orta alanda sönüktüler.Serkan’ın golüne cevap veren Antep kolay yıkılmayacağı sinyallerini verdi.Tabi ki kalite ve özgüven üstünlüğü olan Trabzonspor ikinci golü bulmakta sıkıntı çekmedi. İkinci devre Gaziantep B.B, güzel futboluna ,mücadelesine devam etti.Bordo-mavili ekip ise bir türlü organize ataklar geliştiremedi.Tatil havasında bir Trabzonspor seyretmiş olduk.Engin Baytar ,Sezerin yerine oyuna girdi.Fakat o da bir şey değiştirmedi.Görünen o ki yedek kulübesi bu takımın hazır değil.İkinci devre iki kulvarda mücadele edecek bu ekibin nokta transfere ihtiyacı olduğu kesin.Trabzonspor oyunun temposunu düşürmeye çalışacağım derken, oyundan koptu.Önde giden bordo-mavili ekip oynamadan ziyade dinlenmeyi tercih edince, beklemediği bir anda golü yemiş oldu.Vız vız işleyen Antep’in bal yapacağını düşünmeyen bordo-mavili futbolcular yanıldılar.Futbol bu hafife aldığında hemen ceza kesildi.Gaziantep B.B bitime 3 dakika kala beraberliği yakaladı.Hiç ummadığı golü yiyen bordo-mavili adeta şok oldu.Bordo-mavili ekibin defansı o kadar bariz hatalar yaptı ki evlere şenlik.Hele ikinci golde sol tarafı felç eden Antep forvetleri, Trabzonspor stoperlerini de aciz duruma düşürdüler.Beraberlik Antep’in hakkıydı, sabretti ve aldı.Trabzonspor rehavetin bedelini ödemiş oldu.

description.hltext_display: Scottish Secretary among other LibDems caught in sting
description.content:
Scottish Secretary Michael Moore confided to undercover reporters posing as constituents that cutting Child Benefit for higher-rate taxpayers was “blatantly not a consistent and fair thing to do”.
He was among a number of Liberal Democrat ministers to privately voice unease about the Coalition Government?s policies on welfare reform and university tuition fees in further embarrassing disclosures last night.
Berwickshire MP Mr Moore described the increase in tuition fees to a maximum �9000 as ?the biggest, ugliest, most horrific thing in all of this ... a car crash?. He told the reporters: ?I signed a pledge that promised not to do this. I?ve just done the worst crime a politician can commit, the reason most folk distrust us as a breed. I?ve had to break a pledge and very, very publicly.? Mr Moore said the move was ?deeply damaging? to the LibDems, who had promised to abolish fees, but added: ?What we?ve all had to weigh up is the greater sense of what the Coalition is about.? Insisting that LibDem ministers ?remain passionately Liberal Democrat?, the Scottish Secretary said some Conservative ministers were ?on a different planet? and he and Defence Secretary Liam Fox ?probably couldn?t stay in the same situation for very long? if they were discussing a wide range of policies.
Other figures recorded were Business Minister Ed Davey and Pensions Minister Steve Webb.

description.hltext_display: Rakibe saygı duyacaksın!
description.content: İlk yarının lideri Trabzonspor, dün akşamki Ziraat Türkiye Kupası ilk maçında Gaziantep Belediyespor’u ağırladı. Misafir takım, Beşiktaş’ı kupanın ilk karşılaşmasında mağlup etmişlerdi. Bu başarıları ile, Türkiye’de dikkatleri üzerlerine çekmişlerdi. Bank Asya 1. Ligi’nde sekizinci sırada bulunmalarına rağmen lider Denizlispor’un sadece dört puan gerisindeler. Yabancı futbolcularından yoksun maça başlayan lider Trabzonspor, oynadığı diğer maçlardan çok farklı bir performans sergiledi. Ferhat-Sezer-Tolga ve Barış gibi oyunculara ilk 11 de şans veren Şenol Güneş, özellikle ilk yarıda istediği verimi alamadı. Takım oyunu ile şu an ki başarısını yakalayan bordo mavili takım, sanırım rakibi küçümsedi ve güzel futbolunu sahaya yansıtamadı. Maça Serkan Balcı’nın golü ile adeta 1-0 önde başlayan Trabzonspor, özellikle ilk yarıda rakibinden üstün değildi. Ayağa top oynayan, futbolun gereklerini güçleri oranında sahaya yansıtan Gaziantep Belediyespor takımı her şeye rağmen ilk yarıyı 2-1 mağlup kapatmaktan kurtulamadı. İkinci yarıya direkten dönen bir topla başlayan misafir ekip, Trabzonspor’u pas yaparak çok yordu, oyunu iyi forse etti. Sahadaki sıkıntıya gözleriyle şahit olan Şenol Hoca, belki de bu maç için hiç düşünmediği Engin Baytar’ı 65. Dakikada oyuna soktu. Fakat rakip, oyun disiplininde hiç taviz vermedi, kendi oyununu oynamaya devam etti ve hiç mi hiç panik yapmadı. Selçuk İnan, Serkan Balcı ve Burak Yılmaz’ın gayretleri maçın sonlarına kadar yetti fakat rakibin 87. Dakikadaki organize golüne engel olamadı. Teknik Direktör Erol Azgın ve talebeleri, çok zorlu Avni Aker’den bir puan aldılar. Maçın hakemi Taner Gizlenci, çok iyi bir maç yönetti. Trabzonspor; aşırı güven diyin, rakibi küçümsemek diyin ya da yabancıları bahane edin, sonuç olarak evinde somut iki puanı bıraktı. Rakibe saygı duymak ve rakibi küçümsemek dersleri, özelikle futbolda çok önemli. Lidere yakışmayan bu sonuç, Trabzonspor’un ilk yarı liderliğini asla gölgelemez. Şenol Güneş ve ekibine güvenim sonsuz. Kimse bu skorla panik yapıp ortalığı karıştırmasın. Yol kazaları arada olacaktır. Bu takıma inanlar, bu takımı zafere taşıyacaktır. Trabzonspor’un oyun disiplininden uzak dağınık görüntüsünü beğenmedim. Gaziantep Belediyespor’un korkusuz, pas yapan, ne yaptığını bilen futbolunu çok beğendim.
