description.hltext_display: Famous And Not-So Famous Fans In Awe
description.content:
Dec. 22--It was nothing that hadn't been seen before. The UConn women's team opened up an early lead and added to it relentlessly.
Perhaps only someone who knows basketball and plays it as well as Kemba Walker does, could really appreciate it.
"It's unreal, to be honest with you," said Walker, the UConn men's point guard, who was watching as the UConn women broke the record for consecutive NCAA basketball victories. "They play hard. You watch them, and you would never know they were 88-0, it's like they're 0-88. The play every possession like it's their last. It's fun to watch them play. One of the great things about going to UConn is being able to witness something like this."
It was an historic night, even by Huskies standards. The women beat Florida State 93-62 to break the record set by the UCLA men's team. UCLA won 88 in a row, the Huskies have won 89.
"My grandfather would be thrilled," said Greg Wooden, grandson of the legendary UCLA men's coach, John Wooden, who died last year. "He would be thrilled that his record was bring broken by a women's basketball team. Over the last 10 years or so of his life, he always felt the best basketball was being played at the collegiate level, and it was not by the men."
Tina Charles, a former Huskies All-American, made it back from Russia, where she plays professionally, in time to see the game from a seat behind the UConn bench. Charles played in the streak's first 78 games.
"We never talked about the streak," Charles said, "we just played for the 'Connecticut' across our chest. It did mean a lot to be a part of it, especially with the two championships."
Up in the stands, James Cody of Wolcott brought his daughters, Raven, 11, and Cassidy, 14, as he does for most of the home games.
"I like watching them because they have so much confidence in themselves," Raven said. "They're role models for me."
The streak is about confidence, of course. "This is what I want them to see," James Cody said.
For Bill Smydrs, 80, of Wethersfield, and his wife, Mary Anne, season ticket-holders since 1995, it was the right kind of game.
"I like the games where they win by a lot," he said. "Oh, they've been instrumental for women's basketball. Instrumental."
Greg Wooden, 47, who came from Orange County, Calif., had never been to a women's basketball game. He came, he said, to represent his grandfather and show support for the streak.
"I thought it was important," he said, "because there has been some talk of people not being supportive of it. [John Wooden] would have loved to have been here. He felt the women's game was the closest to his style of play, especially Connecticut. He liked the way they had several superstars on the team who could have scored a lot more points somewhere else, but they sacrificed for the team. They don't care who gets the credit."
-----
To see more of The Hartford Courant, or to subscribe to the newspaper, go to http://www.courant.com/.

description.hltext_display: Kupada İşler Zor
description.content: Spor Toto Süper Liginde bu sezon gururumuz olan Trabzonspor’un, geçen sezon olduğu gibi yine Ziraat Türkiye Kupası’nın sahibi olması için öncelikli olarak gruplardan çıkması gerekiyor. Bordo-mavili ekip, geçen sezon olduğu gibi yine zorlu bir gruba düştü. Geçtiğimiz sezon grubunda Galatasaray vardı, bu kez ise Beşiktaş ile çekişecek gibi gözüküyor. Manisaspor’u yabana atmamak gerekiyor. Ayrıca ilk maçlarda Beşiktaş’ın Gaziantep Büyükşehir Belediyespor’a, Manisaspor’un da Konya Şeker Torku’ya mağlup olduğunu da unutmamalıyız. Zaten kupa maçları hep sürprizlere gebedir.Bir bakarsınız ki hiç hesapta olmayan takımlara kaybetmiş ve hayal kırıklığı yaşamışsınız. Gaziantep Büyükşehir Belediyespor maçı öncesinde, geçen sezon Hüseyin Avni Aker Stadı’nda oynanan Orduspor maçını iyi hatırlamak gerekiyordu. Çünkü Orduspor’un uzun süre 1-0 önde götürdüğü mücadeleyi, Trabzonspor güçbela 2-1 kazanmış ve gruptan çıkma adına büyük bir adım atmıştı. Eğer o maçta puan kaybı yaşasaydı, Bordo-Mavililer gruptan çıkamayacak, tüm Türkiye’deki Trabzonsporluları sokaklara döken kupa şampiyonluğu da gelmeyecekti. İşte bu çerçeveden bakınca, yabancısız Trabzonspor’un, Beşiktaş’ı yenmiş bir rakip karşısında ne yapacağı merak konusuydu.İlk kez veya çok az forma şansı bulan futbolcular, bunu değerlendirecekmiydi? Eğer onlar istenilenleri yapabilirse, Trabzonspor’un da kazanması kolay olacaktı. Şartlar ne olursa olsun Süper Ligin liderinin bir ikinci lig takımı karşısında zorlanmasını bile düşünmek istemiyorduk.Fakat Beşiktaş’ı, İnönü’de yenmiş bir takımla oynadığımızın da farkına varmalıydık. Trabzonspor maça tatil havasında başlamadı. Rakip kalede etkili olmaya, kaptırılan topların peşinde koşmaya çalışan bir takım görüntüsü vardı. Gaziantep Büyükşehir Belediyespor da hiç kolay lokma olmadığını ilk 45 dakikadaki direnciyle gösterdi. Serkan’ın erken golüne rağmen, oyundan kopmadılar. Kornerden beraberlik golünü atan konuk ekip, Trabzonspor’u zorlayacağını gösterdi. Ancak o golde, savunmanın altı pasta rakibe 3 pas yaptırması anlaşılır gibi değildi. İlk yarının 2-1 bitmesi ise biraz olsun nefes almamıza neden oldu. İkinci yarıda sanki ligin lideri konuk ekipti. Çünkü Trabzonspor karşısında baskı kurdu. Bunda orta sahadaki Sezer, Selçuk gibi isimlerin etkisizliğinin yanında Burak’ın tatile erken çıkmış olmasının da rolü büyüktü. Güneş’in özellikle Burak’a nasıl bu kadar sabrettiğini anlamak mümkün olmadı.Sonuç olarak kupaya hiç de beklenmedik bir beraberlikle başlarken, gruptan çıkmanın da kolay olmadığını görmüş oldu.

description.hltext_display: CHP li Köktürk: "Başbakan a Ismarlama Soru mu Soruluyor?"
description.content:
CHP Zonguldak Milletvekili Ali İhsan Köktürk, Başbakan Recep Tayyip Erdoğan'a "ısmarlama soru" sorulduğu iddialarının doğru olup olmadığını sordu. CHP Zonguldak Milletvekili Ali İhsan Köktürk, Başbakan Recep Tayyip Erdoğan'ın yanıtlaması istemiyle TBMM Başkanlığı'na soru önergesi verdi. "Ismarlama soru" sorulduğu şeklindeki iddiaları TBMM gündemine taşıyan Köktürk, Başbakan'a, şu soruları yöneltti:
"Başbakanlık sözcüsü Kemal Öztürk, basın sözcüsü müdür? Yoksa, sansür kurulu başkanı mıdır?
Başbakan'a sorulacak soruların, yine Başbakanlıkça belirlendiği dünyada başka bir ülke var mıdır?
Geçmişte ve şimdi Başbakanlık görevlileri tarafından seçilmiş kişilere, soru sordurulmuştur mudur?
Başbakan Sayın Erdoğan'a soru sorma ölçütleri nelerdir?
Devlet gücünün kullanılarak, tehdit edilerek, korku salınarak "istenenlerin yazdırılma' girişimi, nasıl bir anlayışın ve projenin bir ürünüdür?"(ANKA) (MG/ÖMR) (Ankara Haber Ajansı) 3 dakika önce.. [2430071]

description.hltext_display: Brotam cebolas gigantes no Litoral Norte
description.content:
Na pequena horta do aposentado Ivo Casagrande, morador de Quintão, bulbos do tamanho de cocos chamam a atenção da comunidade
Ninguém sabe se é o clima, a mudança da Lua ou um segredo guardado embaixo da terra. Para os moradores de Quintão, no Litoral Norte, a horta do metalúrgico aposentado Ivo Casagrande, 70 anos, tem algo especial. Nela, brotam cebolas do tamanho de cocos, que precisam ser seguradas com as duas mãos. Na comunidade, Ivo já é conhecido como o homem das cebolas gigantes.
– É só grama cortada, não tem adubo, ureia, nada – explica o agricultor natural de Guaporé e há 15 anos no balneário.
- Fenômeno ainda sem explicação
Em casa, ao lado da mulher, Zuleida Mayer Casagrande, 62 anos, ele ergue a cebola como se fosse um troféu. Ivo cultiva frutas, verduras e legumes como hobby e não sabe explicar o que aconteceu.
Mas uma coisa é certa: sabor na comida da família não irá faltar nos próximos verões.
Curiosidades da planta
- Muito utilizada como tempero, a cebola possui um formato oval com casca de cor alaranjada. Internamente é composta por camadas.
- Tem um sabor forte e ácido e é rica em flavonoides, elemento com propriedades anti-inflamatória e anti-oxidante.
- Conta também com sais minerais, tais como ferro, potássio, sódio, fósforo e cálcio, além das vitaminas C e do complexo B.
- Entre os meses de setembro a março, ocorre o período de safra. Mas encontramos cebola durante o ano todo.
- Planta de origem asiática, a cebola apresenta, aproximadamente, 40 calorias para cada 100g.
- Além de ser utilizada como tempero, a cebola é ótima para a elaboração de sopas, suflês, patês e purês.
DIÁRIO GAÚCHO
Compartilhe O que é isso?
O que é isso? x fechar

description.hltext_display: Care providers want investigation into service shake-up
description.author: Peter Law
description.content:
CARE providers called last night for an investigation into Cardiff council’s controversial shake-up of its home care services.
Care Forum Wales (CFW) claimed the tendering process – which has seen the number of private care firms the authority uses to provide 80% of its home care cut from 56 to 11 – was fundamentally flawed.
CFW, which represents 550 independent care service providers, has written to the Deputy Minister for Health and Social Services, Gwenda Thomas, requesting she instructs the Chief Inspector of the Care and Social Services Inspectorate for Wales to carry out an investigation.
As well as cutting the number of contracts, the length of visits to 1,900 mostly elderly residents will be monitored with new electronic time management systems.
Earlier this month, a disabled Cardiff pensioner told the Echo she would rather die than change carers as a result of the shake-up. Kathleen Cartlidge, 73, was so upset by the authority’s plans to overhaul the current system of home care provision in the city she threatened to go on hunger strike.
Mario Kreft, CFW honorary chief executive, said there had been a lack of consultation.
Following a unanimous resolution by the ruling body of CFW, he has written to the council’s corporate director for social care, Neelam Bhardwaja, outlining the concerns.
Mr Kreft said CFW had members who had both won and lost contracts in the tender process and was speaking out because of the issues raised by service users, care workers and the public.
"The tender weighting of 50% price and 50% quality is a driver purely for the lowest price possible as opposed to genuinely wanting quality measures to ‘win out’ in any tender process,” he said.
"It is therefore clear to us that the campaign by the Assembly Government to promote dignity and respect for all users of social care services apparently has not been considered relevant to domiciliary care service users in Cardiff.”
Mr Kreft said he would also write to the Care Council for Wales about the lack of consultation and treatment of social care workers.
An Assembly Government spokesman said Ms Thomas would respond to the letter, but that it would be inappropriate to comment further at this stage.
A Cardiff council spokesman said the authority was satisfied that the procurement process undertaken was open and transparent and complied with the procurement regulations. He said no challenges had been made to the court in relation to this procurement process for domiciliary care services.
"There has been a public scrutiny of the decision and a representative from the Care Forum Wales provided evidence to the scrutiny committee meeting,” he said. "The question has to be asked why has Care Forum Wales waited until it is outside the review period before making these further comments.”
The spokesman also said local service providers were consulted and involved in drawing up the method used for the procurement.
"The council has a responsibility to provide care for people whilst ensuring the best value for council tax payers. Bids for contracts were evaluated on a 50-50 split between cost and quality. Contracts were not awarded to all of those providers offering the lowest price,” he said.

description.hltext_display: Tır, Öğrencileri Taşıyan Minibüse Çarptı: 17 Yaralı
description.content:
Konya'nın Karapınar ilçesinde meydana gelen trafik kazasında 16 öğrenci ile öğrencileri taşıyan minibüsün şoförü yaralandı.
Edinilen bilgiye göre, Mehmet Y'nin kullandığı 31 R 0917 plakalı TIR, Karapınar Çevre yolunda tali yoldan çıkan İsmail Balkan'ın kullandığı 42 JC 043 plakalı lise öğrencilerini taşıyan servis minibüsüne çarptı. Arkadan gelen Hasan Hüseyin A'nın (49) kullandığı 42 AE 617 plakalı kamyon da bu iki araca arkadan çarptı.
Kazada, minibüs şoförü Balkan ile minibüste bulunan Karapınar İbrahim Gündüz Anadolu Lisesi öğrencisi oldukları öğrenilen Gülçin Gülcü, Metin Tartan, Emet Köprüsoy, Mehtap Karataş, Emsal Saçlı, Amil Kalkan, Meral Zengin, Fatma Kurtoğlu, Murat Kurtoğlu, Şeyma Emir, Banu Yazgan, Fadime Kalkan, İbrahim Gündoğdu, Mintiha Acar, Kezban Ecer ve Mürüvvet Ocakçı yaralandı.
Karapınar ve Konya'daki hastanelere kaldırılan yaralıların sağlık durumlarının iyi olduğu öğrenildi. (Anadolu Ajansı) 6 dakika önce.. [2430070]

description.hltext_display: Martek shares surge on buyout offer� 21 Dec 2010
description.content:
AMSTERDAM - Shares of Martek Biosciences Corp. surged on Tuesday after vitamin maker Royal DSM NV said it would buy the company for $1.09 billion.
THE SPARK: Royal DSM is paying $31.50 per share, marking a 35 percent premium to Martek's closing price on Monday.
THE BIG PICTURE: Royal DSM, based in the Netherlands, makes nutritional supplements, fibers used in bulletproof vests, and ingredients used in vaccines, as well as industrial chemicals. The buyout of Martek would add a range of nutritional products, including infant formula. Martek, based in Colombia, Md., has Danone, Nestle, Kellogg's and General Mills, among its customers.
SHARE ACTION: Up $8.19, or 35.1 percent, to $31.55, signaling that investors agree with the buyout offer. The stock reached a 52-week high of $32.75 earlier in the session before falling back to the buyout offer price.

description.hltext_display: TCU's Emily Carter has made a career of outsmarting the opposition
description.content:
Dec. 22--Emily Carter realized early in her basketball career that she wasn't going to excel with her shooting skills alone.
Although the TCU senior has been a natural shooter since she started playing as a young girl in Bossier City, La., she learned it wasn't enough against quicker, more athletic players.
"I was not the most athletic, and I'm still not," said Carter, who will lead the Horned Frogs (6-5) against Georgia (8-2) at 6:30 tonight at Daniel-Meyer Coliseum. "But what set me apart was I was smarter than everybody in the club league. I wasn't going to be quicker than my opponent, but I could outsmart them so I could still score."
And she has always scored. From ages 10-15 she competed in free-throw shooting contests and finished third nationally one year. She holds the school record (male or female) at Bossier City's Airline High School with 2,574 career points and has led the Frogs in scoring the past two seasons. She set a TCU single-game record with 43 points against SMU on Nov. 17. Her seven 3-pointers Sunday against Sam Houston State tied for third-most in a game in school history, and she is averaging 21.7 points per game, 11th-best in the nation.
"She's one of the smartest players I've ever coached," TCU coach Jeff Mittie said. "I could see that during her redshirt year. She really understood the game."
Mittie envisioned the 6-foot Carter as a shooting guard "who could really stretch a defense." He noticed Carter finding ways to score against faster athletes and figured with a rigorous conditioning regimen at TCU she would maximize her athletic ability and learn to score in other ways besides set shots behind the 3-point arc.
"She wasn't as explosive off the dribble and her shot was a little slow," Mittie said. "She worked hard at that. Now she can score all over the floor. She's very crafty; she figures it out."
Since the sixth grade, Carter, who shoots left-handed, has used the same free-throw shooting ritual: three dribbles with her right hand, a deep breath, and shoot.
She's made a habit of shooting as many as 50 free throws after every practice for years. The work ethic has led to a TCU career record free-throw percentage of better than 84 percent and a string of 60 consecutive made free throws, second-most in NCAA history. The streak was snapped at UT-San Antonio on Nov. 19. Carter has made 173 career 3-pointers, third-most all-time at TCU, and is seventh on the school's career-scoring list with 1,214 points.
Carter's aunt and grandfather played basketball at Louisiana Tech. Her younger brother, David, 21, is a pitcher at UNLV. Part of her wanted to continue the family tradition of playing at Tech, but after spending a weekend at TCU she never made her official visit to Tech.
"I met all the players and it was really a family atmosphere," Carter said. "They were really sincere and honest. I liked that they didn't sit there and lie to me about how everything is perfect, because we know it's not. It just felt right here."
Carter hopes to play professionally after graduating with an English degree in May and wants to coach one day. Mittie wants her to start acting more like a coach on the floor to guide some of her younger teammates. It's a facet of her game she is trying to improve.
"Good teams can come back from 15-point deficits in five minutes if you let them," she said. "It's about staying focused for the whole 40 minutes. That's something, as a senior leader, I need to stress more, keeping everyone focused on the floor and not looking at the scoreboard and saying we have the game won. We need to keep pushing and pushing."
"She could make a bigger impact with this team by just saying little things," Mittie said. "This team, in particular, needs that kind of leadership from her. That's not easy for her. It's something we have to constantly prod her to do. But she's getting better."
Stefan Stevenson
817-390-7760
-----
To see more of the Fort Worth Star-Telegram, or to subscribe to the newspaper, go to http://www.dfw.com.

description.hltext_display: HubConnected LLC and Traci Shulkin Launch Weston - Wellesley,...
description.content:
HubConnected LLC is proud to announce that Traci Shulkin, a Realtor with Benoit Mizner Simon & Co., has launched a new hyper-local real estate blog.
LiveInWestonWellesleyMA.com (http://www.liveinwestonwellesleyma.com) is dedicated to life in the Massachusetts towns of Weston and Wellesley. In addition to discussing the real estate market, the blog will feature wide-ranging articles about the two towns, events occurring in Massachusetts, family activities, and tips on local shopping, restaurants, schools and neighborhoods.
“I’m very excited about the launch of the blog. I’m confident that it will be an extremely useful online resource for home buyers thinking about moving to Weston, Wellesley, and the surrounding towns. In addition, I hope to keep it relatively ‘light-hearted’ at times, with some entertaining, yet informative, posts on the 'comings and goings' around town,” said Ms. Shulkin.
The blog features sharp and modern design elements capturing the sophisticated, yet traditional, aspects of homes in the Weston and Wellesley, MA market. Home buyers will be able to search Multiple Listing Service (MLS) data on the site, and also download an iPhone/iPad home search application. Helpful Weston and Wellesley local links will also be available. The blog was designed and developed by HubConnected LLC in Needham, MA.
Traci Shulkin is an experienced real estate agent serving the Metrowest Massachusetts market. Prior to entering the real estate field, Traci was a Certified Public Accountant (CPA), with positions at Fidelity Investments and Goldman Sachs. Throughout her career, whether working with accounting clients, foreign exchange traders, or real estate buyers and sellers, Traci has viewed “building trust” as the cornerstone of her job. Traci Shulkin can be reached at tracishulkin (at) gmail (dot) com.
HubConnected, LLC (http://hubconnected.com) HubConnected LLC provides custom designed Wordpress Blog sites with built-in Multiple Listing Service/IDX search and featured listings, fully integrated with the major social media sites such as Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter. HubConnected’s solutions enable Realtors to showcase their listings, harness the power of social media, and become an expert in their local real estate market, all while generating valuable new connections and leads.

description.hltext_display: Ersan, Staples Center da Double Double Yaptı
description.content:
Milli yıldızımız Ersan İlyasova'nın double double yaptığı karşılaşmada Milwaukee Bucks, Staples Center'da LA Lakers'ı 98-79'luk skorla mağlup etti.
Bu karşılaşmada ilk beş başlayan ve 33 dakika Oyunda kalan Milli yıldızımız Ersan İlyasova, 17 sayı- 11 ribaund- 1 asist- 1 blok ile double double yaptı. Brandon Jennings'in sakatlığı nedeniyle forma giymediği karşılaşmada Earl Boykins 22 sayı- 3 ribaund- 2 asist, John Salmons 20 sayı- 3 ribaund- 6 asist ve Andrew Bogut da 15 sayı- 8 ribaund- 4 asist ile maçı tamamladı.
Dördüncü periyotta Oyundan ihraç edilen Kobe Bryant, 21 sayı- 3 ribaund- 2 asist ile oynarken, Pau Gasol 15 sayı- 11 ribaund ve Lamar Odom da 12 sayı- 10 ribaund- 6 asist ile mücadeleyi noktaladı.
(Cihan Haber Ajansı) 7 dakika önce.. [2430069]

description.hltext_display: Palermo, sequestrati centinaia chili carne: denunciate 4 persone
description.content: Rifornivano i numerosi chioschi, sparsi per Palermo, adibiti alla vendita delle rino-mate "stigghiole" e "pane con la milza" non meno le "frattaglie", tanto apprezzate da moltissimi palermitani. La carne però era custodita nella più completa sporcizia ed in violazione delle più elementari norme igienico-sanitarie. Quattro palermitani sono stati denunciati dai carabinieri in un blitz avvenuto questa mattina in via Buonpensiero all'interno di un'area recintata, costituita da diversi locali e stalle. Dentro alcuni di questi locali i militari hanno scoperto la presenza di centinaia di kg. di carne e di frattaglie, solo in parte congelate, detenute in condizioni igieniche pessime, nonostante fossero, come accertato, destinate alla distribuzione per uso alimentare. In particolare, i militari hanno rinvenuto, in uno dei locali adibiti a stalla, circa 30 suini, 7 bovini, 3 cavalli e numerosi volatili da cortile, custoditi in condizioni disastrose dal punto di vista igienico e di benessere per gli animali stessi. In un altro locale attiguo, i Carabinieri hanno poi rinvenuto e sequestrato numerose attrezzature per la bollitura della carne, un congelatore, nonchè centinaia di kg. tra frattaglie (polmoni di bovino, milze, intestini) e teste di bovino. Anche in questo caso i proprietari dei locali non hanno saputo giustificarne la provenienza né produrre qualsivoglia documentazione sanitaria. E' opportuno ricordare che gli intestini di specie bovina sono vietati all'uso alimentare in virtù delle note misure anti-bse, in quanto pericolosi (classificati come categoria 1) per la salute pubblica.Custodita in locali sporchi era destinata alla vendita

description.hltext_display: Ömer li Bulls Philadelphia 76ers ı 121-76 Yendi
description.content:
Milli basketbolcumuz Ömer Aşık'ın takımı Chicago Bulls, %64.5 saha içi isabet oranıyla mücadele ettiği maçta ağırladığı Philadelphia 76ers'ı 121-76 yendi. Milli basketbolcumuz Ömer Aşık'ın formasını giydiği Chicago Bulls, United Center'da konuk ettiği Philadelphia 76ers'ı 121-76'lık farklı skorla mağlup etti. Chicago, %64.5 saha içi isabet oranı yakaladığı maçın 3 periyodunda rakibine 31-11 üstünlük kurarak mücadeleyi 45 sayılık farkla kazandı.
Yedek başladığı maçta 20 dakika süre alan Ömer Aşık 8 sayı- 6 ribaund- 1 asist- 2 blokluk performansıyla beğeni topladı. Derrick Rose'un 22 sayı- 5 ribaund- 12 asistle yıldızlaştığı Bulls'da Luol Deng 22 sayı- 2 ribaund- 2 asist- 2 top çalmayla mücadele etti. Ev sahibinde Carlos Boozer 16 sayı- 11 ribaund- 3 asistle double double yaparken tecrübeli oyucu Kurt Thomas takımına 12 sayı- 8 ribaund- 5 blokluk katkı verdi. Chicago yedeklerinden C.J. Watson 14; Kyle Korver da 10 sayı kaydetti.
Sadece 2 Oyuncusu çift haneli sayılara ulaşabilen Philadelphia'da ise Andre Iguodala'nın 17 sayı- 4 ribaund- 2 asisti ağır yenilgiyi önleyemedi. 17. mağlubiyetini alan 76'da kenardan gelen Thaddeus Young 12 sayı- 7 ribaund- 2 top çalma üretti.
(Cihan Haber Ajansı) 7 dakika önce.. [2430068]

description.hltext_display: «Вашингтон» разгромил дома «Нью-Джерси»
description.content:
Команда Александра Овечкина одолела в родных стенах «Нью-Джерси» с разгромным счетом в рамках регулярного чемпионата Национальной хоккейной лиги. Об этом сообщает NHL . «Вашингтон» – «Нью-Джерси» – 5:1 (1:0, 3:1, 1:0) 1:0 – 17 Гордон (Эрскин, Юханссон)

description.hltext_display: Japan forecasts GDP growth to slow in 2011
description.content:
In its outlook report, the Cabinet Office also said consumer prices will stop falling but will not rise, dealing a blow to Prime Minister Naoto Kan's stated goal of ending deflation in the year.
Recent year-on-year falls in the consumer price index will halt in the middle of next year, the Cabinet Office said, but suggested this would not represent the defeat of chronic deflation in the economy.
Growth is forecast to slow to a real 1.5 percent from 3.1 percent in this year, the government said in its outlook report.
Government stimulus measures helped boost domestic production and consumption in the current year, including subsidy programmes for purchases of environmentally friendly vehicles and appliances.
Japan's economy grew 4.5 percent in the July-September quarter, amplified by a rush by car buyers to use expiring subsidies and smokers who stocked up on cigarettes ahead of a tax hike during the period.
The hottest summer on record also drove sales of items such as air conditioners, helping spur growth in the quarter. Private consumption accounts for around 60 percent of gross domestic product.
However, analysts warn of a contraction in the fourth calendar quarter as the removal of such one-off factors highlights Japan's exposure to a weakening export picture and slow domestic demand.
Recent data has shown a slump in industrial output, especially among carmakers, as well as weakening consumer confidence as such incentive programmes come to an end.
The economy remains mired in crippling deflation, as falling prices prompt consumers to hold off on purchase decisions in the expectation of further price drops, clouding future corporate investment.
Japan's export growth accelerated for the first time in nine months in November, data showed Wednesday, but the reading of a 9.1 percent increase fell short of expectations amid fears of a looming economic slowdown.
"The pick-up in the year-on-year growth rate of exports in November may look encouraging but exports are heading for a big quarterly fall," noted research consultancy Capital Economics.
Analysts said the Japanese economy remains locked in a trend of shrinking exports due to a stronger yen, which makes Japanese products more expensive in overseas markets, and expectations that overseas demand will weaken.
On Tuesday the Bank of Japan held its key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing".
The central bank in October forecast that the country's economy would expand 2.1 percent in the fiscal year ending in April, and 1.8 percent in 2011.
Japan last month passed an extra budget worth 58 billion US dollars to cover a new stimulus package aimed at averting the threat of a "double-dip" recession.
Kan's second stimulus package since he came to power is designed to ease concerns over deflation and a strong yen, and includes job programmes, welfare spending and assistance for small businesses.
Kan took office in June promising to slash spending and work towards cutting the country's massive public debt, at nearly 200 percent of gross domestic product.
But the state of Japan's economy has complicated his ambitions.
Consumer spending growth is expected to slow next year to 0.6 percent from 1.5 percent this year.
However, the government forecast unemployment to continue to slowly improve, with the jobless rate expected to fall in the fiscal year starting April to 4.7 percent from 5.0 percent currently.

description.hltext_display: Суд ввел на Байкальском ЦБК процедуру внешнего управления
description.content: Арбитражный суд Иркутской области в среду ввел на Байкальском ЦБК процедуру внешнего управления сроком до 2 июня 2012 года. Внешним управляющим назначен представитель саморегулируемой организации арбитражных управляющих ЦФО Александр Иванов, передает РИА «Новости» . Процедура внешнего управления введена по инициативе «Альфа-банка». Кандидатуру внешнего управляющего также предложил банк. Закладки:

description.hltext_display: Новая коллекция наушников AKG
description.content:
, разработанная совместно с Куинси Джонсом!
Музыка– наше вдохновение, музыка – наш дар, музыка – наша страсть и одержимость… Эти прекрасные слова стали лейтмотивом августовской выставки IFA-2010, на которой концерн Harman International Industries впервые представил именную серию известного композитора, музыканта и продюсера Куинси Джонса, разработанную совместно с известнейшим австрийским брендом AKG.
Коллекция состоит из трех типов наушников: вкладыши AKG Q350, мини-уши AKG Q460 и студийные наушники AKG Q701, каждые из которых представлены в трех цветовых решениях – стильном черном с белыми вставками, нарядном белом с зелеными вставками и позитивном зеленом.
AKG Q350. Подлинная точность AKG и безошибочно узнаваемый стиль
Эти наушники занимают такое же почетное место в модельном ряду AKG, как и всемирно известный музыкант Куинси Джонс – в мире музыки. Они отличаются совершенной точностью воспроизведения любого музыкального материала, широким динамическим диапазоном и идеально подходят для использования с музыкальными плеерами, в том числе новейшими поколениями iPhone и iPod.
«Несомненно, стиль важен. Но содержание и суть гораздо важнее» - К.Д.
AKG Q460. Великолепное звучание и выбор для путешествий
Q460 были разработаны с учетом длительного прослушивания музыки в любой точке земного шара, ведь складной механизм 3D-AXIS2 предназначен для их удобной переноски, а мягкие амбушюры сделают прослушивание любимых мелодий еще более комфортным. В комплект входят два съемных односторонних кабеля разной длины.
«Я часто путешествую, поэтому наушники Q460 мне просто необходимы» - К.Д.
AKG Q701. Cсовершенство – но разве от Куинси Джонса можно дать чего-то иного?
Для музыкального продюсера наушники являются одним из главных средств для достижения успеха, и за всю историю главной премии в области музыки GRAMMY самым успешным продюсером является Куинси Джонс. Долгое плодотворное сотрудничество инженеров компании AKG и самого именитого продюсера на планете ознаменовалось созданием именными наушниками Q701, которые обладают идеальным качеством звучания. Как и другие студийные наушники, они оснащены звуковыми катушками с намоткой плоским проводом и мембраной Varimotion, благодаря чему воссозданная звуковая картина имеет четкую детализацию, обладает объемом и глубиной. Более того, Q701 делают это с той страстью и напором, которые были изначально вложены в композицию.
«Это единственные наушники, которые выдают именно то звучание, которого мы добивались при создании записей Billy Jean, Thriller и Give Me The Heart. Самые великолепные наушники, которыми я когда-либо пользовался.» - К.Д.

description.hltext_display: Yapı Kooperatifleri ile İlgili Yetkiler Devredildi
description.content:
'nca yapı kooperatifleri ve üst kuruluşları ile ilgili başlatılmış veya planlanmış iş ve işlemler ile bunlara dair her türlü hak, yetki ve görevler Bayındırlık ve İskan Bakanlığı'na devredildi.
Yapı kooperatiflerinin devrine ilişkin 13 Haziran 2010 tarih ve 27610 sayılı Resmi Gazete'de yayımlanarak yürürlüğe giren 5983 sayılı 'Kooperatifler Kanunu' ile Bazı Kanun ve Kanun Hükmünde Kararnamelerde Değişiklik Yapılmasına Dair Kanun'un 5. maddesi ile 1163 sayılı kanuna eklenen geçici madde 3'de, 1163 sayılı Kooperatifler Kanunu'nun Ek/1 maddesi yürürlüğe girdi. Buna göre; 'nca yapı kooperatifleri ve üst kuruluşları ile ilgili tüm işlem ve yetkiler Bayındırlık ve İskan Bakanlığı'na devredildi.
Bursa Ticaret ve Sanayi İl Müdür Vekili M. Latif Deniz imzası ile yapılan yazılı açıklamada; Bayındırlık ve İskan Bakanlığı'nın, 'nca başlatılmış veya planlanmış iş ve işlemleri yürütmeye, bunlar hakkında yeni iş ve işlemler yapmaya, gerekli görülenleri tasfiye etmeye yetkili olduğu belirtildi. Latif Deniz, şöyle dedi: "'nca yapı kooperatifleri ve üst kuruluşları ile kooperatiflere ilişkin olarak başlatılmış veya planlanmış iş ve işlemler ile bunlara dair her türlü hak, yetki ve görevler aynı kanunun yürürlük maddesi hükümleri uyarınca 13.12.2010 tarihi itibari ile Bayındırlık ve İskan Bakanlığı'na devredilmiştir. Buna göre, ilimizde bulunan konut yapı, küçük sanayi sitesi yapı, toplu işyeri yapı kooperatifleri ile bunların üst kuruluşlarına ait iş ve işlemler 13.12.2010 tarihi itibariyle Bayındırlık ve İskan Müdürlüğü tarafından yerine getirilecektir."
(Cihan Haber Ajansı) 8 dakika önce.. [2430067]

description.hltext_display: Liberty rallies past Easton
description.content:
Dec. 22--Those seeing only the final score from the early-season Lehigh Valley Conference boys basketball showdown between Liberty and Easton on Tuesday night in Forks Township probably figured that one of the teams held the ball.
Not so.
These two are considered two of the area's best for more reasons than just their offense.
They both can play tenacious defense, and the Hurricanes' "D" was just a little tougher down the stretch in a 37-32 victory that handed the Red Rovers their first loss of the season after four wins.
Liberty (4-1, 2-0) held Easton to just 10 second-half points and erased a 24-15 third-quarter deficit.
"I don't know if we've ever played a game with Easton that you'd consider pretty," Hurricanes coach Chad Landis said after his team hounded Easton into 4-for-23 shooting after halftime.
"They're very athletic and talented and we'd like to think we're fairly athletic and talented as well. When you match those two things up, baskets are hard to come by."
Liberty had its troubles in the second quarter when the defending District 11 4A champs managed just five points. The 'Canes turned it over eight times in that eight-minute stretch and made just two of the five shots they attempted.
After Louie Horwath scored off an Alewdy Rivera feed with 3:50 left in the half, Liberty wouldn't get another field goal until nearly three minutes were gone in the third quarter.
"We were awful in the second quarter and Easton can make you look that way," Landis said. "I don't think we unraveled, but we struggled scoring and the more we struggled, the more aggressive they got. Halftime couldn't have come at a better spot for us. We regrouped at halftime."
Rivera, a senior guard who was the 'Canes' hero at the foul line in their big win over Allen, sparked the Liberty rally in the third period.
He hit two free throws and the second of his back-to-back 3-pointers gave the 'Canes a 27-26 lead at the end of the third quarter.
Rivera came through again in the fourth period with a steal and pass that led to the go-ahead basket.
With the score tied at 28, he came away with a loose ball and fired it downcourt to an open Darrun Hilliard for a layup and the lead with 3:25 remaining.
Liberty wouldn't trail again.
"Alewdy has waited his turn in our program and never asked for anything to be given to him," Landis said. "He's earned his chance and, man, he's making the most of it."
Hilliard would convert another layup and added two foul shots to pad the lead to 34-28 before DeVante Queen hit a short jumper to end a five-minute scoring drought for Easton with 35 seconds left.
Alex Akabogu answered with a pair of free throws at the other end and Liberty hung on for the hard-fought victory that proved the 'Canes win games in all kinds of ways.
"This was a tough one and with Easton keying on me, other guys had to step up," said Hilliard, who fought through double teams and foul trouble to score a team-high 13 points.
"We felt we just turned it over too much in the first half and that led to a lot of easy baskets for them. We just had to limit the turnovers and dig in on defense in the second. We kept our heads up and battled back."
Easton's James Middleton led all scorers with 15 points, but just four came in the second half as the Rovers scuffled from the field.
"I don't know exactly where it happened, but we missed two foul shots and they made back-to-back 3s and that deflated us," Easton coach Jim Hutnik said. "It's going to happen with a young team. We may have seniors, but these guys have not been in games like this before. This was a big test for them.
"They tightened up their defense, put more pressure on us and we should have relished that ... beating the pressure for layups. Instead, our shot selection left something to be desired. We threw up a lot of bad shots and things snowballed."
But Easton, which opened the season by beating a powerful Pocono Mountain West team, has proven it's not going to fall apart.
The Rovers (4-1, 1-1) are much improved from the squad that struggled through a 12-11 season a year ago.
"I can't be disappointed because the kids play with a lot of heart and passion," Hutnik said. "You hope they learn and move on. I'd like to think we're one of the best teams in the league and can compete with anybody. I think we're going to be in the mix.
"A bunch of teams are going to be fighting for a wild card and we could be one of them. But even though we lost tonight and Liberty's in our division, I'd like to think we can still win our division, too."
-----
To see more of The Morning Call, or to subscribe to the newspaper, go to http://www.mcall.com.
Copyright (c) 2010, The Morning Call, Allentown, Pa.
Distributed by McClatchy-Tribune Information Services.
For more information about the content services offered by McClatchy-Tribune Information Services (MCT), visit www.mctinfoservices.com.
A service of YellowBrix, Inc.

description.hltext_display: Nightmare before Christmas as thousands hit by travel turmoil disruption
description.author: Helen McArdle
description.content:
Christmas travel plans have been thrown into further chaos after an electrical fault saw hundreds of rail commuters evacuated from stricken trains on the main east coast route between Scotland and London.
The problem that affected an overhead power line yesterday between King?s Cross and Peterborough came as thousands of air passengers remained stranded at airports across the UK and London Heathrow operated only a third of its scheduled flights, a scenario airport chiefs expect to continue until at least 6am tomorrow.
The disruption also affected rail services including Virgin, ScotRail, First TransPennine Express, Northern Rail, London Midland and Chiltern.
Last night rail operators East Coast laid on three limited service trains in a bid to get stranded passengers home, with commuters journeying to Scotland crowding on to a single King?s Cross to Edinburgh service.
Passengers unable to travel yesterday were advised to use tickets on other routes or try and use them again today.
Scots-born William Dalrymple was just one of those caught up in the disruption. He had waited at King?s Cross station with a wheelchair for his 89-year-old mother Susan, who began her journey from Fife at 10am but had still not arrived by 5.15pm yesterday.
Mr Dalrymple, 57, said: ?She?s been in tears last night and this morning on the phone because she?s not as independent as she used to be. ?Anything that?s unexpected tends to throw her completely.? Mr Dalrymple, a teacher originally from Fife, said all he knew was that she had reached Newcastle, but had no idea whether she had continued her journey from there. ?No one can say for definite where she is,? he said. ?She doesn?t have a mobile and so she doesn?t have a way of phoning me directly. ?We have an onward journey from here to Surrey so it?s a very, very long day for her.? Carolyn Watt, a 21-year-old textile design student in Brighton was trying to get home to Edinburgh in time for Christmas. She said: ?I was supposed to get the train home today, but my gran saw on the news that there was something going on at Peterborough. I checked Network Rail and they said there were no East Coast trains running so I just stayed at home. ?I can use my ticket any day so I?m going to try again tomorrow and if there?s nothing I?ll try again the next day. But obviously there?s problems with the planes as well so I might have to give up on getting home for Christmas.? Network Rail said services would be fully restored by 6am today, but the backlog of services and stranded passengers will take days to clear.
Michael Roberts, chief executive of the Association of Train Operating Companies (Atoc), said: ?Network Rail and train companies will continue to work flat out through the coming days and nights to keep as many services running as possible in the run-up to Christmas.? Meanwhile, Scots continue to feel the knock-on effects of the snow and ice which have wreaked havoc on London airports.
All British Airways flights between Glasgow and London Heathrow scheduled to depart today have been cancelled, with British Midland also badly affected.
Glasgow cancelled a total of 50 flights, including 23 to and from Heathrow and four to and from London Gatwick. At Edinburgh, there were 48 flight cancellations ? 24 to and from Heathrow ? and in Aberdeen a total of 44 flights cancelled, 23 to and from Heathrow.
Prime Minister David Cameron said he was ?frustrated? by the continued disruption at Heathrow as the Government offered military support to help clear the snow. He said: ?If it?s understandable that Heathrow had to close briefly, I?m frustrated on behalf of all those affected that it?s taking so long for the situation to improve. There have been intensive discussions between [Transport Secretary] Philip Hammond and BAA about how best to ensure that normal flying capacity is resumed as soon as possible.?

description.hltext_display: Hidayet li Orlando, Mavericks e 105-99 Kaybetti
description.content:
Milli yıldızımız Hidayet Türkoğlu'nun da formasını giydiği Orlando Magic, Amway Arena'da oynanan karşılaşmada Dallas Mavericks'e 105-99'luk skorla mağlup oldu.
Bu mücadelede ilk beş başlayan ve 39 dakika süre alan Milli yıldızımız Hidayet Türkoğlu, 9 sayı- 1 ribaund- 8 asist- 2 top çalma ve 1 blok ile maçı tamamladı. Orlando'da Dwight Howard 26 sayı- 23 ribaund- 3 top çalma ve 2 blok ile double double yaparken, JJ Redick 21 sayı- 3 ribaund ve Jameer Nelson da 19 sayı- 3 ribaund- 6 asist ile oynadı.
Dallas Mavericks'de ise Caron Butler 20 sayı- 4 ribaund ile takımının en skorer ismi olurken, Dirk Nowitzki 17 sayı- 8 ribaund- 5 asist ve Tyson Chandler da 7/7 şut isabetiyle 16 sayı- 4 ribaund ile mücadeleyi noktaladı.
(Cihan Haber Ajansı) 8 dakika önce.. [2430066]

description.hltext_display: Premier appoints MPs to lead flood response (ABC)
description.content:
The Premier has appointed local members of parliament Ken Baston and Vince Catania to lead the government's response to the flood.
Mr Baston will liaise with local government while Mr Catania will engage with the community, local businesses and growers.
The Director General of the Department of Premier and Cabinet Peter Conran will travel to Carnarvon tomorrow to assess the government's recovery response.
Water levels low
The Water Corporation says water levels in Carnarvon's storage tanks are now very low and may become intermittent from six o'clock this evening.The authority is still working to try and restore full supply to the town after the local borefield was badly damaged by flooding.
The Corporation has urged residents to restrict their water use to essential needs only.
Flood mitigation
Water Minister Bill Marmion has committed to completing stage two of a flood mitigation plan for Carnarvon.
The first stage was finished in 2008 and there has been criticism that failure to finish the project made recent flooding in the region more severe.
Mr Marmion has told ABC's Country Hour he will make the second stage of the plan a top priority."There's a fair bit of work that's being done on stage two and this event will probably be able to help us in terms of designing stage two to make sure that we do the best possible design to control the water flow," he said.
"I certainly will be making this my highest priority, one of my highest priorities."

description.hltext_display: Nach Schuss auf Lebensgefährten in Oberösterreich: Opfer tot
description.author: Kofler Renate
description.content:
Linz – Ein 27-jähriger Oberösterreicher, dem seine Lebensgefährtin vor einer Woche im Mühlviertel im Zuge eines Streits ins Gesicht geschossen hatte, ist in der Nacht auf Mittwoch im Linzer Allgemeinen Krankenhaus (AKh) gestorben. Er erlag seinen schweren Gehirn- und Schädelverletzungen, wie das Spital in der Früh mitteilte.
Das Paar aus dem Bezirk Urfahr-Umgebung hatte heftig gestritten. Im Lauf der Auseinandersetzung griff die 22-jährige Frau zu einem Jagdgewehr, das mit Schrotmunition gefüllt war. Ein Schuss löste sich und traf den Mann im Gesicht. Die Frau rannte zu ihrem Auto, in dem ihr Handy lag, und rief die Rettung. Dann fuhr sie nach Linz und stellte sich der Polizei. (APA)

description.hltext_display: Berliner Klinik: Pfleger gibt zu, Kinder sexuell missbraucht zu haben
description.content:
Pfleger gibt zu, Kinder sexuell missbraucht zu haben
Ein 27-jähriger Krankenpfleger hat den Missbrauch von Kindern gestanden. Der Mann soll sich an Jungen auf der Intensivstation vergangen haben.
Ein Krankenpfleger soll in einem Berliner Krankenhaus Kinder sexuell missbraucht und davon Filmaufnahmen gemacht haben. Die Staatsanwaltschaft ermittelt gegen den 27-Jährigen wegen schweren sexuellen Missbrauchs in drei Fällen, wie ein Behördensprecher sagte. Er bestätigte damit Informationen der „Berliner Morgenpost“. Das Klinikum sprach von fünf Fällen. Alle Missbrauchsopfer waren demnach Jungen, es seien noch nicht alle Namen ermittelt.
Der Pfleger, der auf einer Kinderintensivstation im Helios-Klinikum im Stadtteil Buch arbeitete, auf der sei am Freitag verhaftet worden. Zuvor hatte ein betroffener Junge seinen Eltern von den Taten erzählt. Die "Bild"-Zeitung berichtet, dass er durch Medikamente ruhiggestellt gewesen war und wie schlafend wirkte, die Übergriffe aber bei vollem Bewusstsein miterlebte. Zwei Mal soll der Pfleger ihn missbraucht haben.
27-Jähriger kastriert sich selbst
In Untersuchungshaft hat der Mann versucht, sich das Leben zu nehmen. Er soll sich selbst kastriert haben, berichtet die "Bild"-Zeitung weiter. Der 27-Jährige ist nun in medizinischer Behandlung. In einem Verhör soll er die Vorwürfe eingeräumt haben.
Die Anklagebehörde wirft ihm vor, in dem Krankenhaus neben dem Neunjährigen auch einen weiteren Jungen missbraucht zu haben, der sich nicht wehren konnte. Auch diese Kinder sollen mit Medikamenten ruhig gestellt gewesen sein, weil sie so große Schmerzen hatten. Auf der Intensivstation kämpfen die Kinder unter anderem gegen Krebs. Nach der Festnahme fanden die Ermittler Handy-Aufnahmen der Taten. Die Staatsanwaltschaft hält weitere Fälle für möglich.
„Wir sind entsetzt und fassungslos“, teilte das Klinikum mit. „Wir bedauern zutiefst das Leid, aber auch die Ungewissheit, die jetzt viele Eltern und Patienten quält, selbst wenn sie nicht betroffen sind oder waren.“
Der 27-Jährige hat sich nach Angaben einer Sprecherin bislang nichts zuschulden kommen lassen. Er arbeitete seit Oktober 2009 auf der Station. Einem Bericht der „Berliner Morgenpost" zufolge hat er eine Ausbildung an der Schule für Gesundheitsberufe gemacht und alle Stationen der Klinik durchlaufen. Bei den Ermittlungen soll nun nachgeforscht werden, ob es weitere Verdachtsfälle in der Vergangenheit gegeben hat, die mit dem Mann in Verbindung stehen könnten.
Der Mann war auf der Station für das Füttern von Kleinkindern sowie das Verabreichen von Medikamenten verantwortlich gewesen. Der Regionalgeschäftsführer der Klinik, Armin Engel, sagte der „Berliner Morgenpost", dass es bisher „keinerlei Verdachtsmomente“ gegen den 27-Jährigen gegeben hat. Nichts deutete auf einen Missbrauch hin.
Auch die Vergangenheit des 27-Jährigen scheint makellos: Der Mann habe drei Brüder, darunter einen Zwilling. Auch in einem Internetportal wirkte er völlig normal, wie die „Berliner Morgenpost" schreibt. Als Lieblinsfilm gab er „Schindlers Liste“ an und in seiner Freizeit gehe er gerne ins Fitnessstudio. Zu seinem Beruf schrieb er „Kinderkrankenpfleger“ und schilderte den Beruf so: „Was man halt so machen kann als Kinderkrankenpfleger.“ Einer seiner Brüder sagte der "B.Z.": "Wir können nicht glauben, dass er das getan hat. Niemand traut ihm so etwas zu. Er hat sich immer sozial engagiert, jedes Krankenhaus wollte ihn haben."
Kollegen und Ärzte bekamen angeblich nichts mit
„Der Missbrauch von Kindern, die uns anvertraut sind, die unseren besonderen Schutz brauchen, macht uns sehr betroffen und mich persönlich auch wütend“, zitiert das Blatt den Ärztlichen Direktor des Klinikums in Buch, Josef Zacher. Wie ausgerechnet auf der Intensivstation des Hauses zu solchen Verbrechen kommen konnte, einem Bereich mit offenen Türen und viel Personal, sei momentan noch nicht vorstellbar.
Auf dieser Intensivstation seien Patienten im Alter zwischen einem und 16 Jahren untergebracht. Die elf Betten stehen in vier Doppel- und einem Dreibettzimmern. Rund um die Uhr seien in Schichten zehn Mitarbeiter, darunter Pfleger und Ärzte, im Dienst, hieß es. Die Zimmer liegen zudem noch Wand an Wand und natürlich seien auf der Station auch noch die Schwesternräume untergebracht.
In seinem Abschiedbrief an die Familie soll der Mann laut "B.Z." geschrieben haben, dass es für ihn keine gerechte Strafe gebe. Er schäme sich und habe Angst vor zu Hause, nachdem sein Geheimnis gelüftet sei, schreibt die Zeitung. Er hoffe zudem, dass seine Familie ihn jetzt nicht als Monster sehe.
Alle Eltern, deren Söhne in den vergangenen 14 Monaten Patienten der Kinderintensivstation waren, seien am Mittwoch in einem Brief über die Ermittlungen informiert worden. Eltern können sich telefonisch unter 030/94 015 44 44 an das Klinikum wenden (8 bis 20 Uhr). Das Klinikum bietet auch psychologische Betreuung an.

description.hltext_display: Ünlü İspir Fasulyesinin Üretimi Artacak
description.content:
Türkiye'nin ünlü yöresel lezzetlerinden olan İspir fasulyesinin üretimi daha da yaygınlaştırılacak.
İspir Kaymakamlığı (SYDV) ile İlçe Tarım Müdürlüğü'nün ortaklaşa hazırladığı proje ile çiftçilere fasulye mibzeri ve patozu dağıtıldı. Dağıtılan makinelerle ekim ve hasat zorluğu nedeniyle dar alanlarda yapılan fasulye üretimi, artık daha geniş alanlarda yapılabilecek. Değeri 74 bin 250 TL'lik makinelerle bir günde yapılan iş bir saate kadar düşecek.
Proje sayesinde Ahmet Odabaş, Abdullah Arslan, Köksal Atmaca, Recep Çelik, Ramazan Özer, Mehmet Yıldırım ve Hayriye Yılmaz adlı çiftçiler 2 yıl ödemesiz, 6 yıl geri ödemeli makinelerine kavuştu. Toplam 5 adet mibzer ve 6 adet patoz hak sahiplerine teslim edildi.
İspir İlçe Tarım Müdürlüğü'nde düzenlenen törene İlçe Kaymakamı , Belediye Başkanı Osman Çakır, İlçe Tarım Müdürü A. Ufuk Akın, daire amirleri ve vatandaşlar katıldı.
(Cihan Haber Ajansı) 10 dakika önce.. [2430064]

description.hltext_display: Angka Defisit Berubah, Penetapan APBD Bangli Diskors
description.content:
Bangli (Bali Post) -
Sidang paripurna DPRD Bangli dengan agenda penetapan RAPBD Bangli 2011 diskors sekitar 10 menit, Selasa (21/12) kemarin. Menyusul, interupsi yang dilakukan sejumlah anggota DPRD Bangli lantaran muncul pencantuman angka defisit mencapai Rp 46 miliar.
Angka itu dinilai Dewan terjadi di luar kesepakatan awal dalam pembahasan hanya sekitar Rp 28 miliar. Sidang akhirnya kembali dilanjutkan dan telah langsung ditetapkan oleh Bupati bersama DPRD Bangli.
Bupati Bangli Made Gianyar mengatakan, pencantuman angka defisit sebesar Rp 46 miliar lebih dalam APBD Bangli sudah benar. Saat pembahasan awal memang terjadi pencantuman angka defisit sebesar Rp 17,5 miliar. Namun dalam perjalanannya terjadi lagi pengembangan angka atas dasar kesepakatan. Salah satunya adalah anggaran penjaringan aspirasi Dewan sekitar Rp 10 miliar dan anggaran lainnya. Sehingga total angka defisit murni ketika itu adalah sekitar Rp 29 miliar.
Namun kembali terjadi penambahan angka defisit setelah DAK (Dana Alokasi Khusus) Kesehatan dan Pendidikan telah dikirim pusat dan masuk kas daerah. Di mana anggaran itu berdasarkan petunjuk pusat mesti berjalan pada tahun 2011. Munculnya silva luncuran pusat itu menyebabkan angka defisit RAPBD Bangli bertambah dari Rp 29 miliar menjadi Rp 46 miliar.
Setelah mendapat penjelasan itu seluruh anggota Dewan akhirnya menerima RAPBD Bangli itu ditetapkan menjadi perda dan selanjutnya dikoreksi Gubernur Bali. Sedangkan dalam laporan gabungan komisi DPRD Bangli terhadap RAPBD Bangli 2011 dibacakan I Wayan Sudirman, politisi Bangli memberikan sejumlah catatan kepada Bupati. Di antaranya menyangkut rencana pengoperasian RSUD Bangli yang baru secara bertahap agar melengkapi SDM, sarana dan prasarana yang memadai sesuai dengan ketersediaan dana yang dianggarkan.
Untuk tertibnya galian C, Pemkab Bangli agar melakukan pembinaan serta pengawasan lebih ketat. Mengenai upah PTTD yang diangkat tahun 2010 belum dianggarkan pada APBD 2011 agar dicarikan solusi, serta bisa membuka lapangan pekerjaan baru. (kmb17)

description.hltext_display: Armwood basketball team eyes better season
description.content:
Dec. 22--SEFFNER -- A funny thing happened to the Armwood High girls basketball team since last year's disappointing ending.
The Hawks got bounced in the first round of last season's district tournament. Not fun.
But something happened in the course of Armwood's district game against Plant City on Dec. 7 that provided a sliver of hope they can get farther this season.
It wasn't just that Armwood won the game, 53-35.
It was how they won it.
And it was fun.
Down 21-15 at the half, the Hawks went on a 10-2 run at the beginning of the third quarter to take the lead for good.
"It was what we talk about bringing every day, not only to practice but to the game," Armwood coach Patrick Kelly said. "The first half was not fun. The first half was a lack of effort, lack of discipline. And then at halftime, we had a little discussion and they decided to come out and play hard and give everything they had.
"It was the first district win for us this season, so it was a big win."
Sophomore starting point guard Jada Spano sparked the run that would lead to the Hawks victory. She's been a spark for Armwood all season.
One of Hillsborough County's leading scorers, averaging more than 15 points per game, Spano is one of the top talents in a district featuring a lot of top talent.
"She has good court vision and she's very unselfish," Kelly said. "Sometimes we want her to be a little more selfish, but you can't tell someone not to make that pass when someone is open."
Spano's been playing basketball since she was 4 years old. She used to tag along with her two older brothers to play at the YMCA.
Sports has been a big focus all her young life. Spano also plays volleyball for Armwood and plans on playing softball next year. She also partakes in soccer, golf and tennis.
But it's basketball that holds a special place in Spano's heart.
"It's always been around my family, so I've always loved it," she said. "I'm in the gym pretty much all the time."
Last season for the Hawks, Spano led the team in scoring (10 points per game) and assists (2.8 apg). The team struggled with its youthful roster and finished 4-19.
Considering that the victory on Dec. 7 was the Hawks third of the season, nearly equaling last year's win total, Spano's confident Armwood's on the right track.
"I think even though we're a young team, we've definitely improved a lot since last year," Spano said. " ... I love this team. I think we can do pretty good this season. I think we've got the talent.
"We definitely want to do good in districts and go farther than we did last year when we lost in the first round. We're going to try our best."

description.hltext_display: Bada 2.0：新UI新SDK
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
三星在其大本营韩国举行的开发者会议上提到，今年年末时，总计将售出 500 万台搭载 Bada 的 Wave 系列手持设备，并乐观的估计明年上半年将售出 1000 万台。当然，此次大会的重点还是在于推介 Bada 2.0。从三星给出的宣传图上我们可以看到 Bada 2.0 所包含的更新着实不少，主要特性将包括：第三方多任务机制、支持通知推送、用户界面和用户体验的更新提高等。其他还有安全加强、整合广告网络、支持运营商资费（统计）、HTML5、NFC 以及语音识别。
Matrining 曾指出，Bada 单一的开发环境以及较高的开发难度阻碍了其程序商店的扩张。而此番 Bada 2.0 就带来了全新的 SDK，将支持 Linux/Mac 系统，模拟器的速度将会更快。(原文链接：ifanr.com/28441)

description.hltext_display: Forscher züchten zwitschernde Mäuse
description.content: Sie piepsen nicht, sie zwitschern: Durch einen Zufall haben japanische Wissenschaftler Mäuse gezüchtet, die Geräusche machen wie Vögel. Die Forscher hoffen auf neue Erkenntnisse zu den Ursprüngen menschlicher Sprache.

description.hltext_display: 华为HiQQ手机试用：采用Android系统售1280元
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
腾讯QQ已经成为现在很多人手机行必备的聊天软件，手机能不能上QQ也成为当下很多人购买手机最先要考虑的因素。12月21日，华为终端与腾讯达成战略合作，发布了业界首款深度融合QQ服务的智能手机HiQQ手机。
华为HiQQ手机
HiQQ手机中整合了手机QQ、手机QQ空间、手机QQ浏览器、QQ农场、欢乐斗地主、QQ安全助手和腾讯微博等十九种腾讯经典手机应用，让用户既能享受即时沟通和移动社交的乐趣，又能随时随地体验丰富多彩的在线娱乐。而这款手机时尚的外观、流畅的操作体验，也将让华为HiQQ手机迅速成为“QQ控”们手中最给力的手机。
此次发布的HiQQ手机均为华为千元智能机普及战略中的热销产品，率先推出的U8500和即将推出的C8500，被称为“双子星”，分别支持中国联通WCDMA制式3G网络以及中国电信CDMA EVDO网络，为用户带来高速上网体验。HiQQ版的华为U8500延续了之前的独特设计和高性价比，创新性地融入了19款精彩的腾讯手机应用，使用户的互动互联网生活更加丰富、便捷。
HiQQ版U8500采用直板触控设计，手机正面的主要区域是一块3.2英寸电容式触屏，分辨率为320×480像素的HVGA分辨率。手机屏幕下方设计了四枚实体按键，从左至右依次是接听键、菜单键、返回键、挂断键。而在按键中央为一个支持触控操作的方向导航及确认键，手机真面非常简洁，操作起来非常方便。
华为HiQQ手机正面按键区
在机身背面我们首先可以看到HiQQ的LOGO，这也意味着是一款深度定制的QQ手机。磨砂材质的机身手感非常不错。机身背面一枚320万像素摄像头，可以满足我们一般的拍摄需求。
机身背面LOGO及摄像头
HiQQ手机采用了MicroUSB数据接口，以及3.5毫米耳机接口。两个接口分别位于手机的底部。手机的左侧没有任何按键，在手机的右侧是音量调节键。
手机底部接口
手机侧面音量调节按键
作为深度定制的QQ手机，那么在系统方面有什么样的特点呢？接下来就为您做一个详细的介绍。

description.hltext_display: Dramatic weather problems for box offices
description.content:
by David Owens, South Wales Echo
SNOW has caused box office chaos for theatre venues in Cardiff, with thousands of tickets having to be reallocated due to the treacherous weather conditions.
The New Theatre, St David’s Hall and the Wales Millennium Centre have faced a flood of calls from worried ticket holders unable to make performances of Cinderella, The Nutcracker and Mamma Mia!.
On the first day of snowfall, the New Theatre lost 900 seats for a performance of its pantomime Cinderella, while besieged box office staff estimate they have so far found new tickets for 4,000 theatregoers.
“We have been reseating around 400-500 people per performance,” said theatre manager Susan Lewis.
“For last Friday’s matinee we had four school parties who had between them virtually booked out the entire house.
“As all these schools closed that day we were left with around only 100 people for that show.
“However, we have found all those schools alternative tickets in January and everyone who came that afternoon made enough noise to make up for the missing parties.”
It has been a similar story at St David’s Hall, where more than 700 ballet fans have had their tickets reallocated for performances of The Nutcracker.
“It has been a massive undertaking and a challenge for our box office staff, who have been simply superb in dealing with an unprecedented amount of inquiries,” explained general manager Roger Hopwood.
“This is on top of the many people eager to get tickets for the remaining performances of the Nutcracker.”
The Wales Millennium Centre has also faced its own challenges.
While not able to put a figure on how many tickets have been reallocated for its hit musical Mamma Mia!, a spokeswoman said: “We have done our best to assist customers with exchanges where this is possible. We also offer a re-sale service.
“In the great tradition of the theatre: the show does go on despite the bad weather.”

description.hltext_display: Zwei Salzburger Schüler bewarfen Auto der Lehrerin mit Eisbrocken
description.content:
Salzburg – Zwei Schüler haben am Montag in Thalgau (Flachgau) das Auto einer Lehrerin mit größeren Eisbrocken beworfen, als diese gerade vom Schulgelände wegfahren wollte. Der Wagen wurde dadurch beschädigt. Am Dienstag wurde der Vorfall angezeigt.
Ein genaues Motiv konnte der zuständige Beamten der Polizeiinspektion Thalgau heute, Mittwoch, gegenüber der APA noch nicht nennen, weil noch nicht alle Beteiligten einvernommen worden seien.
Der Polizist geht aber davon aus, dass der Anschlag gezielt dieser Lehrerin gegolten hat. „Sie haben gesehen, wer im Auto gesessen ist, und auf andere Fahrzeuge haben sie ja nichts geworfen."
Nach Angaben des Beamten sind die beiden Burschen der Polizei schon hinlänglich bekannt, wobei die Art der vorgefallenen Taten „quer durch den Gemüsegarten" gehe. Das Duo wird bei der Staatsanwaltschaft angezeigt. Am Wagen der Pädagogin entstanden Lackschäden, laut Pressebericht der Polizei beträgt der Schaden rund 1000 Euro. (APA)

description.hltext_display: Save the Date for Strategies for Success in Construction Lending...
description.content:
The Strategies for Success in Construction Lending (SSCL) Seminar for the commercial industry will be held March 2-3, 2011 at The JW Marriott in Denver Cherry Creek, Colorado.
This streamlined one-day conference will host industry executives from across the nation to discuss core issues facing SBA construction lending and commercial construction lending industries. Sessions will include up-to-the-minute topics in commercial real estate, distressed assets and construction workouts, and forecasting the construction lending market.
The conference will kick-off with an opening Welcome Reception and Registration on March 2 and follow with a full day of lectures and roundtable discussions on March 3. A Closing Reception will conclude the conference on March 3.
Commercial construction managers, SBA executives, loan workout specialists, credit risk managers, special services, title providers, construction lending attorneys and other decision-makers will participate in educational segments and discussion panels.
Topics for the 2011 SSCL Commercial Seminar will include Future Trends in Commercial Real Estate, Construction REO and Workouts, Economic Update, SBA Compliance and Product Development, and Commercial Construction Lending Best Practices.
The SSCL is “the best source of information in one location,” said Brent Pitcher, Mountain America Federal Credit Union.
For a limited time, attendees will receive early bird pricing of $545 for lenders and $1,245 for vendors. Online registration is available at http://www.SSCLseminar.com along with hotel and transportation information. Exclusive hotel rates at The JW Marriott, Denver Cherry Creek are $199/night. The Early Bird Special and seminar hotel rates expire February 5, 2011. Registration fee includes full program, breakfast and lunch, and both networking receptions. Event sponsorships and exhibit booths are also available.
For more information on the 2011 SSCL Commercial Seminar, visit http://www.ssclseminar.com or call 866.710.4087.
The 2011 SSCL Commercial Seminar is hosted by Granite Commercial Management, the “Experts in Commercial Construction Lending” offering services including funds administration, status inspections, title datedowns, distressed asset services, and property condition assessment and risk analysis reports. For more information, visit http://www.granitecm.com or call 866.710.4099.
To sign up for the quarterly Construction Lending News, a free E-newsletter on the construction lending industry, visit http://www.constructionlendingnews.com.

description.hltext_display: Puting Beliung Terjang Pulukan Balai Bengong Subak Pulukan Rusak
description.content:
Warga sekitar pesisir Pulukan dan Pekutatan dikejutkan dengan munculnya puting beliung di sekitar pantai Selasa (21/12) kemarin. Sejumlah warga menyebutkan angin kencang terjadi sekitar pukul 10.00 pagi kemarin. Beruntung tidak ada korban jiwa dalam kejadian tersebut. Angin itu merusak bangunan balai bengong Subak Pulukan.
Klian Dinas Banjar Pulukan, Eldi Asri, yang dihubungi kemarin, membenarkan kejadian tersebut. Angin kencang terjadi saat cuaca mendung dan menerjang sebuah bangunan balai bengong. ''Tidak ada korban, tetapi sempat merusak bangunan,'' ujarnya. Sementara itu angin kencang yang terjadi di perairan Pulukan terlihat membentuk puting beliung pukul 12.30 wita. Sejumlah warga yang berada di dataran tinggi sempat melihat kejadian itu. Camat Pekutatan, IGN Putra Riyadi, Selasa kemarin, membenarkan kejadian itu. Namun, pusaran angin itu tidak sampai ke daratan dan hanya nampak di pantai. Sejak pagi hingga sore kemarin, cuaca di wilayah Jembrana diselimuti mendung. Sesekali terjadi hujan gerimis disertai angin kencang. (kmb26)
