description.hltext_display: Teistmoodi õppepäev Raeküla koolis
description.author: Anu Helemäe
description.content: Pärnu Raeküla koolis toimus järjekordne aastalõpu projektipäev, mille märksõnad olid ilu ja jõud. � Põhikooli noormehed osalesid Kaitseliidu korraldatud kolmes töötoas, kus tutvustati relvi, sõdurivarustust, sideõpet, traatside loomist, samuti võis panna proovile oma oskused leitnant Kivimäe juhendamisel virtuaalses lasketiirus relvaga M16. Tõsiseim katsumus ootas õpilasi relvade ja sõdurivarustuse töötoas, kus vanemseersant Kaasi ja veebel Ivannikovi abil saadi selgeks, et täisvarustus on niisama raske, nagu oleks teine inimene kukil, ning selle raskusega koos tuleb vajadusel joosta, roomata, läbida pikki vahemaid. Uuriti eri kaliibriga relvi püstolist tankitõrjerelvani. Huvitavad oli mitme kasutusvõimalusega esemed, näiteks talvekummik/suusasaabas või magamisalus/kanderaam. Öövaatlusseade võimaldas pimedas klassis kaaslasi jälgida. Lõpuks riietusid kaks noormeest suve- ja talvesõduriks. Poisid said teada, et nii nagu relvadega märulifilmides vehitakse, tegelikkuses täpselt tulistada pole võimalik. Püstoli ja kuulipilduja laskmistehnoloogia võib küll huvitav olla, aga olulisem oli noorte jaoks teadmine, et isegi laadimata relva ei sobi suunata inimese poole. Vanemseersant Mürel tutvustas raadiosidet ja välitelefoni kasutamist. Samuti said õpilased teada pealtkuulamisvõimalustest ja sellest, kuidas töötab kommutaator. Lasketiirus oli poistel võimalus proovile panna silmade teravus ja näppude kiirus. Neid, kes kordagi märgist mööda ei lasknud, oli vähe. Nagu selgus, on selles valdkonnas palju õppida. Põhikooli neidude töötoad olid seotud kujundusega. Pärnu kunstikooli õpetaja Kristel Kallau juhendamisel õpiti tegema omanäolist jõululaternat, kasutades klaaspurki ja salvrätikuid. Enne kui valmis origami tehnikas kinkekarp, tuli kõigepealt õpetaja Kristel Peetersoni käe all õppida tavalisest paberist karpi voltima. Paberi voltimine tundus algul mõistatuslik, millest karp kuidagi välja ei paistnud. Hiljem valmisid kaunist paberist karbid tütarlaste käte all osavalt, igaüks sai lisada oma maitse järgi kaunistusi. Pärnu väikese disainikooli õpetaja Margit Kool näitas slaidiprogrammi ja tutvustas võimalusi, kuidas vahvalt kujundada ühte noore inimese tuba. Kasutada võis spetsiaalseid tahvli- või magnetvärve, erinevaid nagisid, kaste, pudelikorke, vanu uksi nii lauaks kui voodipeatsiks. Eriti põnev oli pesumasinatrumlist valmistatud laevalgusti. Samuti julgustas ta kasutama värve ja pilte, eri mustreid ja kangaid, näiteks suhkru- või kartulikotist padjakatted põrandal istumiseks. Heade mõtetega asuti suupistelauas õpetajate ja juhendajatega ühiselt keha kinnitama ja mõtteid vahetama. �

description.hltext_display: 玛莎拉蒂携MC Sport Line亮相广州车展
description.content:
关键词：玛莎拉蒂GranTurismo 玛莎拉蒂 吉利帝豪
世界著名豪华汽车品牌玛莎拉蒂携旗下“三叉戟”全系车型鼎盛阵容闪耀登陆2010广州车展。在玛莎拉蒂展台上，经典传承的Quattroporte总裁系列、动感激情的GranTurismo跑车系列及魅力杰作GranCabrio敞篷跑车吸引人们的瞩目。玛莎拉蒂的两台个性化定制力作——配有MC Sport Line 套件的Quattroporte总裁系列运动版和GranTurismo S成为此次玛莎拉蒂展台上两颗最耀眼的明星，它们的亮相，标志着MC Sport Line套件正式面向中国客户，并进一步诠释了玛莎拉蒂专属定制的品牌理念和对极致运动风格的不懈追求。
MC Sport Line是玛莎拉蒂品牌为强调其运动基因而面向全车型系列推出的个性化定制项目。它是为那些希望以充满动感的车辆外观来展现自己对跑车的激情，并且希望享有最新技术来提升驾驶乐趣的客户而开发的。该项目的研发过程集中体现了玛莎拉蒂赛车部门从多年的赛事活动上获取的宝贵经验。
从现在起，中国客户不仅可以从外观上来定制爱车，还可以依据自己的品味来打造赋有运动气息的内饰风格及机械组件。作为个性化定制套组的一部分，或者单独的定制选项，MC Sport Line的可选套件包括碳纤材质的车身部分，以及新型空气动力套件和悬挂系统。
玛莎拉蒂的每一款车型，都能做到精益求精，并充分满足客户需求。玛莎拉蒂专为那些追求稳健而又不失驾乘乐趣的客户所打造的Quattroporte总裁系列，开创了“高性能豪华轿车”这一独特的领域;而传承了赛车基因的玛莎拉蒂GranTurismo跑车系列则领先开创了“豪华旅行跑车”(Luxury granturismo)的概念，为追求动感与极佳驾驶性能的客户提供了无数种可能性;而GranCabrio敞篷跑车的问世，更是为玛莎拉蒂的经典传奇注入了新的活力，为客户打造全方位的敞篷驾驶乐趣，提供舒适与性能的完美体验，并将玛莎拉蒂推崇的高尚生活理念提升到一个全新高度。
作为一个拥有近百年历史的豪华汽车品牌，玛莎拉蒂始终坚持为少数鉴赏家服务的理念，专注于那些崇尚高品质生活的客户。玛莎拉蒂通过举行各种全国性试驾体验活动，向中国客户传递着这样一个核心信息——玛莎拉蒂不仅是汽车，更是一种生活方式。玛莎拉蒂在此次2010广州车展上进行全系车型的魅力展示，坚持了品牌持续将非凡卓越的产品带入中国的承诺，让所有客户深刻感受玛莎拉蒂产品带来的私属典雅和尊享魅力。
MC Sport Line个性化定制选项
“MC Sport Line”个性化定制选项的推出，更加丰富了玛莎拉蒂的个性化定制服务。MC Sport Line个性化定制选项旨在凸显玛莎拉蒂车型的运动精髓，客户不仅可以通过选择该定制选项为爱车赋予动感十足的外观，而且还可选用适当的技术解决方案来充分提升驾驶乐趣，从而展现自己对赛车运动的无限热情。
对外发布“MC Sport Line”选项的首批定制方案之时，玛莎拉蒂选择先应用在代表其公路车性能巅峰的GranTurismo S跑车上;如今，该个性化定制选项系列的应用范围已扩大到GranTurismo系列乃至整个玛莎拉蒂车系。玛莎拉蒂客户不仅能为其爱车打造更具运动气息的内饰外观，而且还可选用其他机械解决方案。
MC Sport Line- Quattroporte总裁系列 运动特质
为了强调玛莎拉蒂的赛车基因，玛莎拉蒂推出“MC Sport Line”系列选项，为那些玛莎拉蒂赛车的忠实拥趸带来惊喜。
MC Sport Line所有配件的设计规划均融汇了玛莎拉蒂技术人员在全球各个赛道上积累的专业技术;为打造卓越的美学效果，玛莎拉蒂设计中心甚至将赛道元素融入到配件外观之中。
多种个性化定制选项目前面向Quattroporte总裁系列行政版和运动版推出;两款车型的内饰均可加装碳纤维套件，这种材料与赛车界有着深厚的渊源，长久以来备受推崇。
另有两款内饰组合亦可用于内饰的个性化定制，并且所有配件均采用碳纤维材质。第一款组合包括了带有MC Sport Line标识的车门防擦条和中控台配件;第二款则由换挡拨片和仪表盘边框组成。碳纤维方向盘、黑色皮革面饰以及MC字样的铝质踏板(含固定踏板)令内饰外观更显完美出众，Quattroporte总裁系列运动版的车主还能选择20寸多辐三叉戟亮黑色轮毂让外饰更添一分尊贵奢华之感。
MC Sport Line - GranTurismo系列 纯正赛车血统
MC Sport Line的设计宗旨是凸显玛莎拉蒂车型的运动特质，通过打造动感活力的跑车外观激发用户的无限激情，并以最先进的技术解决方案提升用户的驾驶乐趣。在MC Sport Line系列的研发过程中，玛莎拉蒂赛车部门的技术人员在赛道上积累的丰富经验发挥了举足轻重的作用。
玛莎拉蒂设计中心的设计师同样从赛车领域汲取了灵感：MC Sport Line的所有配件均采用备受赛车爱好者追捧的碳纤维材质。MC Sport Line套件推出了丰富选项，用户可借此为玛莎拉蒂GranTurismo系列车型的内饰外观赋予与众不同的运动特色，4.7升车型的某些机械系统还可接受改装，以满足驾驶者最极致的要求。

description.hltext_display: В начале торгов на рынке акций сильные движения маловероятны - ИФ "Олма"
description.content:
Во вторник на рынке наблюдалось повышение, отмечает ведущий аналитик ИФ "Олма" Антон Старцев. Акции АФК Система подорожали на 4,1%, Новатэка - на 2,2%, РусГидро, ВТБ и Мечела - на 1,3%, МТС - на 1,2%, Сбербанка и Северстали - на 1,1%. Смягчение "корейского фактора", по мнению эксперта, позволило инвесторам принять более оптимистичный взгляд на рынок. "Интересно, что рынку нужны были веские поводы для коррекции (таким поводом днем ранее стали военные учения в Южной Корее), а повышение происходило без заметных благоприятных новостей - такой характер торгов характерен для восходящего тренда", - комментирует А. Старцев. Между тем, новостной фон был скорее умеренно-негативным. Так, международное рейтинговое агентство Moody''s поставило рейтинг Португалии на пересмотр с возможностью снижения. Агентство Fitch, тем временем, ухудшило прогноз по росту российской экономики.
Во втором эшелоне наблюдался рост по отдельным бумагам, констатирует аналитик. Так, обыкновенные акции Московского НПЗ на ММВБ подорожали на 16,1%, привилегированные акции Тамбовэнергосбыта - на 13,2%, обыкновенные - на 11,5%, обыкновенные акции Кубаньэнергосбыта - на 5,2%.
Фондовые индексы США повысились на 0,5% - 0,7%, фьючерсы на индексы США торгуются в небольшом минусе. Европейские индексы повысились, по азиатским наблюдается разнонаправленное движение.
По оценке эксперта, сегодня в начале торгов сильные движения маловероятны. "Высокие цены на нефть (фьючерсы на Brent торгуются выше $93 за баррель) оказывают поддержку спросу на российские бумаги, но сдерживающим фактором вновь могут стать опасения в отношении обстановки на Корейском полуострове - Южная Корея объявила о новом раунде военных учений в приграничном районе с применением авиации и флота, - полагает аналитик ИФ "Олма". - Во второй половине дня на характер торгов может повлиять поток статистики из США, включающий окончательную оценку ВВП за третий квартал текущего года (16:30 мск, ожидается повышение оценки темпов роста с 2,5% в годовом выражении до 2,8%), данные по продажам домов на вторичном рынке (18:00 мск) и запасам нефти (18:30 мск). По данным технического анализа, в среднесрочной перспективе вероятно продолжение роста, ближайшая цель находится на уровне 1800 пунктов по индексу РТС, более вероятная среднесрочная цель - вблизи 1870 пунктов".

description.hltext_display: ・TAXI龙卡纪念卡不能退 普通卡可退10元
description.content:
手中还有上海TAXI龙卡的市民请尽快办理移资手续，明年6月30日起将停止使用和办理卡移资业务。
记者昨天从市交港局获悉，近日，前来办理相关手续的市民骤增，需要说明的是，TAXI龙卡（空卡）的处理方式是，卡内资金可移资到交通卡内，不收手续费，普通卡可退卡10元，纪念卡则不能退卡。
虽然市交港局有规定，“持有上海TAXI龙卡的市民，可选择在2011年6月30日前消费完卡内余额”，但事实上，真正使用的市民并不多。一些规模较小的出租车公司驾驶员表示，已不接受乘客龙卡付费，因为月底结算起来比较麻烦。
目前仍有部分龙卡近百万元的卡内资金仍遗留在市民手中，“建议市民将TAXI龙卡资金置换至交通卡内。”交通部门希望手中持有“上海TAXI龙卡”的市民尽快到以下地点置换（移资）上海公共交通卡：秣陵路100号（节假日除外）；昭化路12号大众金融大厦底楼（节假日除外）；泰兴路218号（全年无休）。

description.hltext_display: Sheridan: This trial is about persecution, not prosecution
description.author: Alison Campsie
description.content:
Tommy Sheridan told the jury at his perjury trial that he is “fighting for his life” and that he and his family had been victims of a “persecution, not prosecution”.
Sheridan, 46, said that the Crown was seeking to ?rely on liars? to prove its case and that the charge sheet against him had been written in ?disappearing ink?, with a number of charges dropped.
The former Scottish Socialist Party MSP is accused of lying under oath during his 2006 action against the News of the World, when he won �200,000 in damages from the tabloid after it printed a series of allegations about his private life. He denies the charge against him.
The former politician spoke from the dock rather than at the lectern normally used by lawyers. His wife Gail, who was cleared of perjury last week, and his two sisters looked on.
In his three-hour closing speech, which is due to continue this morning, Sheridan sought to discredit the integrity of a number of key Crown witnesses, calling his alleged former lovers Anvar Khan and Katrine Trolle liars, as well as Scottish Socialist Party executive minute taker Barbara Scott.
George McNeilage, his former friend who sold the News of the World a covert tape of Sheridan allegedly confessing to visiting a sex club, was described as a convicted house breaker who would do anything for money.
Sheridan put it to the court: ?The essential problem the Crown has in this case is that they are seeking to rely on liars, rely on witnesses who lack both credibility and reliability.? He alleged there had been a vendetta by police against his friends and family, telling the court that he wondered if Lord Bracadale, the trial judge, would call for an investigation into the methods used by Lothian and Borders Police in the case.
Sheridan referred to a police investigation that used between 14 and 21 officers, with a search conducted of his home on December 16, 2007, ?nine days before spending our third Christmas with our wee angel Gabrielle?. His daughter?s nappy drawer and anorak pockets were allegedly searched, the court heard.
He claimed police should be ashamed of ignoring what he described as ?big inconsistencies? in those who gave evidence on behalf of the News of the World during his civil action against the tabloid in 2006. The accused posed the question as to whether Bob Bird, the News of the World editor in Scotland; former news editor Douglas Wight; Scottish Socialist Party members Alan Green and Colin Fox; Ms Khan or Ms Trolle had been investigated for perjury. The answer was no, Sheridan said.
Sheridan drew on comments made by Advocate Depute Alex Prentice in his closing speech, when he said that perjury was a crime that must be prosecuted. ?This is not a rare case, this is an exceptional case. If the seriousness of perjury is reflected in the justice system in Scotland, you may ask yourself why is there not perjury cases every day of every week in every court room in Scotland?? He spoke of his wife Gail, who was acquitted after 11 weeks of the trial last week after ?not a jot? of evidence was led in her defence. He said: ?The only reason Gail Sheridan was in the dock with me had nothing to do with being guilty of perjury, she was guilty of believing in her husband. ?My wife?s perjury charge has been dropped after hanging over her head for three years and being forced to sit in the dock for nearly three months, that is why I don?t think its unreasonable to have suggested to Detective Sergeant Harkness, of Lothian and Borders Police, that what was carried out against my family wasn?t a prosecution but a persecution.? Sheridan added: ?This was just a fair-handed prosecution from the start. And as we all know, the moon is made of cheese.? He also described the Moat House chapter of evidence, which related to an alleged orgy, as ?collapsing like a house of cards in the wind?. ?It had been hanging over my head, and my wife?s head for three years, a serious allegation in relation to the Moat House. We hear from one witness, and it all goes up in smoke,? he said. Sheridan also claimed: ?I want to suggest that the Crown case against me lasting for four long years and costing at least �2 million is not only weak it is verging on the pathetic.? Sheridan challenged Mr Prentice?s view that the case was not connected to the News of the World. ?The News of the World is at the very heart of the case,? he claimed, adding that it was the tabloid?s video of his alleged confession that the Crown had come to rely on. He further claimed photographs and names of witnesses were passed from the tabloid to the police
The jury was urged by Sheridan to apply ?critical thought? to the Crown?s circumstantial evidence surrounding the alleged trip to Cupid?s, namely a plane ticket purchased by Ms Khan and purchases made by Ms Trolle in Primark and Debenhams. ?This is evidence that you are being asked to put me in jail [with] after a multi-million pound trial,? Sheridan told the jury.
The trial continues.
Key extracts from Sheridan?s closing remarks - Former Scottish Socialist politician Tommy Sheridan claimed that the Crown had ?let down the jury? by not providing them with expert analysis of the George McNeilage tape, which allegedly captures the former MSP admitting to a sex club visit. The accused said: ?I am not visually on that video, that is a fact. You are being invited to make an absolutely enormous decision that will affect my life and if you think it?s me, you are going to send me to jail. I think the Crown has let you down. ?If the Crown is going to ask you to make a decision of that enormity, where is the voice expert testimony or report? Nine witnesses have said it?s not me, four Crown witnesses have said it?s me. Are you going to weigh up the numbers? That is not good enough in a criminal trial.? - The demeanour of witnesses was touched upon as the first day of Sheridan?s closing remarks came to an end. He said: ?George McNeilage showed nothing but contempt for this court. Mr McNeilage, I would submit to you, for �200,000 would say anything, for 10 times the annual salary of an average worker and a former convicted house breaker, would say anything for �200,000. I submit to you that anyone willing to creep into someone?s home ... and steal their possessions and commit not once but twice that crime against working class families, would do anything for �200,000. ?The demeanour of Mr McNeilage and the fact that his evidence was bought and paid for by the News of the World, I don?t think you can find his testimony to be credible or reliable.? - Sheridan urged the jury to recall the testimony of his former football team manager William Boyle, who the accused said had known him since he was a boy. Mr Boyle said it was not the accused on the tape. ?He said that voice is not Tommy, he said that with honest conviction. Are we just to discard the evidence of this man, the man with too many grandchildren to mention? What is his testimony worth. He showed old school respect (to the judge), a real honest testimony from a former pipe fitter. He owes me nothing. ?Contrast the demeanour of Mr Boyle and (Crown witness) Mr Moore. Remember Mr Moore giving a foul mouthed tirade ... from the witness box. I?m surprised that the Advocate Depute brought demeanour to your attention, If that is the demeanour of Crown witnesses, they are not the type of witnesses I want on my side.?

description.hltext_display: China replaces top Foreign Ministry official
description.content:
China has replaced its top Foreign Ministry official amid a trend toward greater assertiveness in handling territorial disputes and participating in global organizations.
Vice Foreign Minister Zhang Zhijun took over recently as the ministry's Communist Party secretary, state media reports said Wednesday, meaning he outranks Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi. Yang was accused of being caught off guard when U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton announced at a security conference in Vietnam this year that Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
Zhang, 57, had served almost his entire career in the party's International Liaison Department, a type of shadow Foreign Ministry focussing on contacts with foreign political parties, until he became deputy to Yang last year.
That party background may mean he has more of a say in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world. The country's rising economic clout amid the global economic downturn that has battered traditional powers such as the United States has emboldened Chinese leaders to demand a bigger say in global affairs such as climate change and at international organizations, including the United Nations.
China's aggressive assertion of its territorial claims in the South China and East China seas have, meanwhile, sparked a backlash from other countries in the region, drawing them closer to Washington.
The powerful People's Liberation Army is believed to be leading the calls for a tougher line in such disputes, while other cabinet officials have emphasized quietly advancing China's interests in economic, media and cultural spheres.
China's most senior diplomat, State Counselor Dai Bingguo, is seen as balancing the different arguments, although the country's opaque political system ensures that such debates almost never make it into the public arena.
Little is known about Zhang's personal style, although his party background and relative lack of experience working abroad suggest he will closely reflect the tone set by the party leadership.
Zhang's appointment was announced on official websites, including that of the party's People's Daily newspaper, but no exact date was given.
He takes over from Wang Guangya, a courtly career diplomat who was ambassador to the U.N. from 2003-2008, during which China took advantage of the U.S. preoccupation with Iraq to quietly expand its diplomatic space.

event_or_fact.property: Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world

description.hltext_display: Mayat Membusuk di Pantai Lepra
description.content:
Amlapura (Bali Post) -
Gelombang ganas belakangan ini rupanya menelan korban. Sesosok mayat membusuk, Selasa (21/12) kemarin, sekitar pukul 08.00 wita, ditemukan mengapung di Pantai Lepra, Bugbug, Karangasem. Belum diketahui identitas mayat itu. Setelah dievakuasi selama empat jam dengan susah payah tim Search and Rescue (SAR) Karangasem dibantu warga Bugbug, mayat itu akhirnya dititipkan di kamar jenazah RSUD Karangasem.
Pahumas Polres Karangasem AKP IW Wirata seizin Kapolres, di Karangasem, mengatakan pagi kemarin, laporan penemuan mayat itu disampaikan nelayan Pantai Bugbug ke Mapolsektif Karangasem. Laporan ditindaklanjuti dengan evakuasi melibatkan petugas tim SAR, polisi dari Polsektif Karangasem dipimpin langsung Kapolsek AKP Ketut Winama, Kasat Samapta Polres AKP Nengah Berata, dan Kabag Ops. Polres Kompol Made Sudarta.
Korban seorang pemuda diperkirakan berumur 16-20 tahun. Mayat masih mengenakan celana blue jeans tiga perempat, tanpa baju. Kondisi mayat sudah mengalami pembengkakan dan pembusukan. Rambut sudah terlepas, mukanya sulit dikenali. Berdasarkan pemeriksaan luar tim identifikasi kepolisian, tak ditemukan tanda bekas kekerasan pada mayat itu.
Mayat pertama kali ditemukan nelayan terombang-ambing di tengah laut Bugbug, akibat ombak yang ganas setinggi sekitar tiga meter. Sekitar dua jam, mayat sudah hanyut ke pantai timur Lepra, menuju batu karang dengan tebing dan goa. Petugas sempat kebingungan, karena tak ada pemilik perahu bermesin di Pantai Lepra. Tim SAR sempat hendak mengevakuasi mayat itu lewat darat, namun gagal karena mesti melewati tebing yang curam dan berbatu karang tajam. Petugas menggunakan perahu karet yang rawan bocor jika terhembas di batu karang. Petugas dibantu seorang warga Bugbug, Nengah Darma, yang sudah paham medan pantai yang bertebing dan batu karang. Petugas SAR sempat dua kali mendekati mayat, namun gagal. Tim lantas mengajak seorang warga lokal, Nengah Darma, untuk mencari mayat itu dan ditemukan dalam posisi tertelungkup. Mayat pemuda itu akhirnya berhasil dievakuasi ke Pantai Lepra, setelah tim berjuang sekitar empat jam.
Seorang warga Desa Bugbug, Nengah Susanta (38), memastikan korban bukanlah warga Bugbug. Selama ini tak ada warga Bugbug yang dilaporkan hilang. Ombak dan arus laut belakangan ini mengganas.
Sementara mayat balita yang sebelumnya ditemukan membusuk dan terapung di pantai Pasir Putih, Bugbug, sampai Selasa (21/12) kemarin, masih dititipkan di kamar jenazah RSUD Karangasem. Mayat itu sejak ditemuakn satu bulan lalu, belum ada yang mengambil atau mengakui kehilangan balita. Mayat itu telantar. Atas hal itu, Kapolsektif Winama mengatakan karena sudah lebih dari satu bulan tak ada yang mengambil, pihak Polsek lantas menyerahkan mayat balita itu kepada Bupati Karangasem, untuk kebijakan lebih lanjut. Apakah mayat balita itu bakal dikremasi atau dikubur. ''Kami sudah mengirimkan surat kepada Bupati Karangasem, perihal mayat balita itu,'' ujar Winama. (013)

description.hltext_display: ・山寨UGG穿出脚痛脚汗 正版UGG不宜长途行走
description.content:
冬日里，不少女性脚蹬各式的雪地靴。虽然穿着雪地靴挺暖和，但一些“山寨雪地靴”让脚闷得不透气，还出现脚痛、乏力等现象。
即便是正版雪地靴，宽松的鞋肚也会导致脚在鞋中的滑动，不适合长时间穿着，更不适合长途旅行。
【现象】
穿山寨“UGG”导致脚痛脚汗
白领宋小姐11月初买了一双200多元的山寨雪地靴，无论在家还是在户外都穿着它，但一周后“感觉浑身乏力，有点腰酸背疼，脚底也经常麻麻的。”宋小姐发现网上说如果山寨雪地靴的穿着时间达到6个月以上，就会给脚部造成永久性畸形。”
而在黄浦区上班的凌小姐接连穿了几天山寨雪地靴后，双脚变得容易出汗，她担心引发脚癣等皮肤病。
正版UGG也不适合长期走路
在一些商场专柜，对于雪地靴“致残”一说，营业员表示“不可能”，并称他们的鞋都是经过严格的测试，不会变形，且紧贴脚部曲线设计。大多数山寨雪地靴都做不到这一点。而正品UGG通过特殊设计的加强型鞋跟和鞋内垫给足部以支撑，对足部保护相对好一些。
但UGG澳大利亚公司相关人员也已承认，UGG靴虽然非常舒适，但并不能和运动鞋比，不适用于长期走路，消费者还应根据自身需要，选择合适的鞋子。
【调查】
脚会在靴子里前后滑动
记者走访了一些鞋类批发市场。在七浦路市场里，记者看到“雪地靴”仍然是一些鞋商的主打商品。“从去年就开始流行，热度仍然有增无减。”一位正忙着帮顾客试鞋的销售员说。
记者拿起一双合码的“雪地靴”开始试穿，感觉脚跟处比较贴合，但脚趾前端却较为宽松。营业员又拿了一双较小码子的鞋，但记者试穿后感觉走起路来仍不舒服，没有着力点。“穿着穿着就好了。”营业员表示。但一位顾客透露，“新鞋时还好，穿一段时间，鞋子会变大，走起路来脚更是在鞋里前后滑动，很不舒服。”
“山寨靴”易闷出皮肤病
岳阳中西医结合医院皮肤科主任李斌教授分析说，目前虽然还未收到过因为穿山寨雪地靴导致脚癣的病例，但脚癣等皮肤病是由真菌感染引发的，脚掌多汗是导致脚癣的主要诱发因素。如果本来就有脚癣的人，再穿上闷热的山寨雪地靴，可能加重病症。
此外，常穿山寨雪地靴，出脚汗后还会有一个“变干”的过程，这样一热一冷更易着凉。黄浦区中心医院骨伤科主任邱德华表示，血气从脚起，因为闷热出脚汗，使脚处于一个潮湿的环境，在潮湿后变干的过程中更易受凉。
专家建议，穿雪地靴先要看天气，转暖时不宜穿雪地靴，还应以透气性好的鞋为宜。保暖也要讲究一个“度”，不要过热，以自我感觉舒适为宜。
长期穿“山寨”脚踝易受伤
记者发现，各类“高仿”、“尾货”的“UGG”雪地靴充斥市场，甚至有商家将劣质雪地靴贴上“UGG”标签后进行出售，个别女生走路已出现了“内八字”的倾向，还有一些因一直踩着雪地靴的内侧，结果导致鞋样出现倾斜等。
“长期穿雪地靴，特别是山寨雪地靴，容易对踝关节造成损伤！”黄浦区中心医院骨伤科主任邱德华分析说，因为雪地靴的高度，会导致踝关节一直处于一个固定位置，在走路运动时，由于材料软、鞋内空间大，足部在鞋肚里可以滑动，对动静平衡点可能会造成一定影响。长此以往，对踝关节可能会有一定损伤。
还有医学专家提醒，雪地靴并不是“户外运动鞋”，居家穿着很舒适，但不适宜穿着长途跋涉。
雪地靴不利儿童生长发育
很多“80后”的年轻妈妈在冬天也会给孩子选择一双时髦的雪地靴。这些妈妈认为，雪地靴一来可以保暖，二来也使孩子紧跟潮流。记者发现，在网上，各式各样的儿童“山寨雪地靴”也琳琅满目，一些热门产品甚至月销可达几千件。
邱德华主任提醒，儿童不宜穿雪地靴。一方面，孩子生性好动，经常处于奔跑、玩乐的过程中，自身并不十分怕冷；另一方面，如果一直穿着雪地靴，可能限制活动，不利于孩子生长发育。

description.hltext_display: Pühademuusika kontsert kingib jõulumeeleolu
description.author: Silja Joon
description.content: Maarja-Liis Ilus tõdes, et esineb Kuusikuga koos laval esimest korda. “Mulle meeldib. Ikkagi uus ja huvitav väljakutse. Tore, et on kaasatud orkester, mis loob eriti piduliku ja pühaliku meeleolu. Pop- ja ooperilaulja kokkupanemine peaks publikule olema põnev ja intrigeeriv, vähemalt ei esine seda Eesti lavadel kuigi sageli. Poplauljatega olen küll ja küll laulnud,” rääkis lauljatar kontserdimajas proovide vahepeal. “Mõne laulu laulame koos, mõne eraldi, on nii popstiilis kui Napoli laule ja ooperipalu,” rääkis Oliver Kuusik, kes on 30aastane rahvusooper Estonia laulja, kes laulukunsti õppinud Londonis. Jõululaule esitada talle meeldib ja mees usub, et laulja peab olema hingelt romantik. Pärnakatele Kuusik nii väga uus esineja polegi, tema tenor on kõlanud näiteks Klaudia Taevi laulukonkursil. “30aastaselt on ooperilaulja alles lapsekingades, sest hääle arenedes lauluvalik järjest suureneb,” pakkus Kuusik.

description.hltext_display: Сегодня может повыситься спрос на акции "Полюс Золото" - ГК "Алор"
description.content:
Закрытие российского рынка во вторник состоялось на верхней границе боковика, царящего на отечественном рынке уже на протяжении двух недель, констатирует аналитик ГК "Алор" Наталья Лесина. Верхней границей данного канала является отметка 1675 пунктов, вблизи которой и состоялось закрытие торгов накануне. Но внешние сигналы уже на открытии торгов ставят под сомнение удержание данного уровня, поскольку после на американском рынке были вновь обновлены максимумы года, причем данное событие произошло после закрытия торгов на российском рынке, поэтому еще не заложено в котировки, полагает эксперт.
Закрытие рынка США состоялось на высоких уровнях, от новых вершин индексы скорректировались лишь слегка. Фьючерсы на индексы США сегодня торгуются в нулях, не формируя определенных сигналов. По мнению Н. Лесиной, во фьючерсах вероятно формирование слабо коррекционной динамики, укладывающейся в боковик, поскольку инвесторы ждут новых сигналов, которыми станут публикуемые статданные по американской экономике сегодня. Именно блок статистики, с её точки зрения, определит тренд на рынке США на сегодня, поскольку завтра выйдут новые сигналы. Таким образом, текущую статистику стоит использовать лишь спекулятивно.
Если во второй половине сессии, на российском рынке произойдут колебания, то первая половина дня может оказаться довольно безыдейной, что может основываться на консолидации основных ориентиров, считает эксперт. Инвесторы уже готовятся к праздникам, поэтому поступления новых средств на рынки не ожидается. Также, по оценке Н. Лесиной, от спекуляций в первой половине дня будет сдерживать ожидание статистики в виде ВВП США за III квартал согласно окончательной оценке и данных по продажам на вторичном рынке жилья. Прогнозы по показателям довольно оптимистичны, что поддерживало мировые рынки накануне, отмечает аналитик.
Драйвером роста на российском рынке акций в начале сессии, с точки зрения эксперта, могут стать фьючерсы на нефть марки Brent, вновь переписавшие максимумы года. Фьючерс на нефть сегодня протестировал отметку $93,5 за баррель. Н. Лесина обращает внимание, что разогревает сырьевой рынок холодная погода в Европе и США, а также публикации статистики по запасам в США под занавес торгов. Согласно прогнозам запасы сырой нефти продолжат резко сокращаться, что может поддерживать акции российской нефтянки внутри дня, полагает эксперт.
С азиатских площадок поступают нейтральные сигналы, торги проходят вяло. Азиатские сигналы могут стать примером для российского рынка на первую половину сессии, отмечает Н. Лесина.
"С учетом нейтральной динамики фьючерсов на индексы США из-за ожидания статистики инвесторы могут вновь обратить внимание на менее ликвидные бумаги в поиске торговых идей, - предполагает эксперт. - Также спрос сегодня внутри дня может повыситься на акции "Полюс Золото", поскольку настроения инвесторов неопределенные. Это может привести к формированию коррекционной динамики в американских фьючерсах и по традиции повысить спрос на защитные активы. Поддержкой для акций "Полюс Золото" может стать динамика фьючерсов на золото, которые с момента закрытия торгов на российском рынке немного подросли".
Аналитик ГК "Алор" советует также обратить внимание на акции "Роснефти", которые накануне скорректировались вниз в район поддержки 220 руб. и закрылись немного ниже данного уровня.

description.hltext_display: Gelapkan Uang Rp 1,4 Miliar Oknum Guru Tersangka Kasus Perbankan
description.content:
Oknum guru di sebuah SMA negeri di Singaraja, Ketut Suk (56), asal Kecamatan Sawan, ditetapkan sebagai tersangka dalam kasus perbankan. Oknum guru itu mengoperasikan semacam bank. Ia berhasil mengumpulkan uang dari sejumlah nasabah yang sebagian besar berstatus guru dan pegawai di sekolahnya.
Kasus itu terungkap ketika para guru dan pegawai itu tidak berhasil menarik dana tabungan yang sudah disetorkan kepada tersangka Ketut Suk. Situasi itu membuat para guru melaporkan kasus tersebut ke Polres Buleleng, September tahun 2009. Sebanyak 53 guru menjadi korban dalam kasus tersebut, hingga menimbulkan kerugian mencapai Rp 1,4 miliar lebih.
Pahumas Polres Buleleng Kompol N. Sukasena yang didampingi Kanit IV Satreskrim Ipda M. Sukirno mengatakan berkas kasus tindak pidana perbankan itu sudah dilimpahkan ke Kejari Singaraja, Selasa (21/12) kemarin. Dalam penyerahan berkas tersebut, penyidik Polres Buleleng juga menyerahkan tersangka beserta barang bukti berupa buku tabungan.
Dijelaskan, usaha yang dilakukan tersangka itu sudah berlangsung sejak sekitar tahun 1994. Modus operadinya, tersangka memberikan pelayanan simpan pinjam bagi kalangan guru dengan mendompleng koperasi sekolah. Saat itu, tersangka memang sebagai pembina koperasi sekolah dan selaku pengelola tabungan para guru. Awalnya, usaha itu berjalan lancar dan para guru juga percaya hingga rata-rata para guru memiliki simpanan sampai puluhan juta rupiah. Para guru tertarik menyimpan uangannya pada tersangka, karena bunga tabungan yang diberikan cukup menggiurkan hingga dua persen.
Namun belakangan, ketika para guru menarik dana tabungannya, tersangka tak bisa memberikannya. Situasi itu membuat para guru melaporkan kasus tersebut ke Polres Buleleng, September tahun 2009. Polisi kemudian menyelidiki kasus itu dengan menggunakan Undang-Undang Perbankan. Karena pengelolaan keuangan sama dengan yang dilakukan oleh lembaga perbankan namun tidak dilengkapi izin. Pasal yang dikenakan adalah pasal 46 (1) Undang-Undang RI nomor 10 tahun 1998 tentang Perbankan. (kmb15)

description.hltext_display: 评选期逢新春Bambook程序达人赛延期
description.content:
Bambook程序达人赛自开赛以来，受到了各合作社区和众多程序开发者的大力支持，大赛主办方表示衷心的感谢！岁末临近，因比赛原定的第二阶段作品评选期适逢新春佳节，为了让开发者们能度过愉快闲适的年末假期，大赛主办方决定将作品征集期延长一个月，至2011年2月15日截止，后续各阶段赛程时间也同样顺延，调整后的大赛流程安排为：
程序达人赛进行到现在，得到了来自CSDN，博客园，InfoQ，Wedoswf，JavaEye等专业软件社区的支持，同时涌现众多优秀的作品。其中“Bambook Google Reader”“锦书搜漫”、“MyBambook”、“epubBuilder”和“Bambookplus”等作品，具有非常好的创意，得到了用户广泛的好评。而Bambook用户也可以通过下载试用作品来获得更好的阅读体验。
一个优秀的作品的出现，除了好的创意以外，还需要一定的开发周期。此次比赛时间的调整，让开发者有了更为宽裕的时间，相信开发者们能够借此机会，不断完善作品。我们也期待Bambook程序达人赛将涌现出更多优秀作品。
Bambook程序达人赛由盛大网络旗下上海果壳电子有限公司举办，是一次基于互联网应用程序设计，Bambook用户需求实现和电子书开放平台探索的创新型比赛。大赛面向全国的软件开发专业人士和爱好者，旨在鼓励参赛者创新思路，为Bambook用户带来高品质的应用程序，不断提高用户体验。作为Bambook开放平台的第一步，盛大目前已经开放了Bambook PC端的编程接口。在不久之后，还计划推出运行在Bambook设备上的应用程序和插件，未来也可能会开放部分或全部的Bambook系统源代码。
更多比赛咨询敬请关注大赛官网（ http://bbsdk.sdo.com/ ）。
在欢迎提供建议，如有任何与手机相关问题，可以向我们发帖提问:
PCHOME移动玩家俱乐部网友问答区
我们有问必答！
无限精彩的随身互联网生活，尽在 PCHOME 3G.生活频道 ！

description.hltext_display: ・长宁区周桥镇建QQ群助就业
description.content:
来源:新闻晚报 作者:孔同 选稿:实习生 徐俊
挂着QQ就能找工作，日前，长宁区周桥镇建立了“周桥JOB之窗”网络QQ群，在社区青年中开展促进就业宣传工作，共发展企业和个人成员300多个。
通过这个QQ群，周桥镇全年累计发布2400多条次岗位信息。还拓展了“周桥JOB之窗”网络平台服务功能，向社区居民提供业务办理和岗位录用情况查询、劳资矛盾协调化解、岗位技能培训指导、就业政策宣传告知、应届生择业以及心理指导、自主创业咨询以及青年简历协同制作等10类就业服务，提高岗位匹配率。

description.hltext_display: India Forex Advisors / Market Commentary /22_Dec_2010
description.content:
Latest News in Forex
RATE STORY: Dear Reader,
Global Markets:
Dollar recovered some ground as focus turned back to Europe's sovereign-debt problems after Moody's Investors Service said it would consider downgrading Portugal. Stock markets are continuing to rally and this is keeping risk appetite strong in Holiday trading. Looking ahead, US Q3 GDP forecast at 2.8% vs. 2.5%. The Euro was able to test 1.3200 after China said they would take concrete action to support EU Debt but made lower 1.3072 level after warnings Portugal and Greece faced more ratings suggested the euro zone's debt crisis was far from abating. The Yen strengthen against the major but recovered with support at 83.50 levels. The sterling took a blow from news of a record British borrowing requirement and slipped to a near three-month low of $1.5463. November UK Public borrowing increased to GBP22.8bn vs. 8.6BN previously. The Australian dollar gained 0.3%, rising to 0.9970, after minutes from last month's RBA policy meeting were released.
Technical Highlights:
EUR/USD: The Euro is currently trading at 1.3134 levels and it touched low of 1.3072 levels yesterday. Immediate support comes at 1.3055 levels (21days Daily lower Bollinger) and next 1.2970, while resistance comes at 1.3220 levels & next 1.3400 levels. EURINR (59.38) exporters cover near 60.00- 60.40 levels and importers cover between 59.20- 59.40 levels. EUR/INR is likely to trade in the range of 59.25 - 59.55 today. Short term and Medium term: Bearish.
GBP/USD: The Pound is currently trading at 1.5480 levels and it touched low of 1.5434 after November UK Public borrowing increased to GBP22.8bn vs. 8.6BN previously. Immediate resistance comes near 1.5530 and next 1.5636 levels (200 Days daily EMA), while support comes at 1.5280. GBPINR (69.90) Exporters cover near 70.60 - 71.00 levels and importers cover between 69.80 -70.00 levels. GBPINR is likely to trade in the range of 69.80 - 70.10 today. Short Term and Medium Term: Neutral.
USD/JPY: USD/JPY is currently trading at 83.77 levels. BOJ left policy unchanged, as expected while Japan's all-industry index declined by 0.2% in October. Trade Balance came at 0.43T vs. 0.58T previous. Immediate Support is at 83.20 (55 Daily EMA) while immediate strong resistance is at 84.20 levels (21 Weekly EMA). Yen Exporters are suggested to book Dec and Jan month's exposure on dips and Yen Importers can cover their exposure above 84 levels. Medium Term: Maintain Bearishness.
AUD/USD: The Aussie is currently trading at 0.9966 levels. Yesterday Aussie had hovered near the parity levels by making a high at 0.9993 and a low of 0.9946 levels. Overall the AUD/USD traded with a low of 0.9862 and a high of 0.9973. Leading Index m/m came at 0.3% vs. Previous 0%. Immediate support comes at 0.9870 levels (21 Daily EMA) While immediate resistance is at 1.0000 levels. Exporters are suggested to book Dec and Jan month's exposure above the parity levels, and Importers can cover their exposure on dips. Medium term: Bullish
Gold: Gold ($1388.95) was well supported holding above $1380 levels yesterday after China had pledged to assist the Euro-zone which lifted optimism. Overall gold traded yesterday with a low of $1380 and high of $1392. Immediate resistance is at $1410 levels followed by $1,431 levels while immediate support comes near $1365 levels. Buying on dips is recommended. Medium term: Maintain bullishness.
DOLLAR INDEX: Dollar Index is currently trading near the resistance level of 80.50 levels. Looking Ahead today, Final GDP q/q expected 2.8% vs. previous 2.5% while Existing Home Sales expected 4.72M vs. 4.43M previous. There is a support at 79.20 levels and resistance is at 80.52. Bias is slightly bullish for Dollar Index. Break of 80.52 and sustaining would be quite bullish for the index. Medium Term: Bullish
DISCLAIMER
These views/ forecasts/ suggestions, though proffered with the best of intentions, are based on our reading of the market at the time of writing. They are subject to change without notice. description.hltext_display: Совет директоров ТНК-ВР одобрил уход Вексельберга
description.author: RU
description.content:
Совет директоров ТНК-ВР одобрил уход Виктора Вексельберга с поста исполнительного директора по газовому
бизнесу компании, сообщил источник Интерфакса. Вексельберг покинет этот пост в начале 2011 года.Как сообщала ранее Газета.Ru, Вексельберг заявлял, что покинет пост исполнительного директора в ТНК-ВР до конца 2010 года. Предприниматель объяснял свое намерение желанием максимально сосредоточиться на работе в фонде Сколково, который он возглавляет.
При этом Вексельберг подчеркивал, что останется акционером ТНК-ВР. «Газета.Ru»

description.hltext_display: Tak Kembalikan Uang Pejabat dan Anggota Dewan akan Disidik Kejaksaan
description.content:
Dugaan adanya penyimpangan (kelebihan) pencairan anggaran Surat Perintah Perjalanan Dinas (SPPD) yang mengharuskan beberapa pejabat dan anggota DPRD Klungkung mengembalikan uang ke kas daerah, berpeluang disidik kejaksaan. Itu berarti, pejabat dan wakil rakyat mesti bersiap-siap berurusan dengan hukum.
Kepala Kejaksaan Negeri (Kajari) Klungkung, Kadir Balwel, belum lama ini mengakui jika temuan BPK berpotensi ditangani kejaksaan sebagai tindak pidana korupsi (tipikor) yang kemudian ditindaklanjuti adanya laporan masyarakat. Namun, Kadir menyatakan sejak temuan BPK diumumkan, yang dinyatakan bermasalah (pejabat dan dewan) masih memiliki waktu beberapa bulan untuk mengembalikan uang ke kas daerah. Jika pengembalian dilakukan sebelum kasusnya diselidiki (di kejaksaan-red), tidak ada sanksi untuk mereka. ''Tetapi, kalau pengembalian dilakukan ketika penyelidikan kasus sudah dilaksanakan, mereka tetap berurusan dengan hukum,'' katanya.
''Pengembalian uang hanya sebagai pertimbangan untuk meringankan,'' ungkap Kadir. Namun, hingga kini dia mengaku belum menerima pengaduan soal perjalanan dinas pejabat dan anggota dewan yang disebut-sebut menjadi temuan Badan Pemeriksa Keuangan (BPK) saat melakukan pemeriksaan selama sebulan di Klungkung (sejak 23 Oktober hingga 25 November 2010).
Sementara itu, pihak terkait di Pemkab Klungkung di antaranya, Wabup Klungkung, Tjok. Gede Agung, belum terbuka soal permasalahan tersebut. Hingga kini, sebagai penindaklanjut temuan BPK, dirinya mengaku belum menerima hasil resmi temuan BPK. Termasuk soal dirinya yang juga disebut-sebut sebagai salah satu pejabat yang wajib mengembalikan uang ke kas daerah.
Di pihak lain, beberapa anggota DPRD secara terang-terangan mengakui bahwa mereka wajib mengembalikan uang dengan jumlah yang bervariasi antarmasing-masing anggota dewan. Besarnya antara Rp 1 juta hingga Rp 40 juta. (kmb20)

description.hltext_display: Перед индексом ММВБ открывается прямая дорога на годовой максимум - "ИГ "Октан"
description.content:
Российский фондовый рынок вчера подрос: индекс РТС прибавил 0,93% днем и еще 0,27% вечером, индекс ММВБ подорожал на 0,64% при внутридневном обороте 31,21 млрд рублей - один из худших результатов в этом году, отмечает аналитик ИГ "Октан" Максим Чернега.
"Фондовые индексы Нового Света выросли на 0,5-0,7% - индекс S&P 500 вышел на уровни сентября 2008 года, где он находился до краха Lehman Brothers - был кризис и нет его. Фондовые индексы Старого Света прибавили в среднем 1% после того как Китай изъявил готовность спонсировать европейскую экономику скупкой суверенных долгов. На этом фоне намерение рейтинговых агентств пройтись с ножницами по рейтингам стран-членов Евросоюза прошло незамеченным", - комментирует ситуацию на фондовом рынке США эксперт ИГ.
Также М. Чернега отмечает, что промышленные металлы и сталь на торгах в Лондоне подорожали, золото топчется около отметки $1390, нефть марки Brent после прорыва обороны на $92 взяла отметку $93,5, что является рекордом этого года, американский доллар укрепился по отношению к корзине валют.
Сегодня нас ждет довольно насыщенный день, особенно на фоне "безрыбья" начала недели, указывает М. Чернега: публикуются ВВП Великобритании и США (12:30 и 16:30 мск), данные о капиталовложениях и платежном балансе Великобритании (12:30 мск), протоколы заседания Банка Англии (12:30 мск), данные о расходах на личное потребление и индекс цен на недвижимость в США (16:30 мск), данные о продажах на рынке жилья в США (18:00 мск) и отчет о запасах нефти и нефтепродуктов (18:30 мск).
"Открытия торгов на российском фондовом рынке сегодня утром можно ожидать с разрыва вверх в среднем на 0,5%, что обусловлено позитивным внешним фоном, дорогой нефтью и острым желанием закрыть год на максимумах. Индекс ММВБ вышел из коридора 1650-1670 пунктов вверх, учитывая эмоциональный фон, перед индексом как раз открывается прямая дорога на годовой максимум", - прогнозирует аналитик ИГ "Октан".

description.hltext_display: Strøbil veltet i rundkjøring
description.author: Kjetil Kjær Andersland
description.content:
Ulykken skjedde like over klokken åtte. Det er en strøbil som har veltet i rundkjøringen ved Storavatnet. Den ligger nå på siden i rundkjøringen, sier operasjonsleder Ronny Lentføhr i Hordaland politidistrikt.
Strøbilen med salt skal også ha brøyteplog. Sjåføren er lettere skadet, men det var ikke andre personer innvolvert i ulykken. Trafikken på stedet går sakte, men veien er ikke stengt, sier Lentføhr.

description.hltext_display: Amet: ühe teelõigu põhjal ei saa Eesti ja Läti teehooldust võrrelda
description.author: BNS
description.content: Kuigi mööda Via Balticat Eesti ja Läti vahel sõitvate autojuhtide hinnangul on Lätis talveperioodil maanteel lumetõrje oluliselt paremini tehtud, ei saa maanteeameti kinnitusel ühe teelõigu põhjal Eesti ja Läti teehooldust võrrelda. Talvel on Via Baltica sageli Läti poolel kuni asfaldini ära puhastatud, kuid Eesti poolel esineb sageli samal ajal kinnisõidetud lund ja jääkonarusi. Maanteeameti pressiesindaja ütles, et kindlasti tahab met jõuda olukorrani, kus piire ületavatel teedel Eestile negatiivseid võrdlusmomente ei saaks tekkida. Tallinna-Pärnu-Ikla maanteed hooldatakse kolmanda seisunditaseme nõuete kohaselt, mille puhul stabiilsetes oludes on sõidutee pind või vähemalt sõidujäljed lume- ja jäävabad. Pressiesindaja sõnul kehtestab iga riik nõuded teehooldusele lähtuvalt liiklussagedusest, majanduslikest võimalustest, tavadest ja prioriteetidest lähtuvalt. Nõuded on igal põhjamaa regiooni riigil veidi erinevad, kuid olulist vahet hoolde tegemise tehnoloogias ja tehnikas ei ole. Maanteeameti andmetel on Läti talihoolde kulud proportsionaalselt suuremad kui Eestis, kuid oma korralduselt Eesti teehooldus Läti omale alla ei jää. Pressiesindaja sõnul on Eesti teehoole on majanduslikult efektiivsem. "Läti teehoolduse taset ei saa määratleda ühe teelõigu põhjal, kuid kindlasti tasuks Eesti ja Läti teehoolduse taset kasutuses olevate ressurssidega seoses analüüsida ja võrrelda. Selleks, et kahe riigi teehooldus adekvaatselt võrrelda, peaks mõlema puhul võtma aluseks teelõigu, kus valitseksid samal ajal kasvõi ligilähedasedki ilmastikutingimused. Viimase lumetormi puhul selline võrdlusmoment puudus, sest Lätis tuli lund tunduvalt vähem kui Eestis – piisab, kui heita pilk tormiaegsele lumekaardile," märkis maanteeameti pressiesindaja. Tema sõnul ei jää Eesti teehooldajad millegi poolest Läti kolleegidest maha ning Eesti teehoolduses läbiviidud reforme on teistele maadele toodud pigem hea näitena eeskujuks. Eestis kehtib teedele neli seisunditaset, kuid riigimaanteedel rakendatakse praegu kolme. Kõige kõrgem ehk kolmas seisunditase on kehtestatud suure liiklusega põhi- ja tugimaanteedele. Madalam, ehk esimene seisunditase kehtib enamikule kõrvalmaanteedest. Kolmas seisunditase tähendab sõidujälgede hoidmist talveperioodil lume- ja jäävabadena. See seisund tuleb tagada viie tunni jooksul alates lumesaju või tuisu lõpust ja nelja tunni jooksul pärast libeduse tekkimist. Lumesaju või tuisu kestel ei tohi lume või lörtsi paksus sõidujälgede vahel ületada kriitilist piiri, milleks on kolm sentimeetrit lund ja kaks sentimeetrit lörtsi. Teisel seisunditasemel tehakse küll regulaarset libedusetõrjet, kuid eesmärgiks ei ole sõidujälgede lume- ja jäävaba hoidmine. Pikemad on ka hooldustsükli ajad – lumetõrjele 12 tundi alates lumesaju või tuisu lõpust ja libedustõrjele kaheksa tundi pärast libeduse tekkimist. Esimesel seisunditasemel piirdutakse üldjuhul lumetõrje tegemisega, libedustõrjet tehakse ainult ohtlikel teelõikudel, milleks on järsud tõusud, langused, raudteeületuskohtade lähedus või muu selline. Muudel lõikudel toimub libedustõrje tegemine ainult erandlike olude korral.

description.hltext_display: ・供需不同往年 专业灰领成用工市场"香饽饽"
description.content:
岁末又至，记者从闵行区外劳力市场了解到，近期闵行暂未出现2009年底的普遍“用工荒”情况，但不少行业紧缺有技术、有技能的专业“灰领”成了市场“香饽饽”。
业内人士表示，由于待遇低、流动性大等原因，用工紧张在上海的制造、服务业一直存在，但除了餐饮行业的长期用工紧缺外，近期暂时未出现普遍用工荒的情况，而随着世博会结束，很多劳动力补充到用工市场。
记者在闵行区来沪人员就业服务中心大厅看到，尽管大屏幕上滚动显示的招聘岗位有上千个，但前来应聘的人并不多，显得有些空荡荡的。
该区外劳所负责人蒋卫?说，由于很多制造业企业开始转战内地，不少劳动力回乡后不再返沪，所以部分行业可能在春节后出现用工紧张。此外，现在“90后”群体逐渐出现在劳动力市场，这群人相对更追求自由度和舒适度，流动性比以往更大，进一步加剧了“灰领”的用工紧张情况。蒋卫?指出，现在市场最缺的是有技能的“灰领”，如集卡司机、印刷工人、程序设计员、质检师等专业性较强的岗位。
有关数据显示，每年10月之后，各大企业都存在大量退工现象。业内人士分析，这是因为许多劳动密集型企业在第四季度的订单较少，部分外来务工者都要提前回老家过年等原因。
为积极应对市场变动，闵行区从2006年开始，加强同外省市劳动部门在劳动力输出就业方面的紧密合作，目前已在湖南长沙、甘肃定西等地先后建立了7家“后方培训基地”，为各用工单位招聘合格劳动力提供便利。通过这样的主动出击，给区内企业寻找用工资源，又起到服务全国的作用。
为配合区内高新科技企业发展，2011年，该区将针对外来务工者，提供更多应用技术型人才的就业培训，并对企业需求进行摸底，按照“缺什么培养什么”的原则，培训一大批有技能的灰领，为闵行进一步的发展储备人才。

description.hltext_display: '3G in India: Operator Launch Strategies' and Other Research Reports by Ovum Available at MarketPublishers.com
description.content:
LONDON, Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Market Publishers Ltd informs that new in-demand market research reports by Ovum have been added to its catalogue. . The report describes data services targeted at specific market segments, provides the key to faster returns on network investments. The research provides the information on the operators that are now planning their network rollout and service strategies and discusses 3G launch strategies in India … . Banks are back in the market for global network services, with technology and manufacturing companies joining them as key innovators in communications. The report provides a detailed analysis of the global service providers...
America Movil. The research dwells on the company focus on bundled offerings and multi-play services as well as expanding 3G network capacity to drive the next phase of growth. The research discusses strategic objectives and the process of integration of newly acquired operations and stiff competition from regional and local players as key challenges … . The report provides a detailed analysis of how current MTRs were determined across the EU15 and look at how NRAs are taking the Recommendation into consideration as they undertake new market analyses. The research discusses EC recommendations aimed at harmonizing the charges across Europe … . This report describes the main HSPA+ enhancements brought by 3GPP R8, R9, and R10. It also offers early trends for these future HSPA+ options. The report provides technical overview of HSPA evolutionary options and mobile broadband connection forecasts for 2009-2015 …
More new market research reports by Ovum can be found at http://marketpublishers.com/members/ovum/info.html

description.hltext_display: 2010: Group educates S/East voters
description.content:
A Non Governmental Organisation, Poverty In Africa Alternative, POVINAA, has embarked on voters education and sensitisation in the South East Zone in preparation for the 2011 elections.
POVINAA�s executive director, Mr. Nebechi Ugwuozor disclosed this in Enugu during an interaction with Daily Champion.
Ogwuozor announced that so far, the organisation has organised dialogue and meetings of Election Stakeholders on the amended constitution and Electoral Act in Enugu, muahia and Abakaliki with the support of Democratic Governance for Development, (DGD).
He pointed out that the central objective of these meetings is to educate electorate in the zone on the changes contained in the 2010 Electoral Act as well as intimate them of the rights and privileges confer on them by the Act as voters and those to be voted for.
Ugwuozor continued that the changes in the Act and constitution would pose great challenges to the electorate and these may impede smooth participation of all Nigerians in the elections.
He pointed out that the central objective of these meetings is to educate electorate in the zone on the changes contained in the 2010 Electoral Act as well as intimate them of the rights and privileges confer on them by the Act as voters and those to be voted for.
Ugwuozor continued that the changes in the Act and constitution would pose great challenges to the electorate and these may impede smooth participation of all Nigerians in the elections.
According to Ugwuozor, the meetings highlighted changes made in the Act and the effect of these changes on citizens participation in the electoral process as well as ally fears on the participation of citizens in the electoral process.

description.hltext_display: Bencana Alam di Buleleng Perlu Penanganan Ekstra
description.content:
Salah satu kendala pembangunan di Buleleng adalah bencana alam. Untuk itu, bencana alam memang memerlukan penanganan ekstra agar pembangunan di Bali Utara bisa berjalan lancar.
Hal itu disampaikan Bupati Buleleng, Putu Bagiada, dalam diskusi terbatas ''Pembangunan Buleleng, Kendala dan Solusi'' yang digelar Komunitas Jurnalis Buleleng (KJB) dan PWI Perwakilan Buleleng di Monumen Tri Yuda Sakti, Selasa (21/12) kemarin. Acara diskusi ini disiarkan langsung Radio Singaraja FM 92,0.
Bupati menjelaskan di balik keberhasilan pembangunan di Buleleng terdapat juga beberapa permasalahan yang perlu penanganan ekstra seperti bencana alam. Menurutnya, bencana alam tidak bisa dilepaskan dari kondisi topografi Buleleng yang nyegara-gunung. Keadaan tersebut berindikasi rentannya bahaya bencana alam. ''Setiap akhir tahun di Buleleng akan terjadi hujan lebat dan angin puting beliung yang mengakibatkan longsor, banjir yang membahayakan warga masyarakat,'' jelasnya.
Di sisi lain, kata Bupati, Pemkab Buleleng dalam melaksanakan agenda pembangunan telah memposisikan diri sebagai motivator dan fasilitator serta memberikan peran yang lebih pada masyarakat sebagai pelaku pembangunan. Guna mewujudkan keberhasilan pembangunan, Pemkab Buleleng fokus pada enam agenda prioritas dan selanjutnya dijabarkan setiap tahun melalui kebijakan dan program kegiatan yang tertuang dalam Rencana Kerja.
Keenam agenda prioritas tersebut yakni penegakan hukum, pembangunan ekonomi, peningkatan aksesibilitas dan kualitas pendidikan, peningkatan aksesibilitas dan kualitas kesehatan, penanggulangan kemiskinan, serta perbaikan iklim ketenagakerjaan.
Diskusi terbatas itu dihadiri seluruh pimpinan SKPD, pimpinan dan anggota DPRD, tokoh LSM, wartawan dan tokoh masyarakat Buleleng. Bertindak selaku panelis dalam diskusi itu Ketua PWI Perwakilan Buleleng Nyoman Suastawan dan tokoh LSM Anton Kiabeni. (kmb15)

description.hltext_display: 中國施工難度最大 「宜萬鐵路」正式通車
description.content:
中國建設難度最大的山區鐵路「宜萬鐵路」正式通車。當日上午，湖北恩施土家族苗族自治州火車站舉行了簡短的通車儀式。10時18分，隨著一聲汽笛響起，4806次列車從湖北恩施火車站首發，當地「無寸鐵」的歷史至此終結。
一大早，遠近趕來的土家族、苗族、漢族等各族民眾，聚集在恩施火車站的廣場上。恩施市紅廟區楓香坪村的土家族老人曾明權第一次在家門口見到了火車：「這條鐵路，我們盼了幾代，今天終於盼到了鐵路開通，今後在外打工的孩子們可以常回家看看了。」
宜萬鐵路也是中國鐵路建設的百年夢想。早在清朝時，就有過修建川漢鐵路的動議。二十世紀初，孫中山先生在他撰寫的《實業計劃》?堣]提出要修「川漢鐵路」，但這些提議均因國亂民窮而未能實現。
新中國成立後，從毛澤東開始，幾代領導人都非常關心和重視宜萬鐵路的修建。幾經論證，2003年底，宜萬鐵路正式開建，歷經百年變遷的鐵路項目終成現實。宜萬鐵路東起湖北省宜昌市，西至重慶萬州區，是進出川渝鄂西的東線通道，是中國中長期鐵路網規劃中「四縱四橫」和滬漢蓉快速鐵路客運通道的重要組成部分。鐵路全線為Ⅰ級電氣化幹線。
其中，湖北宜昌至涼霧段288公里為雙線，設計時速160公里；涼霧至重慶萬州段89公里為單線，設計時速120公里。由於這條鐵路沿途要穿越地質條件極為複雜的喀斯特地貌山區，山高壁陡，河谷深切，集「西南山區鐵路艱險之大成」，為世界所罕見，因而宜萬鐵路也被稱為「中國史上最難修的鐵路」。
溶岩、暗河、斷層破碎帶、煤係地層及瓦斯、高地應力……這些複雜的地質問題都是工程建設的「攔路虎」。最可怕的還是無數個富含高壓水、極易發生突水突泥的大型溶腔和暗河，這使隧道施工異常艱難，時刻都要提防突水突泥的威脅，稍有不慎就會遭受滅頂之災。宜萬鐵路建設指揮部和20多家參建單位依靠科技進步，自主創新，要施工、管理方面實現了多項「首創」：在世界範圍首次進行隧道風險等級劃分，首次規範超前地質預測預報，首創複雜岩溶隧道突水突泥防災報警系統專項設計，首創對不良地層進行注漿管理，首次使用高壓富水充填岩溶釋能降壓專利技術……馬鹿箐隧道頭頂一個60萬立方米的聚水溶腔，被稱為世界鐵路建設史上最大的涌水隧道，施工中共發生14次大型突水災害。
鐵軍經過反復論證後，嘗試採取了「釋能降壓法」，通過實施爆破揭示，30餘萬方岩溶瞬間涌出，為溶洞有效減壓，保障了施工安全。中國科學院和工程院的院士們評價：以宜萬鐵路為依託形成的深埋岩溶地區鐵路隧道修建配套技術，整體上達到國際先進水準。
宜萬鐵路還開創了鐵路史上數項之最。鐵路全線共有隧道、橋梁400餘座，佔線路總長74%，為世界之最；鐵路總里程377公里，修建耗時7年，年均進度僅50多公里，是中國單公里修建時間最長的鐵路；鐵路總投資近226億元，平均每公里造價約6000萬元，兩倍於青藏鐵路，是中國單公里造價最高的鐵路。
過去「蜀道之難，難於上青天」，如今「蜀道不再難，宜萬半日還」。宜萬鐵路通車後，川渝鄂地區出行至武漢、南京、上海的時間將縮短到5至9小時。宜昌車務段客運副段長郭兵說，從目前開行的列車安排看，東西方向的過路車次數較多。每天有5趟車到成都，有3趟到重慶，有9趟車到萬州，有10趟車到利川，有13趟車到恩施。運輸能力空前大，客車密度空前大，今後坐火車進川出蜀將非常便捷。
湖北恩施土家族苗族自治州委書記肖旭明說，宜萬鐵路鋪通標誌著滬漢蓉快速大能力運輸通道的完善，對加快川渝鄂地區經濟增長，推進西部大開發戰略的實施，促進民族團結具有重要意義。

description.hltext_display: 化解基層矛盾 中國幹部下鄉
description.content:
和張成全一起深入基層的，還有被涪陵區委直接派往轄區內461個行政村的近2000名幹部。在三個半月時間?堙A來自區、鄉一級的幹部下到農村，通過助推農戶增收、集中解決基層疑難糾紛和信訪積案等措施，化解基層矛盾。目前，中國正在一些地方試點打破城鄉界限，充分發揮黨員幹部的作用，及時掌握社情民意，面對面做好群眾工作。
「『城?媟F部』下基層，就是要用實際行動解決『農民困難無人問、糾紛無人管、政策無人說、委屈無人訴、致富無人幫』的局面。」涪陵區委書記張鳴說。張鳴說，農村需要公平公正，但目前還存在一些問題，如低保，直補資金等沒有按標準按時發放到農民手中，許多農民享受著黨和政府的惠農政策，但對黨和政府的信任度卻沒有增加。
涪陵區委宣傳部部長蔣天倫至今還對他當時前往白濤街道辦事處樂道村時宣講助農政策的情形記憶猶新。「我給村民說他們養一隻羊，政府補貼一百元。村民不信，下午五點多召集村民開會，晚上九點多村民才陸陸續續到來，我們當場給養羊戶兌了現。」第二天，政府請養羊技術專家到村?媮蕭牷A數十名前夜用村?媦s播喊不來的村民一下涌進教室。樂道村村支部書記王學軍說，這個有153戶村民的村子，養羊戶從7月份以前的30多戶一下增加到目前的97戶。
儘管城市化在中國各地不斷推進，但仍將有數億人口生活在農村，在城鄉發展的不平衡和收入差距擴大的背景下，在廣袤千里的農村維護穩定的任務尤為艱巨。12月舉行的中央經濟工作會議指出：「要維護社會和諧穩定，加強和改進新形勢下群眾工作，深入推進社會矛盾化解、社會管理創新、公正廉潔執法，正確處理人民內部矛盾……著力從源頭上預防和減少矛盾。」
「從短期來看，派遣城?媟F部到基層化解矛盾的做法是有效的。」中國人民大學農業與農村發展學院副院長鄭風田說，「下派幹部跟地方沒有利益關係，往往能夠對村長、村支書起到威懾作用，也能迅速地獲得農民的信任；『城?媟F部』意味著更多資源的介入，有利於農民的脫貧致富。」
中國農業經濟學會副會長、南京農業大學農業經濟研究所所長鐘甫寧認為，加快推進城鄉統籌協調發展的需要與相對落後的農村基層幹部隊伍建設之間的矛盾是目前農村一大主要矛盾。他說，農村基層幹部承擔著推動科學發展、帶領農民致富、密切聯繫群眾、維護社會穩定等重要職責，然而年齡偏大、文化素質偏低，能力不強，工作不積極主動，隊伍不穩、後繼乏人等問題在各地都不同程度地存在。
鐘甫寧說：「解決這一矛盾的有效舉措是積極拓寬基層幹部來源，大力選拔培養農村帶頭人。」涪陵區政府副秘書長汪建平說：「許多幹部回到城?堳寣A學會了換位思考，更加深刻地理解了農民的不易，這對他們以後的工作開展是有益的。」然而，專家表示，問題的關鍵在於如何才能確保幹部「下得去」還能「留得住」。
為此，一些地方嘗試推出了優厚的激勵政策。在兩年內先後選派160名機關幹部擔任村黨組織「一把手」的江蘇省泰州市，選派對象可享受「雙重待遇」和「提升職級的機會」。鄭風田建議，除了適當的激勵政策，對下派的駐村幹部進行考核或者開展滿意度調查也是有必要的。「應該由農民，而不是村幹部，來給駐村幹部打分、考核，這樣就可以通過機制來保證相關制度落到實處。」

description.hltext_display: ・上海海洋水族馆 圣诞老人游"海底"
description.content:
来源:新闻晚报 作者:俞陶然 龚星 选稿:实习生 徐俊
圣诞节将至，在上海海洋水族馆，游客惊喜地发现圣诞老人与鱼群一起遨游“海底”。原来这是饲养员装扮成圣诞老人，在给海洋生物喂食呢。即日起至本月25日，每天上午10点、下午2点，圣诞老人都会出现在海底隧道的鹰鲼和“银色旋风”（?科鱼）展区，为神秘的海底世界增添一抹节日的喜庆。此外，海洋馆还启动了海洋环保圣诞节创意绘画比赛，作品以“保护海洋、保护珊瑚”为主题公开陈列，游客可参与投票。

description.hltext_display: 中國：北韓有和平利用核能的權利
description.content:
‧朝鮮日報中文網 2010/12/22
【朝鮮日報╱記者鄭佑相╱朝鮮日報中文網提供】
北韓日前向訪問北韓的美國新墨西哥州州長比爾‧理查森表示，同意國際原子能機構（IAEA）核查團重返北韓，中國外交部發言人姜瑜21日就此表示：「中方一貫致力於實現半島無核化。根據9.19共同聲明，朝鮮有和平利用核能的權利，但同時必須接受國際原子能機構的保障監督。我們希望有關問題在六方會談框架內處理。」
姜瑜當天在例行發布會上就理查森訪北一事表示：「我們支持美朝保持接觸，希望有關接觸有利於為重啟六方會談、妥善解決有關問題創造條件。」
理查森從本月16日起對北韓進行了為期6天的訪問。理查森結束訪問後乘坐中國國航航班抵達北京，他向記者表示：「北韓沒有對延坪島海上射擊演習進行還擊，表現出具有彈性和希望對話的態度，是一個重要的進展。訪問北韓時雖然強烈要求北韓不要盲目對抗，但最終還是由他們自己做的決定。我認為這次訪問產生了積極有效的影響。」
理查森接着說：「北韓這段時間一直與協商對話背道而馳，感覺北韓意識到現在應該回到正確方向，還感受到了北韓持有實用主義和現實主義的務實態度。」但他還強調，重要的不是語言，而是行動。
【2010-12-22 朝

description.hltext_display: Former Monsanto chairman AtLee resigns from board� 21 Dec 2010
description.content:
ST. LOUIS - Monsanto Co., the world's largest seed company, said Tuesday that a former chairman and interim CEO, Frank AtLee III, resigned from its board of directors.
AtLee, 70, was Monsanto's chairman from June 2000 to October 2003. He was interim president and CEO of the company from December 2002 to May 2003.
AtLee, retired president of the former American Cyanamid Company and chairman of the former Cyanamid International, was a member of Monsanto's board for more than 10 years.
Monsanto also makes weed control products.

description.hltext_display: Pärnu ja Liivi lahe jäämurdetööde hanke võitis PKL
description.author: BNS
description.content: Veeteede ameti teise jäämurdetööde hanke Pärnu ja Liivi lahel võitis Muuga sadamas puksiirteenust osutav AS PKL. � Veeteede ameti välissuhete ja info osakonna juhataja Dan Heering ütles, et jäämurdelepingu sõlmitakse ASiga PKL tuleva aasta 1. jaanuarist 20. aprillini. PKLi pakkumise jäämurdja prahiraha suurus ilma käibemaksuta ühe ööpäeva eest on 90 500 krooni, teatas amet. Jäämurdetööde tegelik kogumaksumus kujuneb vastavalt laeva tööl oldud rendipäevadele. Sellele lisandub kütusekulu, mis sõltub sadamat külastavate laevade arvust ja jääoludest. Suvel välja kuulutatud riigihankele varujäämurdja leidmiseks Soome lahele ei laekunud ühtegi pakkumust. Pärnu ja Liivi lahe jäämurdetööde hankele tuli kaks pakkumist, teise pakkumise esitas OÜ Alfons Hakans. Asenduslaevaks ettenägematute olukordade puhuks on Pärnu lahele broneeriti varujäämurdja PKLilt ka 2008. aasta algul. Varasema info põhjal kuulub PKL endisele Eesti merelaevanduse kaptenile Grigori Oništšenkole, Rein Tõnsonile ja Luksemburgi fondile. Teenuse osutaja ülesandeks on vajadusel teenuse osutamine laevade ja laevakaravanide abistamisel Pärnu sadamasse sisenemisel ja sealt väljumisel, kaasaarvatud laevade pukseerimine jääs. Erinevalt esimesest luhtunud hankest seadis amet selle hanke puhul piirangu prahiraha suurusele ööpäeva eest, piirsummaks on märgitud 125 000 krooni. Veeteede ameti talvise navigatsiooni talituse juhataja Martin Kaarjärv on põhjendanud BNSile eelmise hanke nurjumist sellega, et pakkujad küsisid liiga palju päevaraha. Eelmisel hooajal abistas Pärnu laevateel kaubalaevu riigile kuuluva aluse EVA-316 kõrval laevakompanii Alfons Hakans jäämurdja. Alates 12. detsembrist peab kõigil Pärnu sadamasse sisenevatel ja sealt väljuvatel jäämurdja poolt teenindatavatel laevadel olema jääklass 1C Lloyd's Registeri järgi või samaväärne teiste klassifikatsiooniühingute jääklass ja peamasina võimsus mitte vähem kui 1600 kilovatti. Jäämurdja vedurlaev-pargas koosseise ei teeninda. Veeteede ametil on alates 2004. aastast Rootsi mereadministratsiooniga ka jäämurdjate prahtimise leping, kuid seda vaid vabade laevade olemasolu korral. See annab võimaluse saada lisajäämurdja keskmise talve puhul, kuid karmimal talvel ei pruugi vabasid jäämurdjaid olla. �

description.hltext_display: Фондовый рынок все дальше отрывается от состояния реальной экономики - ИК "Церих Кэпитал Менеджмент"
description.content:
Вчера торги на рынке закрылись с ростом индекса ММВБ на 0,65%, объемы торгов были примерно в половину от среднемесячных значений, отмечает заместитель генерального директора по инвестиционному анализу ИК "Церих Кэпитал Менеджмент" Андрей Верников. "Приближаются новогодние праздники - и одновременно тает желание проводить операции. Основная опасность для инвесторов в 2011 году состоит в том, что фондовый рынок все дальше отрывается от состояния реальной экономики, а все коридоры заканчиваются стенкой, и все пузыри лопаются", - комментирует ситуацию эксперт.
Аналитики Raiffeisenbank в своем обзоре написали, что рост экономики России в ноябре (по данным Росстата) прекратился, после "достаточно хорошей динамики в предыдущие два месяца". "С формальной точки зрения ситуация не должна вызывать большого беспокойства. Однако становится очевидным, что российская экономика еще не вышла на траекторию устойчивого развития. По нашему мнению, в подобной ситуации Банк России не должен торопиться с повышением ставок", - пишут эксперты Raiffeisenbank.
По мнению А. Верникова, главный приоритет ЦБ - стимулирование экономической активности, а для этого ставка должна быть чуть ниже, чем инфляция. "Правда, разрыв не должен быть большим, потому что тогда рано или поздно придется резко поднимать ставку и это дестабилизирует ситуацию на финансовом рынке. Два неурожайных года подряд могут подстегнуть инфляцию в 2011 году . ЦБ будет вынужден поднять ставку (если инфляция на конец 2011 года будет 8,5%, то ставка будет на уровне 8,25%)", - прогнозирует эксперт.
На ход торгов акциями в среду, по мнению А. Верникова, повлияет выход статистики в США по внутреннему продукту (окончательный) за 3 квартал 2010 года (16:30) и по продажам жилья на вторичном рынке недвижимости в (18:00). "На графике индекса РТС имеются медвежьи дивергенции, а американский индекс S&P 500 приблизился вплотную к вершинам, которые он оставил после объявления о банкротстве инвестбанка Lehman Brothers. Кроме того, индекс РТС через два торгов может приблизиться к уровню 1782 и произойдет седьмое подряд касание тренда. В этот момент надо открывать очередные короткие позиции, но... к сожалению, длинные праздники ломают эту стратегию. В момент касания 1782 мы будем украшать елку...стеклянными пузырями", - резюмирует эксперт ИК "Церих Кэпитал Менеджмент".

description.hltext_display: Kampanye Terbuka Simpatisan Abang Padati Lapangan Dauhwaru
description.content:
Ribuan massa pasangan calon I Putu Artha-Made Kembang Hartawan (Abang) Selasa (21/12) siang kemarin memadati lapangan Dauhwaru, Jembrana mengikuti kampanye akbar Abang.
Kendati lapangan sangat becek setelah diguyur hujan, namun tak menyurutkan niat ribuan massa pendukung Abang mendengarkan orasi politik dari jajaran DPP PDI-P, DPD PDI-P dan pasangan cabup-cawabup nomor urut 2, Artha-Kembang.
Hadir dalam kampanye akbar sebagai jurkam Arya Wedakarna mewakili Sukmawati Soekarno Putri, Edy Gumelar yang akrab dipanggil Miing, serta salah satu Ketua DPP PDI-P Hamka Haq. Hadir pula jajaran tokoh PDI-P diantaranya Agung Rai, Wayan Koster, Made Urip, Nyoman Damantra, Adi Wiryatama dan tokoh lainnya.
Hadir juga juru kampanye sebagai penghibur dari Yayasan Kesenian Bali, Lolak Dek Ulik dan kawan-kawan. Ribuan massa juga dihibur dengan dangdut, genjekan, joged bumbung dan hiburan kesenian Jembrana lainnya.
Arya Wedakarna dalam orasi politiknya mengatakan pembangunan di Jembrana selama ini hanya hebat di luarnya saja, namun penuh dengan korupsi. Ke depan diharapkan di Jembrana ada sebuah perbaikan melalui paket Abang (Artha-Kembang) yang merupakan warga Jembrana. ''Paket Abang merupakan tokoh muda berpengalaman dan layak diberikan kesempatan,'' jelas Wedakarna.
Diharapkan dalam pencoblosan nanti paket Abang menang satu putaran. ''Paket inilah yang dirindukan masyarakat Jembrana. Jika ingin Jembrana bebas KKN kami harapkan untuk dibantu merebut kekuasaan, karena kekuasaan itu suci dan partai kawitan harus menang di Jembrana,'' tegasnya.
Sementara Edy Gumelar (Miing) menilai paket Abang merupakan pilihan tepat untuk memimpin Jembrana ke depan. ''Ini kolaborasi yang mantap dan berpengalaman baik di eksekutif dan legislatif. Mereka tahu apa yang harus dilakukan ke depan, mereka tahu apa yang baik dan yang perlu diperbaiki,''tegasnya.
Sementara itu Lolak yang menghibur masyarakat bersama kawan-kawan pelawak mengatakan dirinya mendukung paket Abang karena komit memajukan kesenian di Jembrana. ''Bahkan saya khusus berbicara dengan Pak Putu Artha, HUT kota sampai menelan dana 2,5 milyar dalam setahun, saya harap nanti dari dana HUT kota itu, 1 milyar disumbangkan kepada semua sekeha di Jembrana. Selama ini yang diperhatikan hanya sekeha dari dauh pangkung (luar Jembrana-red),''kata Lolak.
Menurutnya di Jembrana dia mendapatkan suara yang tinggi sebagai anggota DPD RI. Karena itu dia ingin berbuat untuk Jembrana dan ingin memajukan kesenian di Jembrana. ''Agar kesenian di Jembrana di segala lini berkembang, maka pilihkan nomor 2 paket Abang,'' harapnya.
Di sisi lain paket Arta-Kembang dalam orasi politiknya mengatakan komit akan melakukan perbaikan di Jembrana. ''Kami akan perbaiki kualitas pendidikan di Jembrana, meningkatkan kualitas kesehatan masyarakat dengan memadukan JKJ dan JKBM dan akan memajukan kesenian di Jembrana dan tentunya program pro rakyat akan kami perhatikan,'' kata Artha dan Kembang.(kmb26)

description.hltext_display: Baykal'a en bağlı olan adam konuştu
description.content:
2008'e ait görüşmelerde Saylan, "Mesela Baykal stent takılırken öldü... Hani pat diye Özal ölmüştü biliyorsun." diyordu. CHP'li Sayan, bu ifadelerde, 'Özal'ı öldürdük, Baykal'ı komploya kurban götürelim ya da yok edelim' düşüncesi' olduğuna inanıyor. Ölüm korkusuyla Baykal'ın uzaklaştırılmak istendiğini söyleyen Sayan, telefondaki sözlerin de 'şifre' olabileceğini belirtiyor.Cihan TV Network'ün Anadolu'da Sabah programına konuk olan CHP'li Savcı Sayan, Hacettepe Hastanesi'nde Baykal'ın kalbine stent takılması üzerine yapılan konuşmanın asıl amacının, dönemin CHP liderine mesaj yollamak olduğunu savundu. Bu şifreyi de, "Bu Baykal'a bir komployu gösterelim. Tehdit edelim. Şantaj yapalım. Köşesine çekilmek zorunda kalsın. O zaman kimse sizi tutamaz. Orada asıl olan şifreler odur." şeklinde açıkladı.
Baykal'ın partinin başından uzaklaştırılması için bazı ellerin devreye girdiğini anlatan Sayan, komploların nereden kaynaklandığını az çok tahmin ettiklerini, ancak ellerinde bunu belgeleyecek güç olmadığını dile getirdi. Hükümetin bu konuyu ortaya çıkartarak afişe etmesini isteyen eski CHP MYK üyesi, şunları söyledi: "Biz bunu bekliyoruz. Baykal'ın stent meselesi büyük bir meseledir. Kalp meselesi değil... Ameliyat meselesi değil. Oradan bir şey çıkmayacağını onlar da biliyor. Orada bir korku var, şifreler var... 'Baykal'ı kenara çektirelim. CHP'yi bitirelim' ülkeyi bitirelim...1 Mart tezkeresi gibi tezkereleri ülkeden geçirelim. Bütün mesele bu, Anadolu insanı da bunu böyle bilsin."

description.hltext_display: Buses and trains affected by snow
description.content:
Bus and rail services in Staffordshire have been hit after overnight snow.
First Potteries said there would be a reduced service in places, with buses unable to get to some villages and estates.
There were delays on rail services from Crewe, Stoke-on-Trent and Stafford stations, with some cancellations.
The north of Stoke-on-Trent was particularly badly hit, especially Tunstall and Kidsgrove, the city council said.
There were icy conditions on slip roads at junction 17 of the M6.
London Midland has a reduced service between Redditch and Lichfield.

description.hltext_display: เบลารุสจับผู้ประท้วงทางการเมืองเข้าคุก 600 ราย
description.content: รัฐบาลเบลารุส� ายใต้การนำของประธานาธิบดีอเล็กซานเดอร์ ลูกาเชนโก ควบคุมตัวนักเคลื่อนไหวทางการเมืองมากกว่า 600 ราย� หวังสยบเหตุวุ่นวายหลังการเลือกตั้งประธานาธิบดี...สำนักข่าวต่างประเทศรายงานเมื่อวันที่ 22 ธ.ค.ว่า ทางการเบลารุสควบคุมตัวนักเคลื่อนไหวทางการเมืองจำนวนมากกว่า 600 ราย ไปคุมขังในเรือนจำของรัฐแล้ว โดยไม่สนใจกระแสกดดันจากโลกตะวันตก เกี่ยวกับการละเมิดสิทธิมนุษยชนและการคุกคามเสรี� าพทางการเมืองของประชาชน ที่ออกมารวมตัวคัดค้านผลการเลือกตั้งครั้งล่าสุดที่ประธานาธิบดีอเล็กซานเดอร์� ลูกาเชนโก ได้อยู่ในตำแหน่งต่อแบบน่ากังขารายงานข่าวระบุว่า เบื้องต้นนักเคลื่อนไหวแต่ละรายจะถูกควบคุมตัวในเรือนจำตั้งแต่ 5-15 วัน โดยทั้งหมดอาจต้องรับโทษจำคุกยาวนานถึง 15� ปี หากถูกศาลที่รัฐบาลเป็นผู้ควบคุมพิพากษาว่า� พวกเขามีความผิดจริงฐานก่อความไม่สงบและทำตัวเป็น� ัยคุกคามความมั่นคงของชาติรายงานข่าวยังระบุว่า หนึ่งในผู้ที่ถูกควบคุมตัวในครั้งนี้ มีอดีตผู้สมัครที่ลงชิงตำแหน่งประธานาธิบดีแข่งกับลูกาเชนโก ในการเลือกตั้งครั้งเมื่อวันที่ 19 ธ.ค.ที่ผ่านมา รวมอยู่ด้วยไม่ต่ำกว่า 5� รายทั้งนี้ เหตุวุ่นวายทางการเมืองในเบลารุสระลอกล่าสุด เกิดขึ้นหลังจากที่ประชาชนจำนวนหลายพันคน� � ไม่พอใจผลการเลือกตั้งที่ออกมาว่า ประธานาธิบดีลูกาเชนโก วัย 56 ปี� ได้รับชัยชนะแบบถล่มทลายโดยได้คะแนนเสียงเกือบ 80 เปอร์เซ็นต์� และกำลังจะได้บริหารประเทศต่อเป็นสมัยที่ 4 ทั้งๆ ที่ประชาชนส่วนใหญ่เชื่อว่าการเลือกตั้งครั้งนี้ไม่โปร่งใส.

description.hltext_display: Palace: Zara Phillips Engaged To Be Married
description.content:
Phillips Is Queen's Eldest Granddaughter, 12th In Line To Throne
UPDATED: 4:02 pm CST December 21, 2010
AFP/
LONDON -- Prince William and Kate Middleton will soon have company on the royal wedding calendar. Buckingham Palace announced Tuesday that Zara Phillips, Queen Elizabeth II's eldest granddaughter, is engaged.
Phillips, an accomplished equestrian, said she was shocked but "very happy" that her rugby-playing boyfriend Mike Tindall had proposed.
No date has been set yet. Phillips is close friends with her cousin, Prince William, who plans to marry Middleton at Westminster Abbey on April 29. Their engagement was announced last month.
Phillips, 29, is 12th in line to the throne.
The 32-year-old Tindall has played 66 times for England and was in the team that won the 2003 World Cup. It was during the tournament that he first met Phillips in a Sydney bar. Tindall plays for club side Gloucester and is still a regular in the national side.
The palace said in a statement that the couple got engaged Monday evening at their home in western England.
In a statement, Phillips said she was "really shocked when Mike proposed but I am very happy."
Tindall said: "I am delighted that Zara has agreed to marry me. We are both very excited about the next stage of our lives together."
Buckingham Palace said the queen and her husband Prince Philip "are delighted with the news."
Phillips, the daughter of Princess Anne, has won medals in world equestrian championships and was once voted BBC sports personality of the year - as was her mother, who shares her loves of horses.
She was due to compete at the Beijing Olympics in 2008, but pulled out of the competition because of an injury to her horse.
The marriage between Princess Anne and Phillips' father, Mark Phillips, ended in divorce in 1992. Princess Anne has since remarried.
Zara Phillips and her older brother Peter are among the most low-profile members of the royal family, and the only ones among the queen's eight grandchildren not to hold royal titles. Princess Anne turned down her mother's offer of the honors for her children.
As soon as the engagement was announced, bookies began taking bets on the date and venue.
August was the early favorite, with St. George's Chapel at Windsor Castle the odds-on venue. Zara's brother, Peter, married his wife Autumn there two years ago.

description.hltext_display: Reaction: Too much, too little, just right
description.content:
New federal rules designed to prevent Internet-access providers from favoring or discriminating against lawful online traffic drew mixed reaction from Colorado companies and consumer advocates.
Opponents decried the added regulation, while proponents of so-called net neutrality efforts said the rules adopted Tuesday by the Federal Communications Commission don't go far enough.
Broomfield-based Internet network operator Level 3 Communications and Douglas County-based satellite-TV provider Dish Network both expressed support for the rules.
"The new rules give companies, including Dish Network, the framework to invest capital and manpower in Internet-related technologies without fear that our investment will be undermined by carriers' discriminatory practices," said Dish chief executive Charlie Ergen.
He added that the FCC should have gone further and "expressly prohibit discrimination" on wireless networks.
Operators of wireless networks, such as Sprint and Verizon, will have more leeway in managing Internet traffic. The FCC said it took a measured approach with mobile broadband, in part, because the service is at an earlier stage and "speeds, capacity, and penetration are typically much lower" than wireline service.
Danny Katz, director of the Colorado Public Interest Research Group, said he was "disappointed that the FCC put together weak rules."
Specifically, Katz slammed the agency for not clearly banning pay-for-priority agreements. Such a deal, as an example, might involve an Internet provider collecting payments from a video streaming company and offering subscribers faster access to that service over a competing service.
Pay-for-priority deals "raise significant cause for concern" and would "unlikely" be allowed under the new rules, according to excerpts released by the FCC.
"They give a lot of lip service to the potential danger of paid prioritization as unreasonable discrimination, but they do not outright ban it," Katz said.
Denver-based Qwest said it was disappointed that the FCC moved forward with new regulations "at such a critical time in our nation's economy."
"The Internet is a vital source of innovation and job creation, especially in rural areas, and those should be our priorities, not more government," said Steve Davis, Qwest's senior vice president of public policy.
Kevin Schaff, CEO of Denver-based video-platform and rights-development firm Thought Equity Motion, said the rules appear to strike a good balance, "enabling the FCC to play a role in protecting openness on the Internet."
Smaller Internet-based startups such as Beatport said it was too early for them to comment on how the regulations might impact their business.
Andy Vuong: 303-954-1209, avuong@denverpost.com or twitter.com/andyvuong

description.hltext_display: Afghan official rebukes NATO for civilian deaths
description.content:
An Afghan provincial governor says NATO needs to exert greater caution in its operations following the death of five civilians during a battle with insurgents.
The office of the governor of Helmand province said in a statement Wednesday that the five civilians killed during the clash a day earlier included three women and two children. NATO says it is investigating the deaths, which Afghan officials say occurred during a Taliban raid on an Afghan national police checkpoint.
Afghan officials have repeatedly spoken out about civilian deaths, arguing that the international forces are not being careful enough to avoid such casualties as the war nears its tenth year. Insurgents also try to use the civilian death toll as a way of rallying support for their cause.

description.hltext_display: 'Jeg er ikke genert i sengen'
description.author: TINA TJØRNER
description.content:
Forholdet mellem den barmfagre sangerinde og manden, komiker Russel Brand, er frækkere end nogensinde. Det afslører den 26årige sangerinde i et interview med det britiske magasin Grazia.
- Jeg har mine hemmeligheder og magiske tricks, det er klart. Men jeg kan ikke dele dem med jer, for så ville alle jo kende dem, siger Katy Perry og fortsætter den frække tone: Læs også: - Men lad os bare sige, at jeg ikke er genert.
Sangerinden blev gift med britiske Russel Brand, 35 år, i oktober, og forholdet bliver kun bedre med tiden. - Jeg bliver overrasket over ham hver eneste dag. Han kan få mig til at grine som ingen andre kan. Vi er hinandens perfekte match, fortæller Katy Pery. Læs også: Læs også:

description.hltext_display: Humiliated Cable left clinging to Cabinet job
description.author: Michael Settle & Kate Devlin
description.content:
VINCE Cable suffered humiliation yesterday and the Coalition its worst blow to date when an angry David Cameron slapped down the Business Secretary after he compromised his ministerial position by “declaring war” on Rupert Murdoch and his media empire.
And in further disclosures last night, Scottish Secretary Michael Moore was among a string of Liberal Democrat ministers who privately voiced unease about the Coalitions policies on welfare reform and university tuition fees, in recordings made by undercover reporters posing as constituents.
Labour branded Mr Cable a lame duck and demanded he be sacked for showing prejudice in his semi-judicial role on deciding whether the controversial business tycoons 8 billion bid to take over BSkyB succeeds or not.
However, Nick Clegg demanded his key LibDem ally stay in government for the sake of Coalition unity, no matter how diminished his colleagues position had become.
After private talks at No 10 the Prime Minister agreed but, in a deeply embarrassing move for the Business Secretary, Mr Cameron stripped him of a significant part of his portfolio dealing with media takeovers and transferred it to Culture Secretary Jeremy Hunt.
In a severe censure, in Whitehall terms, No 10 said: The Prime Minister is clear that Mr Cables comments were totally unacceptable and inappropriate. Mr Murdochs News Corporation, which backed the Tories at the General Election, said it was shocked and dismayed at the Business Secretarys words, saying they raised serious questions about fairness and due process. Earlier in the day, Mr Cable hit the headlines after unguarded remarks made to two undercover reporters revealed he had privately threatened to bring down the Coalition if pushed too far by his Conservative colleagues.
He complained the Tories were showing a Maoist revolutionary zeal in going too quickly on too many policy areas and that dealing with them was a constant battle.
Mr Cable told the reporters, who posed as constituents in his Twickenham seat: I have a nuclear option. Its like fighting a war. They know I have nuclear weapons ... if they push me too far, then I can walk out of the Government and bring the Government down. Mr Cable admitted to being embarrassed by his remarks but insisted he had no intention of resigning from the Cabinet.
Later, during a Downing Street press conference, Mr Cameron said his LibDem colleague had been very apologetic at a Cabinet meeting, stressing: Personally, I get on with Vince extremely well. Mr Clegg described Mr Cable as an incredibly important member of the Government and an outstanding Business Secretary, adding: He himself has said he was embarrassed by the comments he was reported as saying and I can totally understand why he was. End of story. Yet moments later the revelation broke that the released comments made by Mr Cable had omitted one key section about Mr Murdoch in which he said: I am picking my fights, some of which you may have seen, some of which you havent. I dont know if you have been following what has been happening with the Murdoch press, where I have declared war on Mr Murdoch and we are going to win. Once they learned of their colleagues remarks, Mr Cameron and Mr Clegg hurriedly went into a private meeting.
The Herald was told Mr Cable did not offer his resignation because, by the time he met the Deputy Prime Minister and then the Prime Minister, they had already agreed he should remain in government but take no further part in the decision over News Corps proposed takeover of BSkyB, with Mr Hunt taking over that responsibility.
The move will involve the switching of 50 staff from the Business Department to the Culture Department.
The near-departure of Mr Cable is the latest crisis for the Coalition following the resignation of former chief treasury secretary David Laws, Lord Youngs controversial claim that Britons had never had it so good, and Lord Flights assertion that welfare changes would encourage breeding among the poor.
Last night, Ed Miliband said Mr Cameron had got it wrong. He has kept Vince Cable on not because of the national interest but because his Conservative-led Government needs the prop which Vince Cable provides, he said. Having apparently breached the ministerial code and having said what he said, he shouldnt be remaining in office.
