description.hltext_display: Arunachal Journalists Withdraw Strike
description.content:
The media fraternity in Arunachal Pradesh last night withdrew its pen-down strike after the accused in the journalists' assault case surrendered before the police.
The accused Hina Tada, the personal security officer (PSO) of Lok Sabha member Takam Sanjoy, walked into the police station armed with an anticipatory bail granted by district and session court judge and surrendered before the investigating officer.
Tada was later released after preliminary questioning.
The Capital Complex Additional district magistrate had issued a non-bailable warrant against Tada on Monday.
Journalists took to the street on December 16 last, blacked-out portion of newspapers for three days and resorted to pen-down strike from December 19-21 after two lady journalists, Appu Gapak and Nyapi Bomjen, were allegedly assaulted by the PSO on December 12 when they were collecting news about an accident.
The APUWJ and APC said that in accordance with an earlier decision, newspaper houses in the state would boycott official press releases, functions and programmes for one month, Arunachal Pradesh Union of Working Journalists (APUWJ) and Arunachal Press Club (APC) said in a statement.
During the period, government tariff for official advertisement would be ignored and media houses would accept only commercial terms and conditions. MORE
The APC and APWUJ in a joint communiqué alleged that police knew the identity of the person within 24 hours of the incident, but kept denying knowing anything about him.
The police came out in open about the identity of the accused only after the MP called up one of the senior journalists to inform that accused was attached as his personal security officer and he had directed the SP to arrest him immediately, the statement said.
Meanwhile, both the organizations have raised question about the manner in which the accused was granted bail by the court.
“It raises question as to why neither the case diary nor the investigating officer of the case was called by the judge before granting the anticipatory bail, given the fact that accused has been on the run since December 12 night after assaulting and attempting to raise the modesty of two female journalists who were on duty and attempting to throw one of them to the gorge four times amounting to ‘attempt to murder’”, APC president Jarpum Gamlin said in a statement.
The press fraternity also demanded that the case be treated as special in the light of continuous attacks on the fourth pillar of democracy and be put on fast track court for speedy trial.

description.hltext_display: Garang di Lapangan, Soleh di Rumah
description.content:
M Nasuha, Pemain Timnas dari Taktakan, Kota Serang
Salah satu pemain tim nasional (timnas) Indonesia di ajang piala AFF Suzuki Cup 2010, yang ditakuti seluruh lawan yakni Muhammad Nasuha. Pria bersahaja ini adalah warga Desa Panggung Jati, Kecamatan Taktakan, Kota Serang.
Bagi keluarga Muhammad Yasin dan Raisha, yang bertempat tinggal di Kampung Kamalaka, Desa Panggung Jati, Kecamatan Taktakan, Kota Serang, sosok sang anak, M Nasuha, merupakan pemain bola yang taat beribadah.
Ibunda Nasuha, Raisha, yang hidup sederhana, mengutarakan, sejak umur tujuh tahun, Nasuha sama sekali tidak pernah meninggalkan salat lima waktu dan selalu membaca kitab suci Alquran usai salat. Meskipun Nasuha mulai sibuk dengan berbagai turnamen yang diikuti, ia tetap menjalankan kewajibannya sebagai umat yang taat beribadah.
Raisha menceritakan, Na­suha bisa masuk skuad timnas Indonesia berawal pada 2001. Kala itu, klub Krakatau Steel (KS) tertarik merekrut Nasuha karena melihat aksi-aksi Nasuha di turnamen antar-kampung. Karir Na­suha terus meroket setelah Nasuha mampu masuk timnas Indonesia U-21 di tahun yang sama. Meski demikian, Nasuha tetap bersahaja. Hal ini bisa dilihat dari keadaan rumah keluarga Nasuha di Taktakan, Kota Serang, yang terbilang sederhana dan jauh dari kesan mewah.
“Saya senang bisa mendidik seorang anak yang baik. Bayangkan saja, setiap kali ia mau bertanding, ia selalu menelepon kepada saya dan bapaknya untuk minta doa restu. Ini menandakan ia anak yang berbakti kepada orangtua,” ungkap Raisha kepada Radar Banten saat ditemui di kediamannya di Kampung Kamalaka, kemarin.
Raisha berharap agar Nasuha tetap rendah hati dan khusus di piala AFF Suzuki 2010 ini bisa membuat Indonesia merengkuh juara mengandaskan Malaysia. “Saya ingin anak saya mampu memberikan yang terbaik bagi negaranya,” tandasnya. Melihat permainannya yang semakin lama semakin bagus, Raisha optimistis bahwa Nasuha bisa membuat Indonesia jadi nomor satu di Asia Tenggara.
Meski demikian, ia me­ngaku tidak ingin menonton pertandingan Nasuha bersama timnas pada 26 Desember melawan Malaysia di negeri jiran Malaysia. “Kalau nonton langsung saya deg-degan. Apalagi bila melihat anak saya jatuh. Rasanya khawatir. Tapi kalau nonton di televisi biasa-biasa saja. Kami juga kecapekan karena be­la­kangan ini kewalahan meladeni wartawan baik media cetak maupun elektronik yang mau mencari keterangan tentang Nasuha,” imbuhnya.
Kesahajaan Nasuha juga ditanggapi teman bermain sepakbola sejak kecil yang juga jadi adik iparnya, Agun Narsa. Agun memaparkan, selain taat beribadah, Nasuha juga orang yang tekun. “Sejak kecil memang bakat ia me­ngolah si kulit bundar sudah kelihatan. Bahkan di berbagai even tingkat daerah aksinya selalu mendapatkan decak kagum dari semua penonton. Ia pun pemain yang tekun berlatih,” kata Agun.
Rekan setim Nasuha di PS Krakatau Steel tahun 2001, Imam Riyadi, juga mengatakan hal yang sama. Kata Imam, waktu itu Nasuha masih pemain junior di KS. “Tapi saya melihat talenta yang luar biasa pada dirinya. Ditambah orangnya baik dan rajin salat. Pokoknya sangat jarang pemain seperti dia,” ungkap Imam.
Panutan Adiknya
Selain pandai mengolah si kulit bundar, Nasuha merupakan pria yang cerdas. Sejak duduk di bangku sekolah dasar (SD) sampai sekolah menengah pertama (SMP), Nasuha selalu juara kelas. “Kakak saya selalu mendapatkan ranking satu. Bahkan sejak masuk klub Krakatau Steel dan bersekolah di SMK Prisma, ia tak pernah absen maupun bolos sekolah,” papar Yanti Suyanti, adik kandung Nasuha.
Yanti melanjutkan, kakak­nya juga selalu mementingkan pendidikan. Buktinya pada saat kelas dua, ia sampai pindah ke SMK Yabinka Kota Cilegon, lalu ke SMK Krakatau Steel agar bisa sekolah dengan lancar. “Buat dirinya pendidikan juga sa­ngat penting. Makanya ia jadi panutan kami. Kami pun tetap berharap ia mau mewujudkan keinginannya untuk bisa berkuliah di Unsera se­perti yang ia idam-idamkan sejak awal,” tuturnya.
Adik lelaki Nasuha yakni Sumarna juga mengungkapkan ingin seperti kakaknya. “Selain pintar bermain bola, ia juga soleh, dan pintar di sekolah. Pokoknya saya ingin seperti Kak Nasuha. Apalagi jadi pemain timnas. Itu keinginan saya sama seperti kakak,” kata Sumarna.
Kepala SMK Prisma Iswandriyanto memaparkan bahwa Nasuha anak yang rajin waktu menempuh pendidikan di Prisma. “Waktu dia sekolah di jurusan mesin, dia tak pernah bolos di sekolah. Bahkan bisa dibilang sangat santun sama teman maupun guru. Anak yang baik lah pokoknya,” puji Iswandriyanto. (*)

description.hltext_display: Rijedak genetski poremećaj: Mjesec dana nakon rođenja sina otkrili da je zapravo kćerka
description.content:
24SI - Madeleshia (29) i Kenneth Hiscock (30) iz južnoafričkog Vereeniginga sa oduševljenjem su dočekali rođenje sina jer već imaju kćerku. Pri rođenju je izgledalo kao da Kenny ima muške genitalije, piše The Sun. Međutim, mjesec dana kasnije primijetili su kako nešto nije u redu.
Kenny je gubio na kilaži. Odveli su ga u bolnicu. Doktori su napravili pretrage i otkrili da je Kenny zapravo djevojčica. Njeni organi bili su povećani zbog rijetkog nedostatka enzima koja uzrokuje abnormalnu proizvodnju hormona. Roditelji su bili okirani. Otili su kući nadajući se kako su doktori pogrijeili u dijagnozi. Ipak, doktori su potvrdili dijagnozu na sljedećoj kontroli, prenose hrvatski mediji."Bili smo okirani. Nismo znali ta učiniti. Ali, vidjevi svoje dijete znala sam da nije bitno kojega je spola", rekla je majka. Kennyja su sada preimenovali u McKenzi i tražili novi rodni list."Doktor nam je rekao kako McKenzi nije ni dječak ni djevojčica, nego neto između. Mi sada mislimo da imamo predivnu kćerku i presretni smo zbog toga", rekla je majka. Doktori su ih uvjerili kako McKenzi ima maternicu i jajnike, ali nisu im to pokazali na ultrazvuku. Roditelje najvie brine to će McKenzi moći operisati povećani klitoris tek sa 16 godina."Kako da joj objasnimo zato izgleda drugačije dok se bude kupala sa sestrom", zabrinuta je majka.

description.hltext_display: Robert M. bood kamers aan om luiers te verversen
description.content: AMSTERDAM - De hoofdverdachte van de Amsterdamse zedenzaak Robert M. en zijn echtgenoot Richard van O. zijn in maart van dit jaar begonnen aan een website voor het aanbieden van verschoningsruimtes voor baby's. Met de website www.babyruimtes.nl wilden Robert M. en zijn man ouders sanitaire voorzieningen aanbieden om hun kinderen een schone luier te geven. De site is niet meer in de lucht, aldus de Telegraaf.Op de site stonden die verschoningsruimtes aangegeven op een Google-plattegrond van de Nederlandse hoofdstad. Tijdens verhoren zal de recherche er proberen achter komen wat hiervan de bedoeling was.Babyruimtes.nl is op 26 maart van dit jaar geregistreerd door Richard van O. Het is een van de webadressen van het tweetal die justitie momenteel onderzoekt.Telefoongids van pedo'sDe openbare aanklager beschikt over de complete inhoud van dertig websites met de bijbehorende logfiles, waarin exact is aangegeven wie de websites heeft bezocht. Het rechercheteam heeft daarmee in feite een 'telefoongids' van mogelijke kinderpornokijkers in handen. Daarnaast blijkt Van O. te hebben geknoeid met de facturen die hij ontving van de webhost.De Amsterdamse buschauffeur vervalste de omschrijving voor de nota en het factuuradres. Eenmaal aangepast leek het alsof zijn klanten rechtstreeks betaalden aan de webhost. Van O. zou geldproblemen hebben en vermoedelijk zadelde hij anderen op met de rekeningen voor de websites.Burgemeester bezoekt crècheMidden maart 2011 zal er een zitting plaatsvinden in de rechtszaak tegen hoofdverdachte Robert M. Hij wordt verdacht van ernstig seksueel misbruik van jonge kinderen. De raadkamer van de Amsterdamse rechtbank besloot gisteren hem negentig dagen langer vast te houden. De Amsterdamse burgemeester Van der Laan bezocht gisteren 'Jenno's Knuffelparadijs' om de leiding van het kinderdagverblijf een hart onder de riem te steken. (CBR)

description.hltext_display: US Fines Subsidiary Firm in China for Pak Nuke Exports
description.content:
The United States has imposed a highest ever penalty of nearly USD 4 million on a Chinese subsidiary of an American company for illegally exporting high-tech coatings to Pakistan's under-construction Chashma 2 nuclear reactor.
The firm, PPG Paints Trading in Shanghai, a wholly-owned subsidiary of an American firm PPG Industries, was fined after pleading guilty to having illegally exported high performance coatings. It would have to pay USD 3.75 million as penalty, US Justice Department said.
The fines "represent one of the largest monetary penalties for export violations imposed in the history of US Department of Commerce's Bureau of Industry and Security," the Department said.
In addition to criminal penalties, the subsidiary firm and its parent company will also have to cough out another USD 1.7 million in civil fines to US audit.
The US company made only a trifle USD 32,319 from the transaction which took place between June 2006 and March 2007.
The Justice Department sources said the Shanghai-based subsidiary company had filed that the coatings were for a nuclear power plant for China, which were then diverted to Chashma 2 in Pakistan's Punjab province.
The US has heavily restricted exports to entities affiliated with Pakistan's nuclear programme since the country exploded its nuclear bomb in 1998.
"This case should serve as a warning to corporations that would violate US export laws," US Attorney Ronald Machen said.
He said the hefty fine "demonstrates our resolve to vigorously enforce US export law."
Chashma 2 is a Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission power plant under construction near Kundian, Punjab province with the Chinese assistance.
The Pakistan Atomic Energy Commission is the science and technology organisation in Pakistan responsible for its nuclear programme, including the development and operation of nuclear power plants in Pakistan.

event_or_fact.property: demonstrates our resolve to vigorously enforce US export law.
This case should serve as a warning to corporations that would violate US export laws

entity.property: US Department of Commerce's Bureau of Industry and Security

description.hltext_display: Ajarkan Sportivitas dan Disiplin, Biasakan Bangun Subuh
description.content:
Ibu-ibu yang Sukses Antarkan Kesuksesan Anaknya
Setiap tanggal 22 Desember diperingati sebagai Hari Ibu. Berikut kisah para ibu yang sukses membesarkan anak-anaknya menjadi anak yang mapan.
---
Membesarkan lima anak pada usia yang tergolong muda bisa jadi merupakan pekerjaan sulit. Namun, Andi Asni Pa­toppoi mampu membesarkan lima bersaudara Mallarangeng hingga dewasa dan sukses. Spirit sang ibu agar anak-anaknya menggapai bintang di langit menjadi salah satu motivasi bagi lima bersaudara Mallarangeng untuk terus berkembang.
“Boleh dibilang, saya sebenarnya juga beruntung karena tidak ada anak-anak yang kepeleset (berbuat hal negatif-red),” ujar Asni saat ditemui di kediamannya di kawasan Jakarta Timur dua pekan lalu.
Lima anak Asni adalah Andi, Rizal, Choel, Nina, dan Zulfikar Mallarangeng. Kini, Andi Mallarangeng menjadi menteri pemuda dan olahraga (Menpora) Kabinet Indonesia Bersatu II. Sebelum­nya, Andi merupakan juru bicara Presiden SBY.
Sementara itu, Rizal Mallarangeng saat ini aktif sebagai salah seorang ketua DPP Partai Golkar dan pendiri Reform Institute. Choel Mallara­ngeng tercatat sebagai pendiri dan CEO Fox Indonesia, lembaga konsultan politik dan strategi yang menjadi tim sukses pencalonan pemilu maupun pilkada.
Nina Mallarangeng berprofesi sebagai dokter. Dia menekuni profesinya tersebut bersama sang suami di Pekanbaru. Sementara itu, nasib Zulfikar berbeda dari empat kakaknya. Saat duduk di bangku SMA di Semarang, Jawa Tengah, dia dipanggil Sangkuasa karena penyakit leukemia yang diderita.
Dalam usianya kini yang memasuki 74 tahun, Asni masih tampak sehat. Gaya bicaranya masih lancar dan tegas. Asni menyatakan belum lama ini keluar dari rumah sakit. Itu terjadi setelah dirinya shock mengetahui kabar bahwa anak sulungnya, Andi, cedera lengan kanan. “Saya sangat kepikiran waktu itu sampai ikut-ikutan sakit,” tuturnya.
Sejak berumur 34 tahun, Asni membesarkan lima anaknya sebagai orang tua tunggal (single parent). Sang suami, Andi Mallarangeng (namanya sama dengan si anak sulung-red), meninggal saat menjabat walikota Parepare pada usia 36 tahun. “Suami saat itu terkena serangan jantung,” cerita Asni.
Sebagai ibu muda, Asni mengaku sempat merasa galau. Kepergian suami dirasakannya begitu cepat. Itulah yang membuat dirinya sa­ngat khawatir terhadap masa depan lima anaknya. Saat itu, Anto, sapaan akrab Andi Mallarangeng, sebagai anak tertua, baru berusia sembilan tahun dan si bungsu Zulfikar baru berumur tiga bulan. “Dunia gelap sekali rasanya waktu itu,” kenang Asni.
Dengan statusnya sebagai pegawai negeri sipil (PNS) saat itu, dia merasa tanggung jawab untuk membesarkan dan membahagiakan lima anaknya begitu berat. Namun, Asni tetap sabar men­jalani.
Ayahnya, Andi Patoppoi, kemudian menawari Asni memboyong lima anaknya tersebut ke Ujungpandang (Makassar-red). Sang ayah bersedia membantu me­nga­suh cucu-cucunya. “Saya tung­gu Andi sampai naik ke­las dulu, baru kemudian ka­mi semua pindah,” ujarnya.
Ketika itu, Andi Patoppoi adalah orang terpandang di Ujungpandang. Dia menjadi bupati Grobogan, Jawa Tengah, pada era Presiden Soekarno. Andi juga pernah menjabat anggota Majelis Permusyawaratan Rakyat Sementara (MPRS).
Selanjutnya, lima bersaudara Mallarangeng mendapat perhatian penuh dari kakeknya. Andi yang memiliki latar belakang pendidikan di Belanda itu menanam­kan sikap disiplin kepada mereka. Setiap waktu harus dimanfaatkan. “Kalau waktunya belajar, ya harus belajar. Sebaliknya, jika waktunya bermain, ya harus bermain,” tutur Asni soal disiplin yang diterapkan ayahnya.
Kedisiplinan dan pendidikan yang diajarkan sang kakek itulah yang membentuk lima bersaudara Mallarangeng menjadi anak-anak mandiri. Menurut Asni, Andi dan Celi-sapaan akrab Rizal-sudah menunjukkan minatnya di bidang yang ditekuni saat itu. Di ruang belajar hingga tempat bermain, mereka selalu memperdebatkan setiap masalah yang ada. “Kalau tidak dilerai, mereka bisa tidak tidur,” ujarnya bangga.
Sebagai kakak tertua, kata Asni, Andi memang bisa menjadi contoh bagi empat adiknya. Namun, untuk urusan berkelahi, Celi-lah yang paling jagoan. Asni menceritakan, Andi acapkali diganggu teman-temannya di sekolah atau di lingkungan bermain. “Kalau sudah seperti itu, Celi yang maju. Badannya sejak kecil paling besar,” ungkapnya lantas tertawa.
Selain menanamkan di­siplin, Asni menumbuhkan sikap jujur pada lima anak­nya melalui olahraga. Hobi olahraga tenis yang dijalani Asni ditularkan kepada anak-anaknya. Andi, Rizal, maupun Choel ternyata tertarik menggeluti hobi sang ibu. “Pertama, saya ajak mereka jadi pengambil bola dulu. Lama-kelamaan, mereka senang main tenis sendiri,” ujarnya.
Mengapa menanamkan sikap jujur lewat olahraga Asni menilai, olahraga memotivasi orang untuk selalu jujur. Jika bola masuk, tentu mendapat poin. Sebaliknya, jika bola keluar, setiap orang harus menerima bahwa mereka gagal mendapat poin. “Di olahraga, orang itu kan harus to the point. Fighting (terus berjuang, Red) supaya menang. Itu penting agar belajar jujur dalam kehidupan,” tegasnya.
Selama masa remaja, lanjut Asni, anak-anaknya tidak pernah bercerita soal pacar mereka. Itulah yang memunculkan cerita saat Andi sudah menginjak dewasa. Setelah Andi lulus dari UGM, Asni berniat menjodohkannya dengan perempuan yang notabene masih kerabat. “Anto, waktu saya telepon, mau-mau saja. Ya sudah, kami jodohkan saja,” kata Asni.
Ternyata, Andi sebetulnya sudah memiliki pacar. Begitu tiba di Makassar, Andi justru mengungkapkan bahwa sebenarnya dirinya ingin menikah dengan Vitri Cahyaningsih, gadis Jawa yang kini menjadi istrinya. Asni yang ketika itu sudah mempersiapkan seluruh proses pernikahan me­ngaku kaget. “Saya langsung pingsan setelah Anto bilang (sudah punya pacar dan ingin menikahinya-red),” ujarnya.
Atit Tresnawati
Mungkin, tidak banyak ora­ng yang mengenal Atit Tres­nawati, sosok ibu kelahiran Tasikmalaya, 2 Februari 1946. Orang mungkin lebih familier de­ngan anak-anak­nya seperti Yuanita Rohali (43) maupun Alya Rohali (34).
Yuanita memiliki karir moncer di dunia bisnis. Jabatan chief financial officer (CFO) atau direktur keuangan di PT Bakrie & Brothers Tbk empat tahun disandangnya. Saat ini, dia menduduki kursi CFO di PT Bumi Resources Minerals, perusahaan lain yang juga berada di bawah naungan Grup Bakrie.
Begitu pula Alya Rohali. Karirnya moncer di dunia hiburan Tanah Air. Sukses menyabet gelar Putri Indonesia pada 1996, Alya kemudian tampil dalam beberapa sine­tron. Belakangan, dia eksis sebagai salah seorang pembawa acara atau presenter top di tanah air.
Nah, Atit Tresnawati adalah ibu sekaligus sosok penting di balik sukses yang diraih dua putrinya itu. “Sebagai ibu, impian terbesar saya adalah melihat anak-anak sukses dan bahagia,” tuturnya.
Yuanita merupakan anak sulung di antara lima bersaudara, sedangkan Alya adalah putri keempat. Namun, bukan hanya Yuanita dan Alya yang sukses dalam karir mereka. Anak kedua Atit, Ruliantina Rohali, berkarir sebagai psikolog di Jakarta.
Anak ketiga, Dina Andini, saat ini menjabat corporate secretary PT Benakat Petroleum Tbk, perusahaan di bidang minyak dan gas. Si bungsu, Mohammad Kemal, berkarir di Badan Pelaksana Kegiatan Usaha Hulu Minyak dan Gas Bumi (BPMigas).
Apa resep khusus untuk mendidik anak-anak hingga meraih sukses? Mendengar pertanyaan itu, Atit hanya tersenyum. “Tidak ada rahasia atau resep khusus. Biasa saja. Mungkin satu hal yang dulu selalu saya bersama almarhum suami (Rohali Sani) tekankan pada anak-anak saat mereka masih kecil, yakni soal akhlak. Kami ajarkan kepada mereka tentang kejujuran, empati kepada sesama, saling menolong, dan disiplin waktu,” tuturnya.
Saat kecil, kata Atit, Yua­nita dan empat adiknya memang mendapat pendidikan agama cukup intens. Mereka diwajibkan mengikuti pe­ngajian di Madrasah Al Azhar tiga kali seminggu.
Yuanita dan adik-adik­nya juga diajari disiplin. Atit menyebutkan, bangun saat subuh dan salat berjamaah sudah menjadi kebiasaan. Dengan bangun pagi, tutur dia, anak-anak punya waktu luang untuk mempersiapkan kegiatan mereka. (jpnn/alt)

description.hltext_display: 千歳北陽高生３人提案の観光企画に優秀賞 （12/22）
ACS's Hochtief stake creeps closer to 30 pct target
description.content:
* ACS says was tendered 5,825 Hochtief shares by Dec. 21
* Says voting rights total 27.26 percent
* ACS's offer for Hochtief runs through Dec. 29
(Adds details, background)
FRANKFURT, Dec 22 (Reuters) - ACS said Hochtief shareholders had tendered fewer than 6,000 shares by Tuesday, still leaving it short of its 30 percent stake target a week before the end of the offer period.
The Spanish construction group had a total 27.26 percent of voting rights in Hochtief, Germany's biggest builder, ACS said in a statement on its website on Wednesday.
ACS wants control of Hochtief without having to buy all of the company's shares, so it made a low all-shares offer for the company to avoid a deluge of shares tendered. The offer period ends on Dec. 29.
Southeastern Asset Management, a shareholder in both ACS and Hochtief, is expected to tender shares representing about 2.5 percent of Hochtief to ACS. (Reporting by Maria Sheahan; editing by Alexander Smith)
2010-12-22 10:17:43

description.hltext_display: 'Spider-Man' stunt goes awry; is show in peril?
description.content:
New York: Broadway might need a superhero to save the new Spider-Man musical. "Spider-Man: ," the most expensive production in Broadway history, suffered its fourth accident in a month when a stuntman playing the web-slinger fell about 30 feet into a stage pit during a preview Monday night. The safety tether that clips to his back failed to prevent the spill.
The performer, Christopher W. Tierney, was wheeled out of the Foxwoods Theatre on a stretcher, still in his costume, and taken by ambulance to Bellevue Hospital with minor injuries.
He suffered broken ribs and internal bleeding, said a castmate, who spoke on condition of anonymity because the person was not authorized to speak publicly about the musical.
An uncle in Florida, Michael Tierney, said when reached by phone Tuesday night that he had spoken with his nephew a few hours ago. "He sounded pretty good," Tierney said, adding that his nephew was still at the hospital when he spoke with him.
In a statement, Actors' Equity said investigators determined that the accident was caused by human error. It gave no details but said additional safety measures are being undertaken.
A state Department of Labor spokesman said the cause was under investigation.
The fall was the latest setback for the troubled, $65 million show. Conceived by Tony-winning director Julie Taymor and U2's Bono and The Edge, who wrote the music, "Spider-Man" has been more than eight years in the making. It has been plagued by delays, money woes and several other accidents, including one in which an actress suffered a concussion and another in which a performer broke his wrists in an aerial stunt. Its official opening has been postponed twice, to early February.
The huge costs - a 41-member cast, 18 orchestra members, complicated sets and 27 daring aerial stunts, including a battle between two characters over the audience - mean the 1,928-seat theater will have to virtually sell out every show for several years just to break even. The weekly running bill has been put as high as $1 million. (Tickets are $67.50 to $135 for weekday performances, $67.50 to $140 on weekends.) A spokesman for "Spider-Man," Rick Miramontez, said in a statement that new safety measures ordered by the government after the latest accident have been adopted. Wednesday's matinee was canceled, but Wednesday night's show will go on, Miramontez said. (No performance had been scheduled for Tuesday.)
Leo Rosales, spokesman for the New York Department of Labor, said the show's producers had not yet presented new safety protocols and would do so on Wednesday. If the measures were inadequate, he said, the state won't let the show perform the complicated aerial maneuvers.
"If it takes longer, it will need to take longer," he said of the show's timing. "We need to be satisfied."
Taymor, the director, said in a statement: "An accident like this is obviously heartbreaking for our entire team and, of course, to me personally. I am so thankful that Chris is going to be alright and is in great spirits. Nothing is more important than the safety of our Spider-Man family and we'll continue to do everything in our power to protect the cast and crew."
One audience member who attended Monday's performance, Brian Lynch, said he knew of the previous mishaps and still wanted to come.
"I was making jokes about it earlier in the day," said Lynch, visiting from Hollywood, Calif. "I said if anyone got hurt I was ready to jump in and help out. I never thought it would happen, I thought they probably worked it all out. I really didn't think it would happen like it did. It was pretty horrific."
The accident happened during the show's big finale, when the Green Goblin drops Mary Jane and Spider-Man leaps to her rescue.
"But then he just kept falling, it seemed, and then everything went dark and then people, crew ran up to the stage and we heard the girl playing Mary Jane screaming from the pit," Lynch said.
"Spider-Man" might yet prevail. Other Broadway shows have struggled with getting their sets and stunts to work during previews, including "Mary Poppins," whose house set went off track in 2006, and "Titanic," which was plagued by numerous technical problems during a month of previews in 1997. Both were hits.
Mary Martin, who starred many times in productions of "Peter Pan," had numerous accidents, "beauts," as she flew about the stage. A year before she died, in a 1989 interview with the Chicago Tribune, she recalled smashing into a concrete wall during a rehearsal as she was trying to show the children in the cast that they shouldn't fear being in the air.
"It was like a cannon shot," Martin said. "I thought, `My God, these kids will never fly now,' never thinking that my arm might be broken. So we went right back and I said, `Now we're going to fly it like it should be,' and we did, and it went perfectly."
But "Spider-Man" - whose costs beat the previous most expensive Broadway show, the $25 million "Shrek The Musical" - has reached a dangerous level of attention: fodder for comics. Online, where parodies by "Saturday Night Live" and "Conan" poking fun of the musical's early technical problems had recently been eagerly passed around, the tone shifted Tuesday from jokey schadenfreude to mild outrage.
An actor from TV's "Modern Family," Jesse Tyler Ferguson, wisecracked: "I'm torn between wanting to see `Spider-Man' on Broadway and not wanting to see someone literally die doing musical theater."
The production - supervised by Juniper Street Productions, a management firm that has overseen such Broadway and Las Vegas productions as "The Producers" and "Promises, Promises" - has been under investigation by the federal Occupational Safety and Health Administration since Nov. 2 at the request of the state Labor Department, according to OSHA.
"It's certainly going to be continuing as a result of the latest incident," OSHA spokesman John Chavez said.
The state Department of Labor inspected 37 separate aerial maneuvers planned for the show at rehearsals in November and approved the use of all equipment in the show, Rosales said. "From what we saw back then," he said, the maneuvers appeared to be safe.
Miramontez said OSHA, Actors' Equity and New York State labor officials met with the "Spider-Man" company on Tuesday to discuss additional safety measures, and "it was agreed that these measures would be enacted immediately."
Tierney, who appeared in the national tour of "Moving Out" and in "Dirty Dancing" in Toronto, is the show's main aerialist and performs stunts for the roles of Spider-Man and the villains Meeks and Kraven the Hunter. The castmate who spoke on condition of anonymity said the cable to Tierney's harness snapped. But one special-effects expert raised the possibility that the rope was not hooked up securely.
Scott Fisher, president of Fisher Technical Services Inc. of in Las Vegas, which builds equipment for aerial stunts for the show, said the rope was supposed to be clipped to the stage at one end and the performer's back at the other.
"The stage crew would have been responsible for making the connection for hooking him up," Fisher said. "The actor is responsible for making the final check that he's good to go. It's sort of like packing your own parachute."
He said the script called for the stuntman to lurch forward at the end of a ramp as if leaping to Mary Jane's rescue. "He runs and stops and freezes in a position that you wouldn't normally be able to hold unless you had a little support from behind him," Fisher said. "If that's not hooked up and he leans forward, he's going to fall forward."
Fisher said the rope was not part of his company's onstage flight systems. But he said it was unlikely to have snapped: It is a 10,000-pound line.
After the actor fell, screaming could be heard coming from the pit.
"A voice yelled, `Someone call 911!' Then there was a silence," an audience member, fashion blogger Mariana Leung, wrote on the website NearSay.com. "A minute later, the stage was still dark. Then there was an announcement that the show would be delayed. A few minutes later, a second announcement that the performance would not continue. The lights came up."
Just last week, the show's lead producer, Michael Cohl, delayed the official opening for the second time, pushing it back from Jan. 11 to Feb. 7. He cited "some unforeseeable setbacks, most notably the injury of a principal cast member."
The first preview on Nov. 28 did not go well. The musical had to be halted five times because of technical glitches, and actress Natalie Mendoza, who plays Spider-Man's evil love interest Arachne, was hit in the head by a rope and suffered a concussion. She was sidelined for two weeks.

description.hltext_display: Akala proposes N144bn budget to Oyo Assembly
description.content:
OYO State Governor, Otunba Christopher Adebayo Alao-Akala yesterday in Ibadan, presented a budget proposal of N144,111,285,500.00 to the State House of Assembly for consideration for the 2011 fiscal year with a declaration that the good times have come for the people of the state.
Tagged �Budget of Reality�, a sum of N78.48billion which is 54.46 per cent goes for capital expenditure while the balance of 45.54 per cent goes for recurrent expenses.
In arriving at the figure, Alao-Akala stated that deliberate and concerted efforts were being geared towards the transformation of the entire road network in the state, adding that emphasis was also being placed on the completion of all on-going projects.
A summary of the proposed capital expenditure showed transportation as taking the lion share of the budget with N18,174,000,000 or 23.16 per cent. It was followed by health which gulped N15,100,000,000 or 19.24 per cent and then education with N7,753,150,000 or 9.88 per cent. The urban/rural electrification will take N3,163,500,000 or 4.03 per cent.

event_or_fact.property: deliberate and concerted efforts were being geared towards the transformation of the entire road network in the state, adding that emphasis was also being placed on the completion of all on-going projects.

description.hltext_display: Ренессанс Капитал поднял оценку акций М.Видео на 26%, рейтинг - "покупать"
description.content:
Инвестиционная компания (ИК) "Ренессанс Капитал" повысила прогнозную стоимость акций ОАО "М.Видео" с $9,4 до $11,8 за штуку, сообщается в обзоре ИК.
Новая прогнозная стоимость этих бумаг предполагает 36%-ный потенциал роста их рыночной стоимости с текущих уровней и соответствует рекомендации "покупать".
"Мы повысили прогнозную стоимость акций "М.Видео" в связи с тем, что финпоказатели данного торговой сети в 2010 году будут, скорее всего, лучше, чем мы предполагали ранее. Более того, более быстрые, чем прогнозировалось, темпы открытия новых магазинов во II полугодии 2010 года, вероятно, приведут к сильным результатам в 2011 году", - говорится в обзоре.
По итогам торгов 21 декабря в РТС лучшая котировка на покупку акций "М.Видео" составила $8,6 за штуку.

description.hltext_display: Terima Fee, Dewan Khawatir
description.content:
SERANG - Sejumlah anggota DPRD Banten yang dikabarkan menerima fee (komisi) sebesar Rp 40 juta sebagai komitmen awal dana aspirasi dalam APBD 2011 mulai khawatir. Mereka mencemaskan penerimaan fee itu akan menyeret mereka ke penjara seperti kasus dana perumahan.
Sumber Radar Banten di DPRD Banten menuturkan bah­wa dari 85 anggota Dewan sesungguh­nya ada yang tidak menginginkan fee yang diberikan Pemprov Banten namun karena tidak ingin mengecewakan fraksi akhir­nya turut menerima. “Setelah muncul berita di Radar Banten, sebagian anggota Dewan yang tak menginginkan dana aspirasi ini khawatir, mereka takut terkena pidana,” kata sumber Radar Banten, Selasa (21/12).
Memang belum semua anggota Dewan menerima fee. Fraksi yang diduga sudah mendistribusikan dana fee antara lain Fraksi Partai Demokrat, Fraksi PDI Perjuangan, Fraksi Golkar, Fraksi PKB, dan Fraksi PKS. Sementara yang belum didistribusikan yakni Fraksi Hanura, Fraksi Gerindra, Fraksi Ardu, Fraksi BBPB, dan Fraksi PPP. Beberapa anggota fraksi se­perti dari Fraksi Demokrat, Fraksi PDI Perjuangan, Fraksi Golkar, Fraksi PKB, dan Fraksi PKS mengakui sudah mene­rima fee di termin pertama sebesar Rp 20 juta pada Desember 2010.
Sementara itu, sejumlah pimpinan fraksi di DPRD Banten merasa gerah tentang pemberitaan fee dan ramai-ramai membantah. Ketua Fraksi Bulan Bintang Peduli (BBP) DPRD Banten Saris Priada Rahmat mengakui bahwa anggota DPRD Banten mengusulkan agar dapat dana aspirasi tapi mengenai fee dia membantah. “Yang memberikan informasi anggota DPRD Banten dapat fee siapa? Tidak ada itu, hanya isu,” ujarnya.
Bantahan juga dilontarkan Sekretaris Fraksi PKB DPRD Provinsi Banten Thoni Fatoni Mukson. Kata dia, sebelum pembahasan sampai pengesahan APBD Banten 2011 tidak ada fee untuk anggota Dewan. “Tidak ada dana aspirasi di APBD 2011, juga tidak ada fee dari Pemprov,” ujarnya.
Wakil Ketua Fraksi Partai Golkar SM Hartono menja­wab singkat terkait fee dan da­na aspirasi ini. “Menerima dari mana, tahu juga enggak,” ujarnya.
Ketua DPW Partai Bulan Bintang (PBB) Banten Buety Nasir mengaku mendukung adanya dana aspirasi bagi anggota Dewan untuk para konstituen. Namun dia mengecam jika ada fee untuk dana aspirasi yang diperuntukan bagi 85 anggota Dewan. “Jika polanya seperti yang diberitakan di media, bukan bentuk dana aspirasi. Tapi bagi-bagi proyek,” ujarnya saat menghubungi wartawan.
Di tempat berbeda, akade­misi Untirta Ikhsan Ahmad menilai, dana aspirasi yang diberikan kepada anggota DPRD Banten hanya untuk ke­pentingan pribadi bukan masyarakat. “Selama ini terbukti bahwa ke­pentingan ang­gota Dewan berbeda dengan kepentingan rakyat. Mereka hanya wakil dan belum mewakili rakyat. Dana aspirasi ini adalah perilaku aneh anggota Dewan yang mengarah pada upaya memperkaya diri sendiri dan kepentingan pemilihan gubernur 2011,” tandasnya.
Selain itu, lanjutnya, dana aspirasi tidak sesuai dengan tugas dan fungsi Dewan karena jika bisa memberikan kegiatan kepada masyarakat melalui APBD berarti sebagai pemegang dana. “Bukankah sejatinya Dewan melakukan fungsi kontrol, bukan ikut campur urusan kegiatan anggaran. Dana aspirasi ini hanya bagi-bagi proyek,” ujarnya.
Terkait fee sebesar Rp 40 juta kepada setiap anggota Dewan sebelum dana aspirasi diberikan, menurut Ikhsan, sudah semestinya pihak kejaksaan maupun polisi untuk turut ambil bagian melakukan pengamatan atas kebijakan yang sarat kolusi ini. “Dana aspirasi adalah bentuk kebijakan yang di dalamnya penuh pemikiran yang berbau kolusi antara eksekutif dan legislatif,” ujarnya.
Sementara Koordinator Banten Corruption Watch (BCW) Teguh Iman Prasetya mengatakan, saat ini usulan yang dilakukan para anggota Dewan di Banten sudah ada kepentingan pribadi. “Sebenarnya tidak cuma dana aspirasi yang menjadi ‘permainan’ para anggota Dewan, tapi masih banyak lagi. Saya melihat, saat ini perilaku para anggota Dewan sudah benar-benar menyimpang dari fungsi dan tugasnya,” ujar Teguh saat dihubungi melalui ponsel.
Istilah ada udang di balik batu, tambah Teguh, jelas terlihat dalam masalah dana aspirasi ini. Sudah lama pihaknya mengendus ada penyimpangan dari program dana aspirasi. “Jadi kalau anggota Dewan mengatakan tidak ada fee dan sebagainya, itu jelas tidak mungkin. Karena saya juga memiliki data yang lengkap terkait adanya fee seperti itu,” ungkapnya.
Bila disuruh menilai, Teguh mengaku memilih tidak setuju dengan dana aspirasi apa pun alasannya. Termasuk alasan yang mengatasnamakan konstituen. “Program ini jelas tidak masuk akal. Skala kota/kabupaten, sudah ada bagiannya sendiri. Jadi apa lagi yang mau dilakukan anggota Dewan di DPRD Banten yang bisa menyentuh langsung secara teknis di lapangan. Berbeda kalau anggota Dewan di kota/kabupaten, karena skala konstituennya lebih kecil yaitu di tingkat kecamatan,” bebernya.
Oleh sebab itu, Teguh tidak sependapat dengan dana aspirasi. “Kalau sekarang terjadi intrik-intrik di dalamnya seperti fee dan sebagainya, itu harus segera diusut tuntas. Biar anggota Dewan tidak lagi sembarangan mengajukan usulan,” pungkasnya. (run-bon/alt)

description.hltext_display: WikiLeaks: US & UK try to change Bangladesh madrassa curriculum
description.author: Michael Hughes
description.content:
British and U.S. officials have attempted influencing Islamic education in Bangladesh as part of their counter-terrorism strategies, according to WikiLeaks U.S. embassy cables released this week. Although they have the right idea they are taking the wrong approach, because the initiative will only be effective if led by Muslims - not Westerners. , in one cable US ambassador to Dhaka, James Moriarty, noted how the British asked Bangladesh’s prime minister, Sheikh Hasina, to develop and implement a “standardized” curriculum for unregulated Islamic madrassa schools, which came on the heels of a similar pitch from USAID for a madrassa "curriculum development program".
There are approximately 64,000 Islamic schools in Bangladesh which provide free schooling to underprivileged children.� However, 15,000 or so unregulated madrassas trouble the Bangladeshi government because the quality of education is below average and they radicalize children, while some even see them as potential jihadist training camps.
Meanwhile, just last week Bangladeshi officials ordered an investigation into madrassa funding after claims banned Islamic militant group Hizb-ut-Tahrir (HT) had been establishing bases there.
Bangladesh banned HT in 2009 for "destabilizing" the country a day after a bomb attack targeted a ruling party lawmaker and a relative of the prime minister.
Author Commentary:
The concept isn’t necessarily a bad one and, as a matter of fact, perhaps it is something that should be discussed with Pakistani leaders, as their madrassas have produced the likes of Taliban leader Mullah Omar. In 2009 journalist about how HT had infiltrated Pakistan’s army and military academies:
A senior Obama Administration official brought up HT, a Sunni organization whose goal is to establish the Caliphate. “They’ve penetrated the Pakistani military and now have cells in the Army,” he said. (The Pakistan Army denies this.) In one case, according to the official, HT had recruited members of a junior officer group, from the most élite Pakistani military academy, who had been sent to England for additional training.
No matter how many Taliban are killed there are scores being radicalized in Pakistani madrassas ready to replace them.� The West is not going to “capture and kill” its way to achieving its security objectives in Central Asia.
A counter-terrorism strategy should include fighting the narrative that violent Islamic extremists have successfully been using; however, the initiative cannot be led by the West. It must be led by Muslims as I wrote in a piece for CNN with Afghan native Khalil Nouri entitled “”. In it we say: The extremists’ source of strength must be appropriated by forcefully contesting their ideas with undeniable truths based on historical facts. One of the best ways to do this is via fatwas, formal Islamic legal opinions issued by recognized religious authorities.
Fatwas issued by authorized scholars based on the true interpretation of Islamic Shariah will be given prominence over the opinions of unqualified Muslims.
A council of senior ulema (great imams) can be congregated in some secular and secure Islamic state where the most respected Islamic leaders in the world can collectively issue fatwas that publicly rebuke terrorism and anti-Islamic acts such as beheading, school blazing, suicide and martyr operations carried out in the name of Islam. They can also prohibit youth worldwide from traveling into terrorist hubs to engage in jihad.
The next step is to establish rehabilitation centers through Islamic seminary branches in the vicinities of militant operations in Afghanistan and Pakistan to divert recruits from entering terror camps. Young Muslims and even some hardcore terrorists, given the opportunity, would rather receive an Islamic awakening from preeminent scholars than suffer through the curriculum of barely-literate Mullahs.
Full caution must be taken that the endeavor is free from influence by non-Islamic states and that only Muslims are seen leading and financing it.
Islam is suffering because the ulema, prominent imams and the Muslim intellectuals, are failing to publicly renounce the societal disease of radicalism. They have an� opportunity to reintroduce the true Islam of peace and love over the distorted version that preaches holy war and hate.
Other Recent WikiLeaks Articles:

description.hltext_display: Surging Mavs trim struggling new-look Magic
description.content:
Los Angeles - The Dallas Mavericks will enjoy a much- deserved five-day Christmas break, while the struggling new-look Orlando Magic will be working in the gym trying to figure things out.
Caron Butler scored 20 points, Dirk Nowitzki had 17 and the visiting Mavericks held off the Magic, 105-99 on Tuesday night for their 16th victory in the last 17 games.
"It was an important game for us," said Mavericks coach Rick Carlisle, whose club resumes play on Monday at Oklahoma City. "We wanted to get momentum going into the break."
The game marked a milestone for Nowitzki, who passed legendary Larry Bird for 25th place on the NBA's all-time scoring list. Afterwards, the German received a congratulatory text message from the Hall of Famer.
Tyson Chandler added 16 points and Jason Terry contributed 13 off the bench for Dallas (23-5) which moved to 10-1 on the road after sweeping the Florida road trip by snapping Miami's 12-game run and winning at Orlando for the fifth straight time.
"This is a huge trip for us," Chandler said. "After a tough win in Miami, to come down to Orlando and get a win on back-to-back nights, where we knew they would be pumped up is huge for our confidence; it's huge for our momentum."
Dwight Howard had 26 points with 23 rebounds, while J.J. Redick scored 21 for Orlando (16-12) losers of four straight and eight of its last nine games.
With no time for a practice, Orlando has dropped two in a row since acquiring Gilbert Arenas, Hedo Turkoglu, Jason Richardson and Earl Clark following Saturday's blockbuster trade with Phoenix and Washington.
Magic coach Stan Van Gundy explained the difficulties of integrating new players into a team, especially during the season.
"It's not easy when a guy goes to a new team and he's got all of training camp," he said. "Now you are talking about guys coming in 26 games into the year. They still haven't practised together.
"Nobody wants to hear it, but it's going to take some time and I'm not talking about two days either. We are back to square one."
Orlando faces conference leaders San Antonio on Thursday and Boston on Christmas Day.
Dallas led by as many as 12 points in the fourth quarter and 97-89 before Howard hit two free throws and Richardson buried a three to make it a three-point game with 56.6 seconds left.
Terry nailed a 20-footer with 38 seconds remaining, but Turkoglu countered with two free throws.
The Magic fouled Shawn Marion, who made both from the stripe. After Richardson hit another triple, Nowitzki sank a pair of foul shots for a 103-99 advantage at the 24 second mark.
Richardson had his three-point try rim out, and Terry converted two more from the line to further the Magic's frustrations.
"Right now, we are not worried about these last two games," Arenas said. "We are worried about four months from now and where we are going to be. It's a long season and we are upbeat about what the future holds for us."
Elsewhere: Milwaukee Bucks 98, LA Lakers 79Backup Earl Boykins scored 10 of his season-high 22 points in a 21-7 closing run, John Salmons added 20 and the Bucks (11-16) snapped the Lakers' five-game winning streak, with their first win in seven meetings against the two-time defending NBA champions.
Kobe Bryant netted 21, Spanish-native Pau Gasol had 15 and 11 rebounds for the Lakers (22-7) who were outscored 26-13 in the final 12 minutes en route to a season-low point total.
Chicago 121, Philadelphia 76Derrick Rose had 22 points with 12 assists, Luol Deng also scored 22 as the Bulls (17-9), minus injured big men Joakim Noah and Taj Gibson pounded the visiting 76ers (11-17) for their eighth win in nine games.
Oklahoma City Thunder 99, Charlotte Bobcats 81Kevin Durant poured in 32 points and visiting the Thunder (20-9) went on a game-breaking 25-3 fourth-quarter flurry to hand the Bobcats (9-19) their fourth straight loss.
New Jersey Nets 101, Memphis Grizzlies 94Brook Lopez scored 26 points, newly-acquired Sasha Vujacic added a season-high 16 and the Nets (9-20) stopped a 10-game road slide.
Spanish-native Marc Gasol netted 19 points for Memphis (12-17) losers of three in a row.
Golden State Warriors 117, Sacramento Kings 109Monta Ellis scored nine of his 36 points in overtime, after Vladimir Radmanovic's three-point buzzer-beater sent the game into the extra session, and the visiting Warriors (10-18) rallied from 16 down in the fourth quarter for just their third win in the last 17 games.
Slovenian Beno Udrih scored a career-high 34 points for the league-worst Kings (5-21), losers of six straight and 20 of 22 games.

description.hltext_display: 订货会引发跳水血案
Richtingloze handel op Europese markten
description.content:
AMSTERDAM - De Europese aandelenbeurzen openden woensdag vlak bij gebrek aan richtinggevend nieuws. Volgens handelaren is het onderliggende sentiment echter positief, mede dankzij goede macro-economische cijfers en overnamenieuws dat dinsdag naar buiten kwam.
Kort na de opening noteerde de AEX-index van meest verhandelde fondsen in Amsterdam 0,1 procent hoger op 356,40 punten. De MidKap-index van middelgrote fondsen was onveranderd en stond op 634,10 punten. Ook in Frankfurt, Londen en Parijs stonden de graadmeters onveranderd.
Chemieconcern DSM (min 0,3 procent) was een van de sterkste dalers in de AEX. Amerikaanse advocatenkantoren onderzoeken of DSM de aandeelhouders van Martek Biosciences genoeg betaalt voor hun stukken. Na de aankondiging dinsdag van de overname voor circa 1,1 miljard dollar steeg het aandeel DSM 3,9 procent. (ANP)

description.hltext_display: 赤銅色の月 ３年４カ月ぶり皆既月食 （12/22）
description.content:
（2010年12/22）
赤銅色に染まった月＝２１日午後４時４５分、千歳市根志越で
月が地球の影に隠れる皆既月食が２１日、天候に恵まれた千歳市内で観測された。太陽と地球、月が直線に並んだための現象。国内では、２００７年８月２８日以来、３年４カ月ぶりになる。
千歳市根志越の第１４号幹線排水路周辺で、午後４時１５分すぎから見え始めた。下半分以上欠けた月が雲の上に現れた。空に明るさが残るうちは白く輝いていた月も、高度が上がり欠けた部分が増えるにしたがって、赤味を帯びていく。午後４時４０分。薄暗い赤銅色に染まった。皆既月食の完成だ。クリスマス前の天体ショー。１時間１０分余り続いた。
２０１１年も６月１６日（西日本中心）と１２月１０日（全国）に皆既月食を見ることができる。

description.hltext_display: Toyota To 'Maintain Domestic Production': Pres
U.S. teen birthrate is at lowest point in seven decades
description.author: Shari Roan
description.content:
LOS ANGELES Teenagers are giving birth at the lowest rates noted in seven decades of record-keeping, according to statistics from the federal government released Tuesday.
The report doesn’t speculate on why the birthrate has fallen, but two decades of public-health initiatives to curb teenage pregnancy may be paying dividends. The National Center for Health Statistics report shows that the teen birthrate fell to 39.1 births per 1,000 teenagers ages 15 to 19 in 2009. That’s a 6 percent drop from 2008 and the lowest rate since 1940. In 1991, in contrast, the rate was 61.8 per 1,000.
Birthrates fell for groups that have had the highest rates, including Latinos, whose rate fell 10 percent but still stands at 70.1 births per 1,000. Other birth data: The overall birthrate for all U.S. women fell for the second straight year. The decline appears to be continuing, based on data for the first half of 2010. About 41 percent of births were to unmarried mothers in 2009, up from 40.6 percent in 2008. The birthrate for women in their early 20s fell 7 percent and now stands at the lowest rate since 1973. The preterm birthrate continued its much-need improvement falling for the third straight year. The Caesarean section rate reached a new high of 32.9 percent. It has increased every year since 1996, when the rate was 20.7 percent.
___
Visit the Los Angeles Times on the Internet at http://www.latimes.com/.

description.hltext_display: Merrion Pharma collaborates with Novo Nordisk
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content: The financial terms of a possible future licensing agreement have been pre-agreed. As part of the agreement Merrion Pharma has granted Novo Nordisk a warrant to acquire ordinary shares of up to EUR1,500,000 in Merrion Pharma at 21 December's closing share price (EUR3.00).

description.hltext_display: Modise: It’s Not About Teko ...
description.content:
Every time Orlando Pirates midfielder Teko Modise takes to the field, he captures the media’s headlines, be it for good or bad reasons. In the team’s recent 2-0 win over Moroka Swallows Modise, however, was praised for his performance, after having created both goals and been named Man of the Match.
On Wednesday night when Pirates host Platinum Stars he is expected to start in Ruud Krol’s team even though Daine Klate is back from suspension, with Andile Jali sitting out this time round due to suspension.
Does this give the Bafana Bafana star the chance to consolidate his place in Pirates’ competitive line up or he will continue to be used as a fringe player? Modise told the Siya crew that to him it is not about Teko Modise but rather about Orlando Pirates.
“We played well against Swallows. I play a part in the team game not that I was the only one. Given the chance by the coach to continue playing I will do just the same and the other players will also contribute to the team. As a team we have not won the league in a long time and we would all love to win it this season.
“We started well with the MTN 8 and we would end well with the league. We want the league and we will fight until the bitter end to achieve our goal. We want to win against Platinum Stars and take it from there after the break,” he said.

event_or_fact.property: to him it is not about Teko Modise but rather about Orlando Pirates.

description.hltext_display: Ожидаем роста в районе 0,5% по индексу ММВБ - F1Broker
description.content:
22.12 10:41 Deutsche Bank выплатит США $554 млн за уход от налогов
22.12 10:34 Фондовый рынок России выбрал зеленую зону
22.12 10:28 Германия и Франция против присоединение Болгарии и Румынии к Шенгенской зоне
Во вторник на российском фондовом рынке наблюдалась позитивная динамика, констатирует аналитик F1Broker Андрей Колчевский. Благодаря росту американских и азиатских рынков, а также высокой стоимости нефти марки Brent, на открытии индексу ММВБ удалось продемонстрировать "гэп" вверх, который после небольшой коррекции в течение дня укреплялся. Настроение игроков, по мнению эксперта, испортило агентство Moody''s, поместившее рейтинг Португалии на пересмотр с возможностью снижения. Компенсировать неожиданный негатив удалось позитивной динамикой в США на открытии. По итогам дня по индексу ММВБ был зафиксирован прирост на 0,6%.
Торги на американских площадках во вторник проходили при преимуществе "быков", отмечает А. Колчевский. Индекс Dow Jones по итогам дня укрепился на 0,5%, S&P500 - на 0,6%. Оба индикатора закрылись выше уровней официального начала кризиса - дня, когда инвестбанк Lehman Brothers объявил о банкротстве. Nasdaq, преодолевший эту отметку раньше, прибавил 0,7%.
Лучше рынка выглядел финансовый сектор. Бумаги Bank of America (+2,9%), JPMorgan Chase (+2,6%) и American Express (+1,7%) возглавили индекс Dow. Позитивное влияние оказали новости M&A. Крупный канадский банк Toronto-Dominion Bank (+3,5%) заявил о намерении приобрести Chrysler Financial за $6,3 млрд.
Цены на нефть и металлы демонстрировали рост, несмотря на укрепление доллара. Это благоприятно отразилось на котировках сырьевых компаний, которые, как группа, лишь немного отстали от финансового сектора. Наиболее крупные представители нефтянки Exxon Mobil (+0,7%), Chevron (+0,5%) и Conoco Phillips (1%) показали рост на уровне рынка, комментирует аналитик.
Сегодня в Азии наблюдается небольшое снижение, отмечает А. Колчевский. Фьючерс на S&P при этом корректируется на 0,1%, хотя цены на нефть демонстрируют рост на 0,3% и находятся на уровне $93,5 за баррель. "Котировки "черного золота" продолжают оказывать поддержку российскому рынку, в связи с чем мы ожидаем роста в районе 0,5% по индексу ММВБ, - прогнозирует аналитик F1Broker. - Если индикатор сможет закрепиться выше уровня 1675 пунктов, то следующей целью станет отметка 1700 пунктов. Сегодня на рынок поступят новые идеи за счет макростатистики. Инвесторам стоит обратить внимание на третью оценку ВВП США за III квартал, а также данные по продажам домов на вторичном рынке и запасам нефти в США".

description.hltext_display: Vote out corrupt politicians � Abidoye urges Nigerians
description.content:
CHAIRMAN and Spiritual Head of the Cherubim and Seraphim Movement Church (CSMC) Worldwide, Most Reverend Samuel Abidoye, has described members of the National Assembly as parasites living ostentatiously on Nigeria�s already weak economy.
Speaking on Sunday in Kaduna on the controversial jumbo pay for the legislators, Abidoye noted that the predatory attitude of the lawmakers explains what he called the do-or-die means usually employed by politicians to occupy public offices.
He spoke in his state of the nation address to mark the 2010 Christmas and New Year celebrations at the CSMC International Secretariat even as he noted that consensus candidacy is undemocratic.
Abidoye urged the electorate to ensure that corrupt politicians currently in public offices are not re-elected during the 2011elections.
According to him, if the impunity with which politicians dip their hands into the nation�s treasury was not checked, Nigeria�s economy would be the worse for it and the citizens would be further impoverished.
He said, �the much-needed economic growth and development will continue to elude the Nigerian nation unless the Federal Government demonstrates serious commitment to its crusade against corruption in all facets of life and at all levels of governance.
�The nation�s economy will recover only when there is no more room for corrupt political and public office holders to dip their hands in public treasury to satisfy their greed and selfish interests. �Politicians should stop taking Nigerians for granted because it is unthinkable that a set of few Nigerians can consume a huge chunk of the nation�s overhead cost while millions of ordinary citizens live below poverty line.

description.hltext_display: Arranca el sorteo mas esperado del año
description.content:
El Sorteo de Navidad llega como cada año cargado de premios y repartirá más de 2.320 millones de euros. Además, este año el tradicional sorteo trae importantes novedades como una nueva sede de ceremonias en el Palacio de Congresos de Madrid o la posibilidad de cobrar los 'premios mayores' al día siguiente.
El total de la emisión asciende a 3.315 millones de euros --siendo Madrid la que cuenta con una cifra superior de consignación, 527 millones-- y un 70 por ciento de esta cantidad irá destinada a premios (2.320 millones de euros, en total). Cada serie distribuirá 11,9 millones en premios, hasta alcanzar una cifra total de 26 millones de euros.
Los premios se mantendrán igual que en anteriores ediciones, con el 'Gordo' de tres millones a la serie y un segundo y tercer premio de un millón y 500.000 euros a la serie respectivamente. Además, habrá dos cuartos premios de 200.000 euros a la serie y ocho quintos premios de 50.000 euros a la serie.
El sorteo de este año mantendrá el sistema tradicional de un bombo para el número y otro para premios. Asimismo, habrá 195 series, cada una de ellas de 85.000 billetes y a un precio del número completo de 39.000 euros (200 euros por cada billete, 20 el décimo). Novedades del Sorteo La gran novedad de este año en el sorteo está relacionado no con los premios, sino con la manera de cobrarlos. Los participantes del sorteo del próximo miércoles con números premiados con más de 3.000 euros (conocidos como los 'premios grandes') podrán cobrarlos al día siguiente por primera vez desde la celebración de este evento. Hasta ahora, estos 'premios grandes' únicamente podían cobrarse nueves días después de la celebración del sorteo.
Otra novedad es el cambio de sede al Palacio de Congresos de Madrid tras 50 años de sorteos en el edificio de Guzmán el Bueno. El nuevo edificio tiene capacidad para 2.000 personas, mientras que el anterior sólo podía albergar a 500.
Asimismo, LAE estrena este año una web específica que incluirá noticias sobre el sorteo, además de una opción que permitirá a los usuarios consultar los números premiados. Asimismo, habrá una comercialización del décimo a través de terminales distribuidos en distintos puntos de venta.
El nuevo salón de sorteos de Loterías y Apuestas del Estado (LAE) en el Palacio de Congresos se ha abierto este miércoles alrededor de las 08:00 horas de la mañana para permitir la entrada a los espectadores y aproximadamente una hora más tarde comenzará el sorteo con la extracción de las bolas de los número y los premios por parte de los niños del Colegio de San Ildefonso.
Previamente, anoche se hizo público el examen y recuento de las bolas de los números y premios, que pudieron ser comprobadas por los asistentes que lo desearon, previa petición y autorización del presidente. Finalizada la operación de recuento, se desalojó el salón y se aseguraron con cerrojos interiores todos sus accesos, a excepción de la puerta del estrado, cuyas llaves quedan en poder de tres diferentes claveros.
A las ocho de la mañana, se ha formado la primera mesa que supervisará el llenado de los bombos con las bolas ya colgadas de las liras y el protocolo durante el que el público en general ha podido, desde ese momento y antes de que comience el sorteo, comprobar que la bolita del número que juega está entre las 85.000 que entrarán en el bombo de los números. Comienza el Sorteo Esta operación se efectúa tanto con las bolas de números como con las de premios. Por último, los bombos son cerrados y a una señal del presidente se voltean simultáneamente. Un niño o niña del colegio de San Ildefonso extrae una bola del bombo de números y otro niño, a la vez, otra del de premios, con lo que comienza el sorteo, en torno a las nueve de la mañana.
Al finalizar el sorteo de Navidad , cuando en el bombo de premios no queda ninguna bola, un equipo de más de cuarenta personas se encarga de realizar la lista de premios del sorteo y de las poblaciones agraciadas con los premios mediante un proceso informático controlado en todos sus extremos.
De esta forma, aproximadamente a los 45 minutos de terminado el sorteo, y después de haber pasado por varias comprobaciones y punteos, está preparada la cinta y lista de premios para su entrega a la Fábrica Nacional de Moneda y Timbre, encargada de imprimir la lista oficial de premios. Dicha lista se edita y distribuye la misma tarde del día del sorteo a las Administraciones de Loterías y a los medios de comunicación.
Las tablas de los números premiados, quedan expuestas siete días al público. Transcurrido este tiempo son abiertas y las bolas contadas y examinadas nuevamente, para cualquier otro sorteo posterior a celebrar por este sistema.

description.hltext_display: KKR and DLJ will sell 8M Rockwood shares� 21 Dec 2010
description.content:
PRINCETON, N.J. - Specialty chemicals maker Rockwood Holdings Inc. said Tuesday that two of its stockholders will sell a total of 8 million shares at $38.30 per share, a discount of 5 percent from the company's latest closing price.
Rockwood said funds affiliated with Kohlberg Kravis Roberts & Co. and DLJ Merchant Banking Partners are selling the stock. The offering is expected to close Thursday, and Rockwood will not receive any proceeds from the sale. The company's shares closed at $40.30 Monday, and Rockwood stock declined $1.46, or 3.6 percent, to close Tuesday at $38.84.Kohlberg Kravis Roberts is the largest shareholder in Rockwood, as its funds own a total of 22.1 million shares, or 29.3 percent of the company, according to Thomson Reuters. Rockwood did not specify how many shares KKR will sell and how many will be sold by DLJ.
Deutsche Bank Securities is the book-running manager for the offering.

description.hltext_display: 李宁市值两天缩水45亿港元
description.content:
曾经风光无限的体操王子李宁，如今开始“练跳水”了。受负面消息影响，在香港上市的李宁公司（02331.HK）的股价最近两天连续跳水，累计跌幅超过20%，李宁公司市值缩水45亿港元。
本次李宁公司股价跳水，起因是公司上周五发布的明年第二季产品预订数据显示，虽然服装产品和鞋产品平均零售价格上涨均超8%，但订货数量同比分别下降超过7%和8%。这是两年来李宁公司首次出现订货数量下降。受此影响，李宁公司股票本周一暴跌近16%，市值一天就蒸发逾35亿港元。
本周一晚间，李宁公司发布公告称，明年第二季度订货额下滑是公司“主动提出改革分销体系，包括对低效率经销商进行整合，改善店铺结构，加强产品生命周期管理，提高给予经销商折扣率等措施”的结果，这有利于公司长远平稳发展。
但该公告未能缓解投资者的担忧情绪。李宁公司股价昨日再次震荡走低，盘中最大跌幅超过7%，收盘时下跌5.26%。两个交易日，李宁公司股价从21.25港元跌至16.94港元，下跌了4.31港元，跌幅20.28%。以该公司10.52亿股是股本计算，两日蒸发市值达45.3亿港元。 记者 王丽

description.hltext_display: 失職グリコ従業員支援へ恵庭市雇用対策推進協発足 （12/22）
description.content:
（2010年12/22）
市雇用対策推進協議会を設置
２０１２年５月の閉鎖で職を失う恵庭市の北海道グリコ従業員を支援しようと、２１日、市雇用対策推進協議会（会長・原田裕市長）が設置された。市、恵庭商工会議所、千歳公共職業安定所、石狩振興局がメンバー。２１日の初会合で、グリコの生産ラインが１１年８月から、段階的に縮小される見通しを報告し、協力しながら離職者対策を進める方針を確認した。
協議会の報告では、工場の従業員は１１月１５日現在、正社員２９人、嘱託・契約３８人、パート２００人の計２６７人。１１年８月に「プリッツ」の全生産ライン（従事者約６０人）、１２月に「ポッキー」の生産ライン半分（４０人）、１２年３月に残るライン半分（４０）をそれぞれ縮小し、１２年５月に全製品の生産を終える予定。社員は別の工場などに転籍するが、パートはライン縮小に伴い解雇される。
推進協の初会合が市民会館で開かれ、北越俊二副市長、佐々木政男商議所専務理事、古川正信職安所長、植村英一石狩振興局商工労働観光課長、オブザーバー参加の道から入谷茂樹雇用開発グループ主幹が出席。佐々木専務理事が「合同企業説明会を開くのも一つの手。一人でも雇用に結び付けば」と提案し、古川所長は「（パートで）雇用保険加入は３０～４０人。再就職まで時間がかかると困る」と述べた。
また、市経済部は「市内の食品製造業を中心に、パート労働力が慢性的に不足しているという情報もある。一人でも多くのパートが転職できるよう、企業訪問して情報収集したい」と説明。北越副市長は「パート個々の事情もあるので、きめ細かな対策が必要になる」とした。

description.hltext_display: 日央行维持宽松货币政策
description.content:
早报导读
[名家专评]石之瑜：京借华府之力反台独后遗症
[中国早点]性别比例失衡刺激经济增长
[时事漫画]韩战机战舰仍处战备状态
[台海局势]江陈会：明年大陆客游台日增千人
[朝鲜问题]韩成立国家危机管理办公室
日本央行昨天在声明中说，将稳步购买各种资产，为市场提供长期资金，以确保央行货币宽松措施能够传导至整个经济。
（东京路透电）日本中央银行昨天一如预期，维持货币政策不变，继续保持宽松立场，并将指标利率维持在0％至0.1％的区间不变。
在结束为期两天的会议后，日本央行维持对整体经济的评估不变，表示当地经济呈现温和的复苏迹象，但似乎有踌躇不前之势。央行还表示，将继续采取抗击通货紧缩的措施。
日本央行行长白川方明昨天在记者会上表示，央行将密切关注长期利率变动对日本经济产生的影响。他说，日本长期利率很大程度上跟随美国国债收益率走势，央行在10月推行的流动性举措已经在压低日本长期利率方面取得一些效果。
白川方明还再次重申，日本经济上行和下行风险大致平衡，但仍对日益恶化的商业情绪表示警惕。他说：“迷雾仍未散去，背后隐藏着对于全球经济持续的不确定性。”
日本央行昨天在声明中说，将稳步购买各种资产，为市场提供长期资金，以确保央行货币宽松措施能够传导至整个经济。
日央行10月时放宽货币政策，承诺让利率维持于零水平，直到确定通缩即将结束，同时设立一个基金买进各种资产。日央行决策官员多次表示，如果经济放缓情况比预期更糟，将扩大基金规模。
瑞穗总研分析师草场洋方(Hirokata Kusaba)表示，虽然日本经济基本面不佳，基于日元已由高位下滑，日央行短期内不会进一步宽松政策。
不过他指出，美国经济会比市场人士目前所想像的更弱，这会压低美国债券收益率，导致日元再度升值，这将迫使日央行祭出更多动作，“日央行下一个动作将是把5万亿日元资产购买方案的规模扩大一倍，买进更多日本公债及公司债。”
法国兴业证券的首席分析师大久保卓治(Takuji Okubo)说，没有变化不代表没有讯息，“我认为日本央行正试图平稳日本债市，它目前也许觉得当前的收益率水平还好，但如果短券开始反映接下来两年会升息的可能性，央行不会要看到这个情形。”

description.hltext_display: Edurne Pasabán: "La montaña me ha enseñado a ser más paciente"
description.content: Su pasión por las alturas la llevó a buscar los picos más altos. Moralmente es la primera mujer en coronar los 14 ochomiles. Así es la mejor montañera española de todos los tiempos.

description.hltext_display: Mass. business confidence slips; Wilson joins board of national education group
description.content: Up and down ride for confidence Confidence among Massachusetts businesses slipped in November, although confidence remains on the plus side of the scale. The Associated Industries of Massachusetts Business Confidence Index lost 3.2 points in November to 52.1, remaining above the 50 mark on the surveys 100-point scale, thanks to a record 7.7-point rise in October. The two months together tell a clearer story than they do separately, said Raymond G. Torto, global chief economist at CB Richard Ellis Group Inc. and chair of AIMs board of economic advisors. A third straight reading above 50 in December would give us our strongest quarter since the end of 2007, and some further upward movement would be reassuring, he said in a press release. The index tells us that this is a fitful recovery with no steady upward trend, Torto said. MHT Staff Wilson To Chair National Ed Board University of Massachusetts president Jack Wilson has been named to the national board for the Fund for the Improvement of Postsecondary Education, a division of the U.S. Department of Education. U.S. Education Secretary Arne Duncan announced 13 new board members last week. Wilson, who has served as president of UMass since September 2003, will chair the newly reconfigured board, which will advise Duncan and the assistant secretary for postsecondary education on policies and programs. FIPSE runs a number of competitive grant competitions each year for projects designed to improve postsecondary education, both locally and nationally. Wilson intends to retire as UMass president in July. Programs Connect Students With Biotech Biotech industry officials say a new endorsement system is helping them to collaborate with community colleges on training students to land jobs in the growing industry. Under a new Massachusetts Life Science Education Consortium endorsement program, 11 biotech degree or certificate programs at eight community colleges are training students. The program represents the first sustained effort to connect degree programs directly with the biotech industry. State House News Service

description.hltext_display: Aamir Khan on Katrina Kaif's wish list
description.content:
"It's not one, I have three roles which I wish to do. First on the list is a period film, which are not made enough now. Second on my list is a romantic-tragedy - just like Devdas. And thirdly, I want to do an action film like Salt or Charlie's Angels," Katrina told reporters here at a press conference of the 56th Idea Filmfare Awards 2010.
When asked with whom she would want to team up, she said: "I want to team up with Aamir. In the last few films the way he has romanced on screen I loved it, especially in Ghajini.
The star-studded award night is slated to take place Jan 2.
